My husband told me I had to leave the house for a week. I stayed with a friend. At my friend's place, there is no heat. I became ill. Next time my husband tells me to leave, I will refuse.

The New Chair
Jason feels that his work chair is very uncomfortable. Jason asks his boss for a new chair. His boss agrees, but says Jason must go get it from the store. Jason drives to the store. He picks up the new chair for his office.

The Rules
My job set up all sorts of new rules. Everyone was really upset by them. It made my work almost impossible. Eventually I had to quit. The work environment had turned too toxic.

diving
One summer at our pool party, my mom was caught off guard. She had seen her oldest son go diving off the diving board. He was almost forty years old, and she forgot he could dive. Everyone in the family harassed him after that too. Everyone always called him the boy who could still dive.

New Film
Steven found a 35 mm camera at a garage sale and decided to buy it. He had to go to the supermarket for film because he didn't have any. Steve had forgot how fun it was to take pictures with film. He took photos of everyone around him. He developed the prints and gave them to his friends.

The New Room
Gina was able to move into her brother's old room. Gina had been sharing a room with 2 other girls her whole life. Getting her own room was a dream come true. She didn't even move her bed. She was so happy she didn't care if she slept on the floor.

The Doctor
Little Billy hated going to the doctor, but he had a sore throat. His mother told him that they must go to the doctor. At the doctor, Billy was worried he'd have to get a shot. The doctor told him he had strep throat, and could take medicine. Billy left the doctor with his medicine and knew he would feel better.

The Talkative Neighbor
Amy had a neighbor, Hazel, who was extremely garrulous. If Hazel saw Amy checking her mailbox, she would go out to greet her. Then she would hold Amy hostage to her endless barrage of words. Amy, a good person, felt forced to resort to a devious technique. The only thing that worked was to pretend to be deaf!

Facebook embarrassment
Kim had an online diary that she wrote in daily. She was very candid and put everything in the diary. One day, she was very mad at her boss and wrote about it. She soon realized that she was not in her diary, but on Facebook! Everyone saw her post and she was fired the next day!

Bad sting
I was sitting with my friends eating lunch when I got stung by a bee. The bee came and stung me and I screamed. I ran to the nurse to get some ice. I could see the black stinger inside me. I immediately started being afraid of bees since.

Statues Cannot Dance
A sculptor set out to carve a statue. He found a fine block of marble and set to work. He spent years toiling over it. When he was finished, he discovered that he had carved two left feet. After that, he took up painting.

Stockings
We hung Christmas stockings for everyone in the family. My mom insisted we hang some for the dogs, as well. We put treats in each stocking. The dogs smelled the treats in their stockings and pulled them down. The dogs' stockings were opened on December 12th instead of Christmas.

They Meet
Val saw Ali go to the bathroom. Val and her friend Kris followed her. Ali froze when she saw Val. Val was going to pummel this brat. Just when Ali's friend June came in and saved Ali from a fight.

James Goes To The Bars
James was out visiting his friends. They decided to visit the local bar scene. They ordered lots of drinks. They drank all night long. They had a great time enjoying each other's company.

taco tuesday
Bill was starving at work. He could not wait for lunch time. But then he remembered he had forgotten his lunch! He was sad, until his boss announced free taco tuesday. Bill would have a great lunch after all - for free!

Little Brothers
I have a younger brother. When we were kids I used to like to beat him up. Sometimes we would get in real fights and I always won. But one year, my brother had grown taller than me. I was quite surprised when he won the fight I started with him.

Sunset
Tom wanted to take Shelly on a date. However he was broke. He thought that there was nothing he could do. Shelly had a good idea. They both just sat and watched the sunset together.

Wrinkles
Iva was starting to get wrinkles around her eyes. She went to the store and bought an expensive cream. The cream said it would reduce Iva's wrinkles in six weeks. She used it religiously for all six weeks. She was glad to see that her wrinkles did indeed get smaller.

Little Bobby liked to hang out late at night. His mother always warned him to be in earlier, but Bobby never cared. One night, Bobby saw his friend get robbed and beaten badly. Bobby could not help his friend, because they ran away into the night. Bobby now tries not to stay out late anymore.

Walking the Dog
Alice woke up that morning to her dog, Tito, licking her face. She got out of bed, ready to start her day with a brisk walk outside. Tito wagged his tail as Alice attached the leash and tied her shoes. They walked for about half an hour, enjoying the sights and smells. Afterwards, Alice took a shower and Tito was ready for a nap.

Not A Natural Speaker
I was chosen to give an important speech to my class. I worked very hard on writing the speech. I practiced in front of family and friends. When the time came to give the speech, I forgot it. I made up a speech on the spot that the class enjoyed.

Worth It?
David went to see SNL live last week. He waited in line overnight, in the cold. People had even brought tents to stay in. He eventually ended up getting a ticket. David thought that it was worth it.

The Farm
Same went to visit his uncle at the farm. He woke up early because of the roosters. There was slow internet and no reception. He was bored and hated it. He was excited to finally leave.

I wasn't sure what kind of medicine I should take for my cold. I was confused by the variety of remedies available. I asked the pharmacist what she would recommend. She suggested a multi-symptom formula. With gratitude for her assistance, I bought it.

No tomatoes
Fred really wanted a hamburger. He went to a fast food place to order one. He specified that he did not want a tomato. Fred paid and went home to enjoy his burger. When he put into the burger, he spat out a piece of tomato.

Zoo
Chris wanted to visit the zoo. Chris told his friend how he had never been to the zoo before. They both went together. Chris loved looking at the animals. Chris had a great time at the zoo with his friend.

Jane put on her  riding helmet and chaps after she saddled her horse. Jane got on her horse and began riding down the trail. Suddenly, Jane's horse spooked at the sound of a tree branch breaking. Jan's horse bucked  and Jane was thrown hard to the ground. Jane was not hurt because she wore her riding helmet and her chaps.

I am now realizing that I put way too much emphasis on material things. I now think this year will be a more authentic celebration of Jesus birth.

Broken Cork
Chris was in a rush to open a bottle of wine. He twisted the corkscrew into the cork as fast as he could. He gave it a strong yank to get the cork out. The cork tore in two pieces. Chris had to remove the cork from the corkscrew and start again.

The boss told all of his employees to get together. He discussed several changes to the workforce. In addition, he announced that several people are going to be fired. Throughout the day, I tried to remain calm. However, I saw a notice on my desk that says I'm fired.

Today I went to pick up my son from daycare during a blizzard. My drive there was very interesting and a little scary. The snow had made the roads very hard to drive on. I was late picking up my son. I had to pay a thirty dollar fee for being late.

What was meant to be a short visit turned into months of caregiving. She ended up staying two Year's giving him care before he died.

I pulled over to the shoulder and the wasp flew out. I was lucky I wasn't in an accident due to that awful insect.

Dan was digging in his yard to put in an extension to his home. He wasn't very deep when his shovel thudded against something hard. Suddenly a black stream spewed up into the air! Dan thought he'd struck oil! When he sniffed the air he realized he'd struck a sewage pipe.

Unexpected
Anna was in a hurry to get to her job in a big city. Already late, she hurried down the sidewalk. Unexpectedly she bumped into someone. That person was a famous actor, and they both apologized. Anna was late to work but at least she got his autograph.

Sally went to mountains. Sally decided to go for a walk in the mountains. Sally saw another little girl on her walk. Sally talked to the little girl. Sally and the little girl are now friends.

Jennifer found a pair of boots she absolutely loved. Although they were expensive, she bought them. When she got them home, she decided to put them on. She slid her foot in and felt something strange. She found a baby snake inside the boot.

Pedro went to feed his dog, Rufus but couldn't find him anywhere. He looked all over the house and in the yard and asked his parents. Nobody had seen Rufus anywhere, so Pedro put up signs looking for him. As he was taping a sign to a telephone pole, he heard a bark. The barking got closer and closer until Pedro saw Rufus!

I began to clean out my fridge and put away my new items. After cleaning out the fridge, I had to take my trash out to the can.

Mike had to pass a test to get the job he wanted. The test was extremely difficult so Mike studied hard. He didn't pass it on the first try so he studied even more. Finally, Mike passed the test on his third try. Then, he got the job.

He got to work on time, but covered in embarrassing sweat marks. John decided to return to normal decision making rather than the coin.

Ed liked to drink, but he often got carried away. He tried to stay clean for his girlfriend, but failed. When they wed, he thought he could stay clean for his wife, but no. Then his wife gave birth to a beautiful baby girl! Ed has not touched a drink since her birth, seven years ago.

Jeff
Jeff is very strong and muscular. He loved to help friends with lifting furniture. He helped his best friend move one day. Jeff discovered what he wanted to do with his life. Jeff started his own moving company.

Sweeter Medicine
Jean needed to give her dog Tiny a flea pill. She stuck the pill in a chunk of cheese to fool her pet. Tiny sniffed the chunk of cheese and turned away. Jean retrieved the pill and stuffed it in a soft cookie. Tiny stood on her legs to grab the rare treat.

Worms in the rain
It was getting dark and Amy needed to get home. As she rode her bike she was running over worms. They were everywhere she looked. The covered the road in anticipation of the rain. She decided to walk her bike home to spare the worms.

Apple Orchard
Mary asked George to drive her to the apple orchard. They arrived at the orchard George picked. Mary was quite upset. George was confused about her reaction. They left the horse apple orchard before George figured it out.

Put it Out
Dan bought a bbq grill this afternoon. He wa excited to have his first cookout. He put the charcoal in and added the lighting fluid. He didn't know you shouldn't use the whole bottle of fluid. Dan needs to buy a new grill and patio deck now.

Willow really wanted to have fresh herbs to enjoy year-round. She bought seeds and starter pots to sprout. They were placed where they would get plenty of sun. Once sprouted she transplanted them into small pots. Now, she keeps a shelf of herbs growing at all times.

Nancy's dad tried to teach her to ride a bike on the road. When he gave the bike a push, Nancy and the bike tumbled over. Nancy was too scared to try again. Later, Nancy visited at a friend who had an extra bike. Nancy learned to ride with the friend riding alongside.

Trolley Part
I found a trolley part in the garbage near a carhouse. It was the controller on a 1930s trolley. I put it up for sale on eBay. I made $59. I went back to the carhouse but found nothing else.

Dad
Mike always loved to go fishing. One day, he went to the lake and set his gear up. He waited patiently for a fish to nibble his line. He finally felt a tug and snapped his fishing pole to hook the fish! He was so excited to show his friends his catch!

Jack gets mistaken for famous chef David Miller at a local restaurant. He is going to tell them the truth until the give him their best table They continue to pamper him all night thinking he is David Miller. Everything is great until two mob goons show up looking for David. They leave when Jack's shows them a picture of the real David Miller.

A man wanted to put in a skylight in his house. He took out a saw and began to cut a hole in his roof. The saw gave him a hard time so he took a break. The man laid down on the roof to unwind a bit. In doing so he carelessly dropped the saw from the roof.

Carl was playing Frisbee with his brother and his dog. But he wanted to have fun. So he tried to catch it with his mouth like his dog. But Carl hurt his mouth and broke teeth. Carl's brother felt very embarrassed.

Bill was looking forward to a quiet weekend at home. His daughter called him from college to say her car was broke down. Bill sighed as he put his tools in the trunk of his car. He was going to spend his weekend traveling. Bill fixed her car but missed out on the quiet weekend.

Deer
My friend took a ride in her car with her sister. She lives in a rural part of Colorado. As she was driving, a deer ran in front of her car! Unfortunately, she struck the deer. Her car was ruined.

I recently bought a new boat to take the family out on the lake. The boat has all of the options and very expensive. On the first trip I put a big dent in the side. I felt bad and decided to have it fixed. I regret buying an expensive boat and wish I would have not splurged.

Tim and Jan find a puppy on their doorstep. They decide to keep him even though their landlord doesn't allow pets. When their landlord finds out he demands that they get rid of the dog. The next day they see a flyer with a picture of the missing puppy. They reluctantly decide to give the dog back to it's owner.

A sob escaped Cory's lips. He hadn't wanted to give a talk at his dad's funeral. He persisted, and made it through the speech he'd prepared. Cory was relieved when it was over. When he got home, he curled into a ball in the corner and cried.

Iris and her best friend went to get spray tans for vacation. They each stood in front of the sprayer to get a glow. Unfortunately the sprayer was broken and Iris got too dark. She looked in the mirror and was bright orange. Iris gasped but remembered it would go away soon.

Whitney had gone all year without breaking a phone. She went outside to walk her dog. The dog jerked the leash really hard. Whitney tripped and her phone went flying. The phone's screen was shattered into a million pieces.

How Pencils Are Made
Pencil making starts with wood being carved into thin slats. Grooves are cut into the slats to make space for the graphite cores. The extruded writing cores are cut to length and put in place. The other halves of the slats are then squeezed on top. Finally, the individual pencils are carved into shape.

Jim could not get the computer to work. No matter what he tried, nothing would come up on the monitor. He could hear the computer running. Finally he asked his dad to come take a look. His dad quickly discovered the monitor brightness was turned down.

Mike was always health conscious. And when he a job at a fast food restaurant, everybody saw it. He wiped all of the patties with paper towels to remove excess grease. And he hid the salt packets to prevent anyone from having them. After one week, Mike was fired.

The Foul Ball
Jimmy's dad took him to see his favorite baseball team. He brought his glove in the hope of catching a home run ball. Jimmy waited in anticipation as the biggest slugger came up to bat. On the first pitch, the slugger hit a home run right towards Jimmy! Leaping up, Jimmy was thrilled to successfully catch the ball!

Rainy Save
Rick forgot to bring his gym clothes to school. But before his gym class started, it began to rainy. Rick and his class got to watch a sports movie in the auditorium. And Rick didn't get in trouble for forgetting his gym clothes. Rick was very thankful that it rained.

A Trip to the Zoo
Rachel and Timmy wanted to do something on a Sunday. Rachel suggested that they go to the zoo. The zoo was far away but they got there by the afternoon. They saw most of the animals and got to touch a giraffe. They had to go home in time for dinner.

A Fisherman
The guy who saved my car had acted quickly. We decided to fish together and pool our knowledge. The fish like to hang out in a weedy area of the lake. He used one side and I got the other. Between use, we caught 40 bluegill.

Boo!
John loved to scare his little brother Dave. Dave would be playing quietly and John would sneak up and shout! Dave really hated this and wanted to get him back. The next time, Dave tricked John and scared him instead! John agreed that it wasn't much fun to be scared.

Hiking at the Park
Sage and Belle got to the park early that morning. They wanted to take the new hiking trail to the river. After hiking a short distance they noticed that the trail stopped. Supposing that they'd taken the wrong trail, they turned around. But later they found out that the new trail had just been cut short.

Dan was going to be in trouble if his parent saw his report card. He went to his homeroom teacher to attempt to stop him from mailing it He offered to take the report card to his mother instead. To his dismay he was told the cards were mailed the day before. Dan ran all the way home hoping to get there before his parents.

Gary stole Hannah's teddy bear. He told her that in order to get it back, he has to beat her in chess. Hannah decided to challenge him in chess. The game was close however, Hannah ended up winning. Gary was mad and decided to throw away the teddy bear.

The Great Sunrise
John went out to the lake to go fishing one morning. He went onto his boat and relaxed with his fishing pole. While sitting, he felt a tug on his pole and began reeling. Just as he was pulling the fish up, a beautiful sunrise emerged. John couldn't believe the sight and he was brought to tears.

Ivan was playing outside. But he saw a small puppy by itself. He decided to carry it. But its owner saw him. He and Ivan decided to play with the puppy together.

Cara was making rolls for dinner. She left the dough to sit on the counter and rise. When it was time, she went to put the dough in the oven. Then, she saw that a ton of flies had been sitting on her dough. Sadly, she threw the dough out and started over.

Walking
Today was a sad day for Jim. It marked the anniversary of his father's passing. He made a point to go to the cemetery on this day every year. He walked around the cemetery. He imagined having a conversation with his father.

Todd and his buddies drove to a campsite in the wilderness. Each of the three young men set up separate tents. Todd build a fire so they could cook dinner and stay warm. They roasted hot dogs around the fire, had s'mores, and told stories. Then they set up their sleeping bags and went to sleep.

Alex quit an intolerable minimum wage job. Alex did not feel the need to get a new job soon. Alex's parents demanded that he seek some type of work. Alex went to a job fair. Alex was hired for a new minimum wage job.

Kelly decided to go to the new pizza place down the street. When she tried it she loved it. Kelly thought it was amazing. It was so good she went back. She wanted to go everyday.

Today i decided to bake some cookies. i was looking forward to eat some too. I got distracted and forgot to take them out of the oven in time. All of the cookies were burned! I was very upset, but decided to do another batch.

You then pull up a little further to the rectory and wait for food. They bring the food out with utensils and napkins and you leave.

I began to think this was a bad idea as the boat rocked wildly. Then the skies cleared as we made it to the channel and it was calm.

I found a small stone and threw it in the bushes opposite the skunk. Thinking that something was coming out of the bushes, the skunk left. Luckily, our food was safe and no one got sprayed!

Laundry
June hated doing laundry. But she decided to do it and get it out of the way. She threw it in the washer, then dried it. She folded everything and put it away afterwards. June felt so much better knowing it was all done!

Pharmacy
Mark wasn't feeling very well. He went to the pharmacy to get some cold medicine. There was a lot to choose from and he was unsure. Just then the pharmacist came and offered help to Mark. Mark got the medicine he needed and felt better in two days.

The zoo
The Zimmy family loves animals. So they decided to go to the zoo. They went to the zoo as soon as it opened. They stayed at the zoo all day until it closed. The Zimmy family enjoyed the zoo very much.

Balcony Party
Sue set up a small little area for a balcony party. She put a table and chairs on the balcony and added food and drinks. Her friends came over, sat on the balcony, ate and drank, and chatted. They played music and laughed and had fun. The party ended, and her friends went home.

Spain
Nell had always wanted to go to Spain. As soon as she could afford it she booked her ticket to Madrid. She stayed in Madrid for a few days before heading out to explore. Her explorations led her to walk the Camino de Santiago. Two months later she flew back to the United States a happy woman.

Kelly was excited to attend a one direction concert. She won VIP passes and she couldn't wait. As soon as the concert started she was in heaven. At the end of the show she got to meet the bandmates. Just as she thought, they were super nice.

The Truce
Amy was at the end of her rope with her dorm mate Sue. She decided since they had to live together to try and get along. Amy and Sue had a conversation to work out their differences. Sue seemed to understand why Amy was upset. Amy left that day confident she and Sue were going to get along.

Too high
Amy was buying new athletic shoes. She looked online to get prices before going to the store. When she arrived she found the shoes were $30 more than online. The cashier explained online prices are often cheaper. Amy left the store upset with the deception.

The Bank
Boris needed money. He decided to hold up a bank. He used a fake gun. The police officer at the bank realized the gun was fake. The police officer shot Boris and arrested him.

Pets
Sally went to the pet store the other day. She was going to get a fish. But then saw the cutest puppy and wanted it. Her mom told her she couldn't just the fish. Sally now has a goldfish named Puppy.

blocks of ice
Brad and his dad decided they would make giant ice cubes. They bought large plastic tubs and filled them with water. They then put them outside in the winter. When the water froze, they brought them in and had large cubes. The ice cubes were too big for their glasses.

Jim and his friends had been working all day in the winter. Everyday, they would be trapped indoors with no food. One day Jim thought to bring food for his friends and him. He cooked a big stew all night since they could never go out to eat. Jim brought the stew and he and his friends at it while they worked.

Mike was starving and went to get seafood by himself. He went to a new place on the pier. He saw that there was a deal on crabfish so he got a basket. It was amazing and he ran home to tell his wife. The next day they went there and it was closed!

She mixed up the ingredients and put them in the oven. To her delight her basic sugar cookies were delicious.

I tripped going to work the other day. It was right at the entrance. I decided to roll with it and start dancing after. Everyone thought it was funny I was still ashamed but not nearly as much.

The Train
Today I took a train to meet my friends. The train was very loud and made it hard to sleep. I tried to take some sleeping pills to help me sleep. I fell asleep so hard that I missed my stop. I called my friends and bought a new ticket to meet up with them.

One of each
Sam was at the office supply store to buy pens for himself. He tried out all the pens on display to see how they felt. He decided to buy a set of 20 gel pens that were blue. At the register he paid with his credit card. To sign the receipt he used one of his new pens.

New Shoes
Johnny had been saving his money for a while. He had his eye on a new set of sneakers. They were expensive, but he really wanted them. He must have cut every lawn in the neighborhood to get the money. When he finally bought his sneakers, he was so excited.

I met my sister in law in 1981. After we got married we asked her to go to dinner with us. She was very shy and said no, but changed her mind. We had dinner with her at Victoria Station, a steak house. It became her favorite restaurant.

Golfers
Ray wanted to get closer to his dad. His dad loved golfing, so Ray started to accompany him. Soon he was golfing like a pro. He realized he loved the game! Ray remained an avid golfer all his life.

buddhist
Sura was raised a Buddhist. She decided to explore other religions. She wasn't sure if she agreed with her own. But after researching many other faiths, Sura paused. She realized that she did agree with Buddhism after all.

Mason had always wanted to pick apples in Vermont. Finally he made some friends who shared his dream. They drove together to Vermont one fall day. Mason picked a basket of delicious apples that day. He was so proud that his dream of seeing Vermont came true.

Escape
On January 10, 2011 I saw a mouse run under our oven. I put a sticky trap under the oven. That night I heard a squeal. I went to kill the mouse, but it had escaped. I bought new traps but I never got the mouse.

Ray couldn't get an irritating tune out of his head. He tried to distract himself, but the melody kept repeating itself. That night, he turned the radio on and got into bed to go to sleep. The radio played song after song all night long as Ray slumbered. In the morning, Ray was relieved to have forgotten the annoying tune.

Mel walked into his backyard to get some apples. He walked under his apple tree. The branches were too high for him to reach. Mel shook the trunk as hard as he could. Several apples fell on to the ground.

I came in from the cold last night. My girlfriend was lying on the sofa under some covers. I decided to get close and touch her with my hands. She screamed and jumped back. I laughed and apologized.

Jeff felt that this was a direct slap in the face from his boss. Jeff stormed into his boss's office and quit on the spot.

Sean decided to move out of his parent's house. But, he didn't have enough money for an apartment. He decided to live in his car. One night, someone stole his car. Now, he was completely homeless.

Lacy had two children. It was nearly impossible to get them to sleep. When one was about to sleep, the other's noises would keep them up. Lacy decided she needed some quiet time. She drove them around until they were both sound asleep.

Jade was a huge Disney fan. She wanted to go to Disneyworld really bad. Jade picked up an extra job and worked long hours. She saved every dime that she made. Jade made enough money and took her dream trip to Disney.

I decided I wanted to read a nonfiction book this afternoon. After thinking about different books, I decided on store and left. The drive there was simple and quick. Once at the store I was able to find my book quickly and check out. I took my book home and proceeded to read it.

Cats
A pair of cats were sitting on a fence in the summer sun. A cloud passed over the sun and it bothered the cats. One cat jumped off the fence to try to get back into the light. He walked outside the shadow and sat back down again. The other cat saw this and decided to join him.

I have asked my mother to be at the hospital with me during my surgery She will drive me to and from the event and take care of me afterwards I am grateful that I have such a loving mother in my life.

Harlan started chemo yesterday to get rid of her cancers. The chemo made all Harlan's hair fall out. We took her to a wig shop. Harlan bought a wig that looked like her old hair. Harlan now wears that wig every day.

Lucinda loved to go swimming. She often swam in the lake by her house during the summer. One afternoon in the lake, she felt something squishy under her foot. She screamed when she touched the bottom again and found a huge snake. Lucinda decided to stick to swimming in her pool the rest of the year.

Jim went grocery shopping. He suddenly remembered that he left his wallet at home. Jim didn't want to drive back. He ran into his friend. His friend lent him money and Jim was very thankful.

The Fly
I was grilling yesterday and there was a fly bothering me. I was trying to get the fly and forgot about the food. All of the meat on the grill burnt. I had to give all of the burnt meat to the dogs. My dogs love when the flies bother me when I grill.

Jon wanted to go fishing at the lake. He went to the store to buy supplies. Then he registered a fishing license. Jon packed up his car and drove to the lake. Finally, John got to fish at the lake!

John was lead singer of his high school band. Eventually he got kicked out. Nobody else seemed to like him. The band got a new singer and made it big. They never talk to John anymore.

Going to the Movies
Tom asked a group of his friends to go to the movies. Everyone arrived at the movie theater and chose a movie. After buying tickets, they all bought some popcorn and pop. Tom and his friends sat in the front row to watch the movie. After the movie was over, they all went home.

Bobbing for Apples
At the fall festival there was a big wide bucket. It was filled with water and apples. Jill had never bobbed for apples before. It didn't seem like it would be that hard. Until she tried it, realizing how slippery wet apples were!

Terrie was driving along the highway. She was thinking of the events that took place at work that morning. Terrie had been called into her supervisor's office. Her supervisor told her to pack up her desk, she was laid off. Terrie was in shock as she drove, not knowing what to do next.

I tried to learn Mandarin Chinese. I bought a set of CDs on amazon. I took one lesson. It lasted half an hour. I found it too hard to learn and gave up.

Alex was excited to go to Friendly's restaurant with his friends. When the boys entered the restaurant, they quickly found seats. The menu had many items and the boys settled for chicken. When the boys got their food, they were very happy. By the time the boys were done, they were very full.

Vera was incredibly lonely. She was waiting for meaning to drop in her lap. She finds endless company on a social network. Vera decides that connections are all that matter. She stops looking for any meaning.

Zane started to walk to school when he met his cousin Endie. Zane and India began to run because they were running late. They arrived at school just as the first bell rang. They shared the same schedule and their first class was art. As soon as Zane and Endie got to class, the tardy bell rang.

Too Spicy
My friend brought this large bag of chips. I opened the bag and started to eat a few. They were food at first until the spice started to take effect. I ran to the closest water fountain since my mouth was burning. My friend took the bag away from me.

Party
Lana wanted to go to a party on Saturday night. But her parents made her stay home to babysit her little sister Ann! Frustrated, Lana decided to make the best of it . The girls set up blankets in the den and had their own slumber party. Lana had a great time at her private party with Ann!

Ben got a turtle. He put it in a tank. The turtle didn't eat the candy Ben gave it. Ben was sad. After research, Ben found the right food to feed it.

Bobby's teacher assigned the class to collect insects. Bobby put off the assignment until the last minute. He wondered how he could find enough insects for a collection. Then Bobby spotted the grille of his dad's car. He plucked off the battered insects and glued them to cardboard.

Jan feels sick all the time. Her parents don't believe her Finally they take her to the hospital. Doctors extract a 25 inch tape worm from her body. Jan is grossed out but she starts to feel much better.

Javier met a nice woman named Leah and they started to date. Finally Javier got married, just like the rest of his friends.

Every year we all put of the tree. Sing songs about Christmas. Even when we don't get along we come together. This year I knew was going to be different. My father wouldn't be here this Christmas.

Jim was a prisoner but he was allowed out of his cell an hour a day. He was even allowed to go outside. Because he so rarely saw the sky, he didn't take it for granted. He would look up and be amazed. Absence does make the heart grow fonder, he reflected.

Janice was eating a sub with Brad. He asked her if he can take a bite out of the sandwich. He ripped the sandwich half apart and starting eating it. She ended up buying a second sandwich. In addition, she tried to keep it away from Brad.

Jane went for a walk in the woods. She was gone for three hours. Her parents called the cops. They searched the woods thoroughly for Jane. A man volunteering in the search, found Jane.

Sunday is the only day it's legal to beg here in Florida. Last week, I gave $5 to a homeless lady, she didn't ask me for money.

At the reception their grandparents gave the best toast speech ever. They announced that they had paid for a honeymoon travel package.

Chris needs to find a cheaper apartment. He begins searching for a new place to live. He finds a nice apartment uptown. Chris moves all his belongings into his new apartment. Finally he is home in his new place.

She found someone else to play with but worried about Susie. Susie showed up an hour later and the three of them played together.

Blind Date
Tonya's best friend set her up on a blind date. Tonya met her date, Ben, at the local Italian restaurant. At first, Tonya was very shy. After Ben told a few jokes, Tonya became more comfortable. Following dinner, the two exchanged phone numbers and kissed goodbye.

The rollercoaster
I was going to ride my first rollercoaster. I was so afraid to go upside down. When it began I closed my eyes. After the first drop I really began to enjoy it. I will definitely ride more rollercoasters in the future.

Late Night
Earl considered himself a night owl. He could never go to sleep at a proper time. He tried all sorts of methods. None of them worked. Eventually he got a night job instead.

Memories That'll Last Forever
Alex didn't want to eat the bagged lunch her mom had made her. She traded it for a classmate's take out from a Mexican restaurant. Her stomach began revolting before she'd even finished the third taco. She projectile vomited over the entire cafeteria. From then on, the kids nick named her Patty Puke.

Eli had been thinking about planting a garden. He hoped that he would be able to manage the work. He dug a small plot by the side of his house, and put the seeds in. After much watering and weeding, the seeds started sprouting. He realized that the work was worth it and was quite pleased.

Moving Out
My dad hasn't been able to find work for months. I love where we live. They say we may have to move soon. I started packing early just in case. Today I found out it was a good thing I did.

Skydive
Jim went skydiving for the first time. In the middle of the fall the leader fell unconscious. With little training Jim pulled the parachute hoping it would work. The jolt knocked the leader awake. He steered the parachute down safely and gave Jim a refund.

The Storm
Charles hated being homeless. It was hard to sleep in his car plus the police always woke him up. After class earlier today, he went to his car with no place to go. In the evening Charles got drunk and a storm started. While Charles watched the lightning, a cop showed up.

Jessica's Pierced Ears
Jessica wanted to get her ears pierced, but her parents said no. Jessica decided to try to pierce her ears herself. She ended up with a bad infection in her earlobes. Jessica realized she should have listened to her parents. She would never try something like that again!

Garbage Day
John forgot to take the garbage out two weeks in a row. The garbage piled up on the side of the house. The neighbors called the police to complain about the garbage. The police came and talked to John. John had to remove the garbage and pay a fine.

Judy's new hairdo
Judy didn't like her hair. Everyone of her girl friend said it looked nasty and damaged. Judy was too poor to get a hairdo. A  man with lots of money told Judy he would pay for her haircut. Judy gets a  new hairdo with the help of the generous man.

The lead actress refused to show up. The director panicked. He caught sight of an assistant who looked just like the lead actress. The assistant played the role to perfection. The director was hailed as a genius.

It was Jimmy's first day at his new job. He set his alarm clock to wake him up early. He was so nervous that he got no sleep the night before. He got out of bed before the alarm went off. He threw the alarm clock in the trash on his way out the door.

Kelly loved to paint. Her mom suggested she enter an art contest. But Kelly didn't know if she was good enough. To please her mom, she entered the contest. And to her great surprise, she won first place!

Tina bought a new suede jacket. She went for a walk to show it off to all her new friends. While she was out, it started to rain. To protect her jacket, turned it inside-out. Her friends gave her odd looks when she walked by.

I had just graduated from university. I was offered a job in a different state. I accepted but I was sad that I would have to leave my friends. I cried when I had to say goodbye to all of them. I learned that saying goodbye will never be easy.

Charles couldn't find his social security card and didn't start work. Later he found his social security card in his old bedroom.

He couldn't find them and walked back out to his car to call a smith. He let out a sigh of relief as he noticed the keys were in the door.

Ben and Pam have been arguing a lot lately. They are very unhappy together. They decide to go to marriage counseling. The couple attend counseling every week for the next 2 years. Ben and Pam are a lot happier and are still married.

Ron always used the elevator at work. One morning, he decided to go in the elevator. But it became stuck for 20 minutes. Afterwards, Ron was too scared to use elevators. He always used to stairs at work from then on.

A man at a party lied and told everyone he saw a ghost that night. Some people believed him and began to get scared and hysterical. Those that didn't believe him told him to leave the party. He left but came back later making ghost sounds outside. Even the skeptics began to get very freaked out.

Jon had all his spelunking gear ready. He was excited to explore the cave. The rocky tunnel was dark and damp, full of bats and bugs. Deep inside, he discovered a new species of cave-dwelling fungus! His discovery was published in biological journals worldwide.

Change you can believe in
The laundromat owners took apart every washing machine and drier. They found about $50 of spare change and 3 mismatched socks. They put the machines back together and made a new sign. The sign was to find the owners of the lost socks. The customers thought that the new sign was very funny.

Horse
Sarah loved horses a lot. She had four of her own horses. One day Sarah wanted to ride her horses. She decided to saddle the horses. After watching videos, Sarah rode her horses.

No paper delivery
Everyday I was supposed to get the newspaper delivered. For the past few weeks I got no paper. When I called the company they said they were handling it. Yet it was not resolved for months. Thankfully I was able to see it on the computer.

Tracy was packing boxes preparing for her move to a new house. Her dog Cody was following her in and out of the house. All the sudden Tracey noticed Cody was missing. She called all her friends to help look. Cody was found safe and sound at the SPCA.

No Mall
Gina's friend Lisa offered to show her how to ride the bus. Gina's mom agreed, but told them not to go to the mall. They agreed not to go to the mall. However once on the bus they changed their mind. They walked around the mall for hours with no real money to spend.

The Clarinet
James loved to play his clarinet outside. One day, he forgot to bring it inside when he was done. It rained that night. James woke up in the morning and found his clarinet was ruined. He took it to a repair shop, where a man fixed it for a lot of money.

Walking to the ATM
The local grocery store did not take debit cards. I needed to find a way to pay with cash. I located an ATM across the street. I walked to it and withdrew some money. I walked back to the store and paid with cash.

the fort
Susie loved to build forts. One day she build a really big one. She had to leave with her mom for a while. When she return her fort was torn down. Susie was very sad.

Las Vegas
Bryan turned 21 over the weekend. He planned a trip with his friends to go to Las Vegas. None of them had ever been there. It took them 4 hours to drive to Las Vegas. Bryan and his friends are having a blast in Las Vegas.

easter egg hunt
Anna was at an Easter party. Soon the egg hunt was announced. She set off with the other kids, looking for eggs. She collected ten eggs in her basket. Anna won the Easter Egg Hunt!

Son's soccer game
Lucy promised to take her son to his soccer game. She got her stuff and the car and started driving. Then she realized she left her stuff at home. Lucy then turned around and had to pick him up. Lucy knew never to do that again.

Starry Skies
Jill lived in the city where the stars never seemed that bright. She went to visit her grandparents out in the country for the weekend. It was a clear night and she stepped outside to get some fresh air. She couldn't believe her eyes when she looked up. The stars were incredibly bright against the pitch black sky.

Natalie wanted to get her first tattoo to remember her family. She picked out a reputable shop. She decided on a family crest from some old family documents. Natalie decided at the last moment not to go through with it. She decided that a tattoo was not necessary for remembering family.

To the Beach
Cam went to the beach to relax. He put out his blanket and set up his chair. In the distance a boat sailed across the sea. Cam waved at the boat and tried to see if they waved back. He squinted hard but didn't see anything.

Public transportation
Sue is unable to drive a car. Instead, she rides the bus. One day, someone on the bus sat on her. This made her very unhappy. Sue decided to carpool with her friend to work moving forward.

Pat had always wanted to meet someone famous, so he went on a trip. He finally arrived in Los Angeles, and began to walk the city. Everyone he ran into looked famous, but he couldn't be sure. Sitting down at an outdoor cafe, he ordered a meal and looked around. At the table next to him eating was George Clooney!

Josh could not wait for deer season to open. He began preparing his plots for the season. When the season opened, he went hunting every day. He had no luck the first weekend. The second weekend, he killed a huge buck.

School Clothes
Eve needed to go school clothes shopping. She had grown two inches over the summer. Her mom took her to the mall to buy new clothes. She went to three different stores to buy pants. Eve left with a new wardrobe for school.

I wanted to take a hot bath last week. Unfortunately the tub was dirty. I decided to clean it and the bathroom I scrubbed everything. By the time I finished I was too tired and fell asleep.

Laura loved ice skating. She was pretty good at it. One day she decided to go to the rink with her friends. She slipped and fell. But luckily she did not truly hurt herself.

My friends and I decided to go to the fair. One of the places we headed first was the funnel cake shop. We shared this huge piece of funnel cake. In addition, another group of people decided to meet up with us. All of us went on the new ride that was built.

The Violent Teacher
Bill was late to class one day and took a seat. His teacher began to collect homework and asked for Bill's. Bill said he forgot it, and his teacher became very angry. Bill's teacher hit Bill in the face with a ruler, causing Bill to cry. Bill went home and told his parents who became very angry.

Hot Water
My roommate used to take long showers. She would leave no hot water for me to use. I had to write her a note and leave it on the counter. The note asked her to take faster showers. Ever since that note she takes very fast showers.

My husband and I boarded a train. About four hours into the journey, an announcement was made. The border had been closed and we had to get off the train. We had to find a bus to our destination instead. After hours of waiting, we finally found one.

Donna went to get a haircut. She took pictures of what she wanted. The hairstylist was new. Donna left with a short bob. She was devastated and cried for a week.

Despite the stress, one night he forced himself not to check. The next morning, he saw that his little figurine had been moved.

Jenny was baking in the kitchen with her mom. While they were baking, her mother lifted her glasses over her head. Jenny helped her mom get all of the cookies baked. Her mother then began to look all over for her glasses. After a few minutes, Jenny giggled and told her where they were.

I was getting ready for work one day. The last thing I needed was to put on my socks. However, I couldn't find two matching ones. I dug through my drawers looking everywhere. Finally, I had to just leave for the day is mismatched socks.

I had a paper cut on my hand. I was hungry, so I went to get some pickles. The acid from the pickles burned my paper cut. It hurt so bad. Now I know to be more careful when I have a paper cut.

Other dogs were there, and Chance ran around for hours until tired. The next day, John decided to head back so Chance could exercise.

Amy saw a fruit at the store she wasn't familiar with. Amy decided to try the new fruit and bought one. She put the fruit on the table and went about her day. Amy forgot she bought the exotic fruit. After 2 weeks the exotic fruit was spoiled and had to be thrown away.

Moving back
I decided to move back in with my parents. I wanted to save my money and buy a house. I was nervous as I moved my stuff in. I ended up saving way more than expected and got a house. I was so happy that made that decision.

Time to Fold
Brian told his from Amy about how to fold a fitted bed sheet. Amy was excited at this news and went home to try it. She made several attempts but couldn't get it right. She tried to watch an instructional video for more help. After the third video, Amy was able to fold her fitted bed sheet.

Car Wash
Amy hated having a dirty car. She would often get it washed. Last friday she went to the car wash and paid for the best package. Right as she drove off it started to rainy. She was upset but figured the inside was detailed at least.

Mother's day
Sally wanted to get her mother a great gift for mother's day. But she couldn't afford anything cool. She tried as hard as she could to find something nice in her budget. When mother's day came around she cried because she had no gift. Her mother reassured her she only needed her love, not a gift.

Spiders Crawling
Terry was a very big fan of insect research. He had displays full of beetles, spiders and other insects. During some research online, he found a place selling live spiders. Looking at the tarantulas, Terry decided he wanted to order one. After browsing for weeks, Terry chose a bright blue goliath tarantula.

John wants to go fishing. He heads down to his local lake. He launches his boat and begins angling. He catches a huge lunker. John had a successful day fishing.

Gym
Arnold goes to the gym. The gym was packed. He could hardly get his workouts in. He had to constantly wait for other people to finish. He decides to leave.

Fallen
I was at an elementary school awards assembly. They called my name up. As I was walking to get my award, I fell hard! I was so embarrassed, but got up and kept going. I heard about the fall for years after that!

The ride
We drove all night, only to get halfway there. We had the top down so we could feel the wind in our hair. The gentle hum of the tires was enough to lull us to sleep. If it hadn't been for the chill in the air, we'd have crashed already. Only a few more hours till we're home, in our warm beds.

Visit to Grandma's
Mom and dad told us to get ready for a visit with Grandma. My sister and I picked out our favorite dresses. Mine was pink, her's was lavendar. Mom braided our hair. Grandma greeted us at the door with lots of hugs and kisses.

Study
Neil was starting high school. He wanted to be sure to get good grades. So he started a study group with his friends. Every weekend they got together to study. Neil and all his friends got great grades in high school!

This summer the Conner family went to Disney World. They visited for fourth of July and it was very hot and crowded. They still got to go on every ride they wanted. They saw fireworks and many shows as well. When it was time to leave, they didn't want to go!

Sam wanted to go hiking. The weather was rainy and windy. He decided to stay in instead. He read a book and watched television. He figured he would just hike another day.

Billy and his PE class were getting ready to play prison ball. When the game began, children began to run to the balls. Billy dodged every ball that he could and survived well. Before he knew it, he was one of the last two people left. His enemy threw a ball at Billy, but Billy caught it and won the game.

Tim wanted to take his wife to Paris. He booked a trip. The day came up soon. They were very excited. Tim and his wife had a great time on their trip.

Joe's little brother had finally started crawling. It wasn't long before Joe's brother could pull himself up on his feet. He would wobble around a bit but always fall back down. One day, though, Joe's brother took a step! Soon after, Joe's brother was running around everywhere he could.

Ricky Plays Floor Hockey
Ricky is in gym class. Ricky gets chosen to play for Team 1 in floor hockey. Team 1 decides not to pass Ricky the puck. Ricky feels left out and quits. Ricky's mom is called by the gym teacher.

Burritos
There was this mexican place by my house that had the best burritos. I used to go there three times a week. The best part was that it was open all night. A year ago they closed down for good. I guess I'll have to find a new burrito place.

Craig had troubles with his spine. He was always in pain and couldn't find relief. Craig decided to go to an Asian massage parlor. He received a very relaxing massage that provided pain relief. Craig now goes there at least once a week.

Outside
Amy's high school had 2 building connected on the 2nd floor. Amy had to go outside to get to the other building. It was cold and she hesitated to open the door. She ran through the snow to get to the right building. When she got inside she slipped and fell because her shoes were wet.

Lost!
Jason was at the mall with his mother. He let go of her hand to go look through a store window. When he turned back around, his mom was gone. He was scared until he heard her call his name. Jason spotted his mom and rushed back over to her with a smile.

terminated
I got fired from my job today. I hated having to tell my wife. She already had plans to move to Mexico. We leave in a few weeks. Our new address is 1 Pablo Way, on the beaches.

Car Troubles
The transmission on my car had to be replaced. Less than a mile from the transmission place the engine went out. We had the car towed to the shop. The mechanics said we needed a whole new engine. We sold the car for scrap.

Hailie wanted to go apple picking. So she took some friends and went to the orchard. However, they were late in the season. There were no apples on the trees, only on the ground. They wished they had went to the orchard earlier.

Jordan was working on a new novel. She was facing a block on the next chapter. Jordan decided to take a break from writing. She went outside and took a nice walk. After the walk, Jordan was able to write the next chapter.

They showed their neighbors the rightful property line. Proven right, the Mitchells received no more trouble from them.

Lauren notices that her jeans have developed a small rip. She goes to the crafts store to get thread and a sewing needle. Lauren carefully sews shut the rip in her jeans. She doesn't mind that the thread in her jeans is visible. Lauren is happy that her jeans are no longer ripped.

Tim spent lots of time at his computer. But he noticed that his back constantly hurt. So he decided to get a better chair. He went to a store and sat on a very expensive computer chair. And it was so comfortable that the price didn't matter to him.

I found a penny on the ground. I put it in my wallet. Ever since I had the penny in my wallet I had really good luck. I accidentally spent the penny at the store. My luck had been bad ever since.

The flock of birds stormed the workers, and they left promptly. The birds saved their home and we're proud of what they had done.
