Ophelia was getting sick of her loud city neighborhood. After Years of living in the city, she decided to move to the suburbs. Ophelia was happy to have more space and a yard. In her new place, Ophelia even had room to plant a garden. However, occasionally, she found herself missing the city life.

To The Library
Gina exited the bathroom to find her friends waiting. Gina informed them the librarian was in the bathroom. She would unlock the library doors so they could go to the library. Her friends were happy. As was Gina.

Learning the dance
Kara went to a school to teach a dance to middle school children. The middle school kids were going to put on a musical. Kara brought a small speaker system to play the music for the dance. The kids learned the dance by watching Kara do it with the music. After some practice, they were ready for that part of their show.

Confiscated
Billy decided to bring a water gun in our class. He pointed it towards my teacher. My teacher took it away and called the principal. The principal walked into class and took Billy out. He ended up getting suspended for a week.

New Horizons
We decided to move to a new town next year. We are decided what city has the best opportunities. Somewhere closer to family. We are saving up money. It will be a fun adventure.

The broken snow globe.
Molly had just decorated for Christmas. She had put a snow globe on a bookshelf. She was out of the room when she heard a smash. When she ran into the living room, she saw the snow globe shattered. Her toddler had knocked the snow globe over.

Mountain road
Ray drive his car on a steep mountain road. A boulder fell from high above. The rock came crashing down on Ray's hood. He panicked and swerved into the mountainside. Ray was fine but his car was totaled.

Saving a turtle
Erika was enjoying a walk down a suburban road. She noticed a turtle attempting to cross the street. Erika ran to pick up the turtle. She set the turtle down on the opposite side of the road. Continuing her walk, Erika kept her eyes open for more turtles.

Miles Gains Weight
Miles used to be in terrific physical shape. Last year Miles got married and decided to stop going to the gym. Every month Miles didn't go to the gym he became a little fatter. He also started to eat more than he used to. Now Miles is in the worst shape of his life.

A spontaneous trip.
Michael decided to go on a last minute trip. He got in his car and drove to the coast. There, he went to the beach. He also went hiking and checked out some shops. Then, he went home.

The Butterfly
Cindy went to visit her grandma at the cemetery. She had just passed after having spent the past few Years ill. Cindy wished she could have spent more time with her grandmother. As the thought crossed her mind, a butterfly landed on her shoulder. She felt some sort of calm, almost as if it were a familiar soul.

John Gets Ahead
John wanted to get stronger and more manly. He took a job as a laborer on a large construction site. He learned many skills, becoming adept at using tools and equipment. John decided to start his own construction firm. He now owns the firm scheduled to finish the new World Trade Center!

Useless Tool
Ian was trying to walk through a thunderstorm. His umbrella was protecting him from the rain shower. However, the winds folded the umbrella and ended up breaking it. Not only did Ian fall, but he landed in a puddle. All of his clothing was soaked.

Broken Hose
I was watering the grass with the hose nozzle. The day was very hot and sunny. I left the hose lying to get a drink. The hot sun caused the hose to burst. Tape wouldn't fix it, so I bought a new hose.

Bad Bridge
Frank was hauling bowling balls in his truck. He drove his truck to a bridge to cross a river. When the truck was-way over it, he felt a shake. The bridge began to collapse. Frank screamed as he tumbled into the water.

The french-fry fire.
Sam was making french fries on the stove. His pot of oil lit on fire. Sam quickly tried to remember how to put out a grease fire. Then, he remembered to smother the flame. He covered it with another pot, and the fire went out.

The Big Fight
James was angry at his best friend Todd. James and Todd like the same girl Jenny. They would get jealous whenever one of them spoke with Jenny. They got into a fist fight and both were hurt pretty badly. Jenny later told them that she had no interest in either of them.

Out of gas
Dave was driving down a long, dark country road. Suddenly his car sputtered to a stop. Dave saw that he'd run out of gas! He got his gas can and started walking back down the road. He had to walk five miles before he saw a gas station!

The Injured Finger
Thomas hurt his finger. It bled profusely. He wasn't sure if he should go to the hospital. He wrapped his finger in a towel. Soon the bleeding stopped.

Astronaut
Kay loved to read and write about outer space. But her parents thought she should focus on schoolwork. They feared she'd never get a real job if she dreamed all the time. In the end, though, Kay had the last laugh. She found a great job as an astronaut!

Tay
Tay was having a yard sale. She needed the money to get her car fixed. She feared that she could not raise as much money as she needed. But many people came to her sale and bought items. After the sale she had made more than enough cash!

New iPhones
Macy was thrilled to be getting a new iPhone today. The only problem was that the line was far out the door. As soon as the doors opened, everyone tried to get inside. At least Macy was able to get the pink iPhone. As soon as she got home she opened it up.

Trampoline
Josh found a used trampoline for sale online. He took his truck to go pick it up. Josh came home with the trampoline. He set it up in his backyard. His kids love the trampoline!

The Skyscraper
John's new day on the job was a bit daunting. He had an office in a top floor. The elevator ride alone took forever. When he arrived to his office he saw the view. It was worth the anticipation.

The Stray
Vicki found a cat lost in the neighborhood. She took it's picture and put flyers up looking for the owner. It's been two weeks and no one claimed the cat. Vicki loves the cat and was glad no one claimed her. Vicki and the cat now live happily together.

Family vacation
The Smiths went on vacation every year. They usually went to the beach. This year they decided to go skiing. They rented a cabin in Vail. They loved it and want to go back.

The Baby Shower
Cody was pregnant, so her friends decided to give her a baby shower. Cody had so many people come to the shower that she was overwhelmed. They played lots of games and ate lots of food. There were more presents there than anyone had ever seen. The baby shower was very successful!

The closed restaurant.
Randy and Kat wanted to eat out. They decided to walk to their favorite restaurant. After a short walk, they arrived at the place. It turned out that the place had closed permanently. They were really upset about it.

French Cassy
A French girl named Cassie was supposed to visit Stanley. He bought her plane tickets to come see him in Mexico. She flaked out when she was supposed to get on her plane. Instead of taking responsibility she stopped talking to Stanley. Stanley decided to never deal with French girls again.

The soda.
Mike bought some soda at the store in the summer. He went home but forgot to take the soda out and it exploded all over. He was supposed to go on a date and didn't want to cancel. He decided he would just cover up the mess with towels. his date was a disaster anyways and he laughed about it all.

Restaurant
Jay just graduated from college. He's been finding it hard to get a job. His parents decided to make him work at the restaurant They figured if he can't work, he might as well help the family. Now he works 4 times a week.

Baseball
We would go to my grandpas property every summer. We would play baseball with our cousins. We would spend all afternoon out there. It was so much fun even though it was 2 on 2. It is one of my favorite childhood memories.

The ruined dress.
Sarah was waiting to go out with her friends. While they finished dressing, she hung out by the pool. She was walking along the edge when she tripped. She fell into the water. Her dress was ruined and she had to change clothes.

Late Leonard.
Lenard was never able to get anywhere on time. He was late for work. He was also late for school. One day a girl asked him out on a date. He was still late.

The Gambler
Michael always loved to gamble. His father taught him at a very young age. Michael would go to casinos in his town but was ready for more. He decided to take out all of his savings and head to Vegas. Michael lost all of his money and had to go home broke.

The Long Wait
Stephen's wife, Xiao, went into labor today around noon. All of her family and his went to the hospital to wait for the baby. Xiao didn't want anyone in the room except Stephen and her mother. After 14 long hours the baby was finally born. Twenty six family members were thrilled to hear it was a healthy boy!

The Race
The Horses were lined up in the starting gate. The gunshot fired and they were off like a bolt. Two horses pulled into the lead neck and neck. The jockeys were riding hard and fast. They came to the line and it was a dead heat.

The Sandwich
Paul made a sandwich. As he was about to eat, he had a knock on the door. Paul put his sandwich on the coffee table. He forgot his dog was roaming free. When Paul came back, his dog had eaten his sandwich.

Dream Job
Jasmine always loved to pretend. As a child, she would put on plays for her family. As she grew up, she aspired to become an actress. She attended a prestigious acting school. Jasmine is now the highest paid actress in Hollywood.

To the Bank
Kim won a lot of money in a bet. She planned to take the money to the bank. On the way there she felt like shopping. Kim spent some of her money on new clothes. She still managed to put a lot of money in the bank.

Blacksmith Buddy
Mark was friends with a blacksmith. He kept all scrap metal that he came across to give his friend. When Mark filled a garbage can with scrap he called the friend. The friend came over and took the can of metal. He made mark a metal sculpture as a thank you gesture.

Worst Birthday
It was Elizabeth's fifth birthday. Her mother put a cake with 5 candles on it in front of her. Elizabeth leaned over the cake to blow out the candles. Elizabeth's long hair caught on fire and burned her face. Despite Elizabeth's permanent facial scars, she is now a fashion model

Sweater
Mary decided not to go to school and went to the mall instead. At the mall she did some Christmas shopping. She found her mother a beautiful sweater. On Christmas day she gave her mother the sweater. Mary's mom loved the sweater.

The Hayloft
Willa loved to visit at her favorite cousin's farm. One day, the cousin showed Willa the hayloft. The cousin dared Willa to jump from the hayloft. Willa didn't want to look like a coward to her favorite cousin. Willa busted her arm, but she said she tripped and fell.

Pets
My sister wanted to get a rabbit for a pet. Rabbits poop all over the house. My mom still got her the pet. The rabbit was named Peter, and was very calm. The only place it ended up pooping, was in my room.

basketball
My nephew had a basketball game this morning. I had to get up bright and early to meet him at the gym. He played a good game and I was happy to be there. Their team did a good job and won the game. I am looking forward to the next game.

Out of Coffee
Sandy went to go make herself a cup of coffee. She realized that she was out of coffee. So, she went to the store to buy some. She brought the coffee home and brewed a cup. Sandy felt more awake after having her coffee.

Slippery Situation
Drew was walking home. It started to rainy outside. He began to run to his house. Unfortunately his foot hit a large log during the run. He ended up bending his ankle and fell on the floor.

Danny Learns Portuguese
Danny wants to visit Brazil but he doesn't speak Portuguese. He decides to get lessons in Portuguese from a local tutor. Finally he learns the language and books his trip. His trip to Brazil is fantastic. Danny is so glad he made the effort to learn Portuguese.

How Mike and Juliet met.
The rainy started to fall briskly. Mike hurried and ducked under a canopy. Juliet joined him a moment later. He looked at her and smiled. She extended her hand to him and introduced herself.

Chapped
Anna went for a run on a cold day. The bitter wind chapped her lips! She smoothed balm on them, but it didn't help. Then she applied pure olive oil. The oil helped heal Anna's sore, chapped lips.

Wrong Side
My family was constructing a chair. My uncle assembled the legs that belonged on the bottom. I was trying to place the soft cushion to sit on. However, I realized that I placed it upside down. My uncle took it spot and reorganized it.

Left Behind
My science class took a field trip to the bio park today. Only about half of the students were allowed to go on the trip. My best friend Mark got left behind because he failed a math test. That doesn't seem fair to me because he is really good at science. I don't understand why teachers punish students who really try hard.

The Gym
Kim wanted to work out. She was going to go to her gym. Then she remembered it was closed. She decided to cancel her membership. She started going to an all day gym instead.

Getting in Shape
I joined my friend in the gym to lift weights. We started our workout on the bench press. I lifted half of what my friend did, and I almost dropped the weight. When we moved to the leg exercises, I quit from exhaustion. I went into the locker room and packed up my bag for home.

The Phone Who Lived
I bought a new phone today. At night, I dropped it in my bowl of cereal. After I cleaned it, I put it in my back pocket. I sat down outside my house and forgot it was in my pocket. I heard a crack but when I checked the phone it still worked perfect.

Subway
My mom didn't want to go to Subway for lunch. I told her it was healthy and they had a lot of choices. So we went, she got a chicken breast sandwich. After she finished she told me she now loves Subway. Now me and my mom go to Subway every Sunday.

casserole
Ana didn't know what to cook for dinner. She had a lot of odd leftovers, so she had an idea. She put them all together into a casserole. Then she baked everything under a layer of cheese. Ana's family loved her "leftover casserole"!

Toothache
Mary woke up in the morning with a terrible pain in her mouth. It bothered her throughout the day, worsening with every moment. She finally decided to go to the dentist for an emergency appointment. Seeing it was a wisdom tooth, the dentist performed an extraction. Discomfort aside, Mary left very relieved and drove home to rest.

Sick
John was sick every weekend, all weekend long. He lay in bed and refused to go out with his family. Finally, John's wife persuaded him to go to the doctor. The doctor recommended he see a therapist for depression. John started feeling a lot better.

The Flower Girl
Lisa was so excited because she was going to be the flower girl. She put her dress on and her hair curled all pretty. Everything was perfect. As she walked down the aisle she tripped, and flowers went everywhere. She thought she let everyone down, and ran out of the church crying.

Felix Writes His Memoir
Felix has always wanted to leave a record of his life. He decides to begin writing a memoir. At first it is very painful to write about certain parts of his life. However, over time he finds the process cathartic. As he finishes writing, Felix is glad he will leave something behind.

Leaves
Alec didn't like the fall. Every year tons of leaves would fall on his yard. It would be his job to rake them. This year was no exception. The only difference was that it keeps becoming easier as he grows.

Montana
Jason went to visit friends in Montana. It was a very long drive from Maine. He stayed at his friend Sara's house. That night they had a dinner with many old friends. Jason was very happy with his trip.

Hot Coffee
Jane wanted cold coffee because it was a hot day. But she did not have time to make cold brew coffee. So she made coffee normally and put it in a mug. She left the mug in the refrigerator but left the cap on. Four hours later, the coffee was still hot.

Refreshing Yellow #3 Batch A
Alex was trying to earn money for a foreign trip. He set up a lemonade stand out front his house. He put up a sign letting everyone know he was in business. A cop stopped by and asked to see his vendor permit. Alex took down his stand and slumped back into his house.

New album release
Kelly couldn't wait for her favorite singer's album to come out. The next week when the album came out she bought ten copies. She loved the album so much she memorized all the songs. When she opened up one of the albums she saw free tickets. Kelly was thrilled.

Haircut
Bob decided to get a haircut. He went to a salon he had never been to before. He asked for a bowl cut. They gave him a buzz cut. He got angry and decided not to tip them.

Lighting Situation
Kim hated overhead lighting. Her boyfriend's new apartment had nothing but. They were going to move in together. Kim's boyfriend surprised her with new lamps he bought. She loved how thoughtful he was.

Dahlia
Dahlia was blind but it never seemed to get her down. The only thing that bothered her was being alone. She decided to meet another person who was blind. Ronald was blind as well and they both hit it off. The two remain very close and Ronald just proposed to Dahlia.

Nub Love
Ray look out all the worn out nubs of crayons he owned. He took off the papers and put them into piles by color. He then put the pieces in a mold which was then put in his oven. Ray watched the crayons melt back into their old forms. Once they cooled down he drew with them right away.

Father Bonding Time
Bob wanted to do something special for his son. He wanted to take him on a snowboarding trip. They rented snowboards and took a tram to the top of the mountain. His son fell down many times. Eventually Bob was able to teach his son how to stand up properly.

Pie
Melissa baked a blueberry pie. She set it out on the window to cool. Two hours later, she checked the window again. The pie was mostly gone. She saw two fat cats with pie on their whiskers sleeping nearby.

The two girls meet
Jason wanted his ex girlfriend Lucy to meet his girlfriend Kim. He was afraid they wouldn't get along. However to his surprise, the girls really hit it off. Jason was thrilled. He was thankful there was peace.

Camping
Natalie decided that she'd like to go camping. She visited an outdoors store and bought supplies. She picked her location and set out on her adventure. She settled into her tent and stared at roof, bored. She pulled out her phone to play Clash of Clans.

Ham
Paul loved baked ham. He would put brown sugar on it along with pineapple. He forgot about it one day while it was in the oven. And a horrendous smell came over the house. They didn't have ham that year, and went out for burgers instead.

Behind the Scenes
Amazing Zane was giving a magic show at a theater in the city. A competing magician snuck behind stage to see his secrets. Zane knew he was coming, so he set traps for his nemesis. The nemesis fell through a trapdoor and into a box. Zane kept him prisoner until the show was over.

Same shoes
Kelly was very excited to get a new pair of shoes yesterday. She wanted to stand out and look different. She decided to wear them to school. Yet to her surprise her friend was wearing the same pair. Kelly was rather disappointed.

Fire Detector
Bob needed batteries for his flashlight. He decided to use the batteries in his fire detector. He decided to take a nap after putting the batteries in. Unfortunately, the gas light in his attic ignited. Without a fire detector, the house burned down and Bob burned with it.

bottles
Anna wanted to clean up her neighborhood. She took a big bag. Then she set off to pick up all the discarded cans and bottles. Anna made a big difference. And she earned a lot of money by turning in the bottles!

Running For Office.
Walter had a strong disdain for the immigrant policies in his country. Walter decided to run for office. He made some great speeches. This caused him to get plenty of votes. Walter was successfully voted into office.

Private Screening
Mike is a huge Star Wars fan. But he can't wait for the new Star Wars movie in December. He has terminal cancer and is not expected to live that long. His wife reaches out to the studio through Twitter. The director is kind enough to arrange a private viewing for Mike.

Running Errands
Kristy was going to a new part of town today to run errands. She was using her smartphone for directions. When she was heading back she was stopped by a guy in a pickup. The guy asked if he call someone because his phone died. Then he snatched it out of her hands and drove off with her phone.

Power
It was one of the worst storms I remember. The power was out for seven days. We had to get up in the middle of the night for the generator. If we didn't, the sump pump wouldn't run and basement would flood. It was one of the worst weeks of my life!

Rulers of the School
He slipped into his backpack smiling, the day had finally come! He was a sixth grader - the rulers of the school! She opened the front door and called for him to get into the car. At the drop off gate, he gave her a kiss goodbye and ran to his pals. Tears formed as she watched her little boy go off to rule the school.

The Sunburn
Joanne couldn't wait to get to the beach. She grabbed her bag. Finding the perfect spot for her towel she laid down on the sand. She fell asleep as she baked in the sun. Waking up in pain Joanne realized she forgot to apply sunscreen!

Fast Food
Larry went to get some fast food. He ate it very quickly. The next day, Larry felt sick. He threw up all day. Larry decided he would stop eating fast food.

Tim and Lott Share A Bed
Tim had a dog named Lott who was made to sleep on the floor. Lott unsuccessfully tried many ways to get Tim to let him in the bed. One day Lott hurt his leg and needed plenty of rest. Tim felt so sorry for Lott that he let him lie in bed with him. Now Lott spends every night in Tim's bed.

The slip.
Sarah was on a church trip to go ice skating. She had never done it before and was a bit nervous. When she began, she actually didn't do too poorly. With a new sense of confidence, she began skating quickly. Suddenly, she slipped and fell onto the ice.

A Post-Halloween Surprise
It was time to take the old Halloween jack-o-lanterns to the garbage. Stacie picked up the first jack-o-lantern. Suddenly, a small mouse ran out of the carved pumpkin's face. Stacie screamed. Stacie called her husband to remove the remaining jack-o-lanterns.

Carry me home
Ziggy the dog sprained his leg last week. He has been walking with a visible limp. Yesterday I took him for a short walk around the block. About halfway home, he sat down and refused to move. I carried him the rest of the way home.

Spa Day
Alissa was very stressed out. She decided to call the day off from work and give herself a spa day. She got a massage. After the massage she got a manicure and pedicure. Alissa felt very relaxed at the end of the day.

Sue Gets Sick
Sue had a really bad fever. She was too sick to get out of bed. She had to call in work sick. She spent the entire day watching movies. She felt better the next day.

Cat
Anna wanted to train her cat. Her brother had a dog that he had trained to roll over and fetch. Anna therefore decided she could train her cat to roll over and fetch. But she had no luck with either command. Anna decided cats were not very good at learning commands!

1960 Election
I was seven years old in 1960. I heard about the Presidential election. I stayed up watching tv to get the results. I rooted for Kennedy because we lived in Boston. As an adult I became a Democrat.

Sam Finds a Quiet Study Spot
Sam was attempting to study at his apartment. His roommate was being way too loud. Sam decided to move to a quieter environment. He drove a few minutes to the coffee shop. Sam was able to study in peace while having a cup of coffee.

Rotten Clothes
Every Friday, Rob was supposed to bring his school gym clothes home. But he realized he left it in his last class. The clothes stayed there over the weekend. And when the teacher entered the class on Monday, it smelled terrible. Rob was embarrassed about his smelly gym clothes.

Inheritance
Pearl had received a small inheritance from her grandmother. She was really excited to get things she had been needing. She did not take care of her money. It was all spent in no time. She was really upset with herself for not budgeting.

Started a garden
I decided I wanted to build a garden last week. After some looking, I purchased the plants I intended to grow. It didn't take long to sort out my yard. Adding the fertilizer, I waited a few days for it to settle. A few months later, I had an amazing garden!

Victory
Vickie was going to run in a race. She was really excited about it. She prepared for three months. She ran everyday. One the day of the race she got 2nd place!

Boogie Boards
Henry got his boogie board out of the garage. He carried it into the backyard. He put the boogie board on the ground and stepped on it. He practiced using his feet to steer. He pretended to fall in the water and made a huge splash!

Learning to play guitar.
Julia had just bought a new guitar. She didn't know how to play but was determined to learn. She looked up some things to get a basic understanding. Then she started learning how to play her favorite songs. After a week of practice she was doing an okay job.

Cross
Mike was an altar server. He was asked to serve on Good Friday. At the service he had to hold up a cross. Due to the weight and heat in the church he passed out. He never lived that moment down.

Billy
Poor Billy girlfriend broke up with him today. Billy was sad and asked his friends for help. His friends throw him a party to forgot about her. He has the time of his life that night! Billy is now happy and grateful for such great friends.

Sledding
We thought it would be fun to go sledding together. We went to a place that has many slopes. We went down them and were amazed by how far we flew. Each bump would send us flying in the air. It was exciting but also somewhat scary.

Cold Dryer
Kay was doing laundry and her first load was in the dryer. When she checked the dryer the clothes were wet and cold. She put it on another hour and left. When she returned they were still cold and wet. Kay realized she had the wrong setting.

Running Away
Emma decided to run away from home. She made it to the corner bakery before realizing she was hungry. She walked another block, and started missing her sister. One more block, and she even missed her parents. She turned around and went home.

So Shampoo
Mike came home one day from a jog. He smelled bad so he went to take a shower. Mike did not have any more shower gel. He decided to use dish soap instead. It worked just as well and he smelled like clean dishes.

Being Relaxed
Maddy had to take her chemistry exam today. Despite not studying as much as she wanted to, she wasn't nervous. As soon as she started the test, she moved quick. She scanned the answers that she can answer quick. Eventually, she completed her exam and turned it in.

Javier Uses Chopsticks
Javier had always wanted to learn how to use chopsticks properly. He knew he needed practice. He bought a set and practiced each night before going to bed. Finally he was a chopsticks expert. Javier and his friends enjoyed a meal together using chopsticks.

Garage
I went to the garage to grab a drink from the fridge. When I turned on the light, I saw a mouse run across the floor. I jumped and screamed with fright. When I jumped I hit my head on a light above. My head was bleeding and I went inside without my drink.

Henderson Gets A Donut
Henderson has wanted to stop by the donut shop near his home all week. However, he hasn't had time after work. On Sunday morning, he leaps out of bed to get a donut. Henderson decides to buy a chocolate glazed donut. Driving home, he is happy he finally stopped by the shop.

Job and School
Jill gets a job at a jewelry store. But her grades start to slip. Her parents tell her that she has to get her grades up or quit. Jill spends all of her free time studying and gets her grades back up. Jill is very happy that she gets to keep her job.

The Garage Sale
Carly was holding a garage sale. She asked her daughter to run the cash register. Her daughter stayed by the register all day. When they were done, Carly thanked her for helping. She even gave her some cash.

Cheese
Bob loved french cheese. Alas, he had to travel to India. French cheese was not common there. But, he discovered an Indian cheese called paneer. Bob loved it more than French cheese!

Sandwich Thief
Ed was starving when his dad handed him his ham sandwich. He had been playing in the ocean all morning. Just as he was about to take a bite it disappeared. A seagull had stolen it right from his hands! His dad shared his sandwich with him.

Friends
Billy's family just moved to a new city. He was nervous to go to school and make new friends. At school, Billy was quiet and shy. Sarah came up to Billy and introduced herself. They became great friends.

Picking weeds
My yard was becoming very sloppy. It was overrun with weeds everywhere. I put on my gloves and went outside. I picked weeds for a few hours. After I picked the weeds, the yard looked much better.

Cranberry Soup
Ellie was to bring cranberry sauce for Thanksgiving dinner. She was going to eat at her boyfriend's house. She hadn't met his parents before so wanted to make a good impression. She ended up with cranberry soup because she cooked them too long! Everyone had some without saying a word about it.

Hot Cocoa
Kim and Tim were are the park on a cool fall day. They stopped to sit on a bench and saw a Cocoa vendor nearby. Tim purchased Kim a large cocoa with whipped cream. Kim and Tim sat in the park and sipped cocoa. Kim thanked Tim and gave him a kiss on the cheek.

Practicing Piano
I went to a piano concert and fell in love with the instrument. I decided to take lessons so that I could play as beautifully. I practiced every day for years. My instructor said I had become a great pianist. I finally had my own piano concert after all that work.

Ducks
I like to feed ducks at the pond. I often bring pieces of bread with me. I've started bringing my grandson with me. He doesn't like feeding the ducks very much. The irony is that he plays a sim video game and feeds ducks in it.

Fishing
Taylor went fishing with his father. They got up very early to go to the lake. They sat quietly all day long. Finally, they caught a fish! It was too small and they had to toss it back.

Dance Shoes
Sue was getting ready for dance. As she put on her ballet shoes, her toe popped through. She had to put tape on the toe box. She told her mom what happened. They went shopping for new shoes the next day.

The check
Bill finally got his paycheck! He took it home and put it on the table. An hour later it was gone. Bill looked all over for it. It turns out the air conditioner blew it on the ground.

Roller Coaster Ride
Rina went to an amusement park with her family. She has never been on a roller coaster. Her family convinced her to give it a try. Rina got on the roller coaster with her dad and was very scared. After the ride, she got sick and never wants to ride one again.

Down Under
The Batemans went to Australia for their vacation. They decided to go scuba diving. Dad thought he saw a shark and yelped. If was only a baby dolphin. Everyone laughed in amusement.

Blue Stain
One day Sam was doing laundry. He got together all of his clothes and put them in a basket. One shirt had a big blue stain on it. Sam soaked it in a special cleaner and scrubbed it first. After the wash, the stain was nearly gone.

Make it Double
After nine months of waiting, it was Tina's big day. She was finally going to give birth to her baby boy. Her contractions were rough, but then it was time to push. The doctor pulled out her baby boy, but he had a surprise for her. Tina was having twins!

Driving Around
In the country there isn't much to do for fun. When I was a teenager we would drive around all night. We never really went anywhere. It was just something fun to do. I miss driving around sometimes.

Gas
One day I went to drive my son to a cub scout meeting. The car was out of gas. My neighbor was just leaving when he heard my car sputter. He drove back and helped me buy a tank of gas. I was very thankful.

challenge
Ava took the no-electricity challenge. She had to go without electricity for 30 days. She turned her phone off and unplugged her computer. Then she flipped all her lights off. She had to use candles to see for 30 whole days!

The lunch coupon.
Kathy was trying to pick a place to eat lunch. She dug through her wallet and found some coupons. The best deal she could find was for a burger place. She suggested it to her friends. They agreed and went there to eat.

Maurice Goes Skiing
Maurice had always wanted to try skiing in Vermont. He decided to take a ski trip with a few of his friends. However, Maurice falls when skiing a challenging trail. He needs to have cast put on his left leg. Maurice starts to think the trip to Vermont was a bad idea.

Christmas Lights
Every year my family loves decorating for Christmas. We usually put up a lot of lights and decorations. This year there was a problem with the lights. Half of them didn't turn on. We still enjoyed the effort and end result.

The Friendly Fish
Brianna loved to collect seashells at the shallow waters. While searching she felt something touch her foot. Then she saw a tiny yellow fish. The fish kept swimming around her feet. It followed her around all morning.

Lost Receipt
Jordan needed to return a pair of pants to the store. He could not find the receipt for the pants, however. He looked in his wallet and junk drawer to no avail. Jordan took the pants to the store anyway. The clerk gave him store credit and a warning for next time.

Jamey
Jamey wanted to take Valerie to the prom. He was so nervous to ask her. He felt sure she'd say no. But he summoned his courage and popped the question. Valerie eagerly agreed to be his prom date!

The library
The library down the road was full of books. The little boy loved to visit it. One day he discovered a section full of antique books. He visited every day to read those antique books. The little boy grew up to be the librarian.

Substitute
Steve wanted to play a prank on his mean teacher. He snuck into class early and put a wormy apple on her desk. Steve waited for the mean teacher to arrive. Instead, a sweet and pretty substitute teacher came in. Steve watched as she reached for the shiny apple.

Mary Visits the Shop
Mary was excited to get some holiday shopping done. She decided to head out early and beat the crowds. She pulled in her car and quickly hurried into the shop. She found a trinket for her mom and a plaque for her dad. She thanked the shopkeeper, and left feeling quite pleased.

Alarm
Every night the alarm would go off at Ted's house. Ted did not know why. He never saw a robber. Ted put a video camera by the alarm. It turns out a stray cat set off the alarm.

A lockdown at Walmart.
Tyler needed to go to Walmart. He pulled up to the store and noticed cop cars. The entire store was blocked off. The cops said there was a lock down. Tyler decided to go home.

Bathroom Break
The dog was playing with his bone. His owner brought out his leash to take him outside. The dog went to the door. His owner took him outside. The dog went inside and got a treat from his owner.

Ben
Ben went to the store to get a 12 pack of beer. Ben paid for the beer and took it in a bag from the register. As Ben was walking through the parking lot the bag gave way. All 12 bottles fell and broke in parking lot. Ben just left.

Sally's Troubles
Sally was not well liked at school. She would always walk around with a sour face. One day someone asked her was was she always so gloomy. She responded that she wasn't and her face was just like that. Word spread and Sally gained many new friends after that.

The Wait
Kim's car died and needed to be towed off the highway. Kim and Gary waited in his car for AAA with the air on. They were told the tow truck would arrive in 2 hours. After 3 hours they called AAA back to find the status of the truck. There were too many breakdowns due to the heat, the truck was delayed.

Contract Fulfilled
I was flying back to the US and booked a regional flight separately. This flight broke down and the company offered to bus us. I ended up missing my flight and had to stay the night. I knew someone loosely who was in the area so they let me stay. I got a bed and a new friend because of a delay.

The Jetski
My dad and I went to ride jet skis one day. We went to the lake and towed back into the lake. We unloaded the jet skis and parked the truck. He rode on the jetskis for 2 hours and then stopped. We put the jetskis back onto the truck and left.

Janice Takes Out Trash
Janice noticed that her apartment was getting pretty messy. She decided to do something about it. She collected all the garbage and put it into bags. Janice took those bags and threw them out. Looking around her clean apartment, she felt very proud.

Bad Kids
I was a really naughty teenager. I lived with my sweet grandmother, bless her soul. I wanted to learn how to drive so bad, but she wouldn't teach me. I made a copy of her car keys and stole her car while she was asleep. To my knowledge, she never found out.

The Little Old Lady
A little old lady stood on the street corner. It was obvious she wanted to cross the street. Then a well dressed older man approached her. They talked for a minute and then he gently grabbed her elbow. And with his guidance, they crossed the street together.

Overtime
Larry was working hard at his job. However he really wanted to work some overtime hours. It was taking to long to get them so he got a second job. When his boss found out about the other job he got jealous. He gave Larry all the overtime hours he needed.

Test
Mia does usually get good grades in school. She has a very important test coming up. Her parents said they would give her 20 dollars if she gets an A. Mia studied very hard for the test. She ended up getting an A and 20 dollars.

A better bet
Cora went with her friends to a casino. Cora forgot her identification at the hotel. Cora could not enter the casino. Cora's friends did not want to wait for her. Cora went back to the hotel alone.

Nine Candles
Jim placed the birthday candles on his son's cake. His son was turning eight but he put an extra on for good luck. He lit one candle and used that candle to light the rest. When the lights were dimmed the candles were very bright. The glowing cake was brought over to the birthday boy in the darkness.

The New Enemy
Jane had confrontation with a co-worker. The co-worker had taken it pretty hard. Jane found out the co-worker was trying to get her fired. Jane was angry. She decided to go home early instead of getting in deeper trouble.

The Prostitution Sting
On a spring day, I didn't plan to get a hooker, let alone go to jail. A girl called from behind me and I turned around. She was cute and asked me for money for sex with her. I said no and then she begged me. Inside her hotel room two cops arrested me for soliciting.

Gym Shoes
John's mom went into his room to get a basket of laundry. She smelled something terrible. She looked around to try to find the source of the odor. In the corner she came across John's gym shoes. They reeked so badly that she took them outside to air out.

Ebola
Jason was sick with Ebola. He got on a plane to go back to US. Once he arrived, he was quarantined. Jason got very sick and almost died. He recovered, but then the flight attendant on the flight got sick.

Study Group
Sue was a freshman at college and was having a hard time. She was a biology major and the classes were very difficult. She would stay up all night studying and still struggle to pass. Her roommate was also a biology major and ran a study group. She invited Sue to come study with the group to get extra help.

Alarm clock
Martha had to get up earlier than usual. She set her alarm clock. She forgot to wind it. She woke up in time anyway. Martha never found out she forgot to wind the clock.

Ben's Puppy
Ben's friend got  a puppy for his birthday. Ben had lots of fun playing with his friend's new pet. Ben decided to ask his parents if they would get him a puppy. He was upset when his parent's told him they need time to decide. They decided to get Ben a puppy for his birthday a month later.

Mike Plays Soccer
Mike gets friends together to play soccer. They all drive to the soccer field. Mike chooses the teams. Mike's team wins the game. Mike's team celebrates after the game.

Bike Riding
Bob wanted to learn to ride a bike, but he was sixteen already! He was embarrassed at his inability to bicycle with his friends. Finally he bought a bike and affixed some training wheels to it. His buddies laughed when they saw the training wheels. But they stopped laughing when Bob removed them and cycled on his own!

Lost in South Dakota
My family and I went on a vacation to South Dakota. While we were at a lake, we found a trail and started to follow it. The trail seemed like it would never end, and it was getting very dark. Finally, we saw a light in the distance, and it was from a trailer! The trailer owner gave us a ride back to our car, and we were safe!

Nadia's Shoes
Nadia needed new ballet shoes. Her old shoes were beginning to fall apart. This was affecting her dancing. Her father lent her the money for shoes. After her first dance show, she paid him back.

Erica Runs Cross Country
Erica was on the cross country team. She trained everyday by running 5 miles. She had a meet this weekend. Her parents eagerly watched her run in the race. Her parents cheered when Erica placed 1st place.

Tracked In
Dan tracked some dirt into his house on his slippers. He'd just been going out to get the paper but it had snowed. Driveway grit and sand had gotten on the bottom of them. Dan was dismayed to see it on his hardwood floor. He got a paper towel and wiped up the bits of mud and dirt.

Wasted time
I work at a place that believes in teamwork. We have team meetings all the time. During the team meetings, we discuss strategy. However, during that time I could be closing deals. It always wastes my time.

Returning
Gina and her friends weren't able to go to the library at school. Since the door was locked they needed to go back to their class. They wouldn't be able to do research for speeches. They weren't happy about this. But they had no other choice.

Vegas Casino
I only spent one dollar at the Vegas slots. I picked the slot with the cutest character on it. I put in one dollar. The game immediately gave me thirty dollars back! I decided to stop there and walk.

Sports
Ryan wanted to try out for cross country. He found out when the try outs where. Not a lot of people showed up. The try outs were still held. Ryan got on the team but so did everyone else.

A Root Canal
I had a chipped tooth, so went to the dentist. He examined it and pulled the chip out. Now I have to get a root canal. I called every Dentist in town. Finally, I contact the University, and they will do the work.

The Concert
Elizabeth won free tickets to Adele. She decided to take her best friend. They had front row tickets. They sang along to their favorite songs. It was the best concert ever.

Dan Gets Embarrassed
Dan goes to a corporate party. He can't figure out why everyone is staring at him. He starts to get a little paranoid. Finally Dan's boss tells him that his shirt is inside out. An embarrassed Dan goes to the bathroom and reverses his shirt.

Dog Bath
I had to give the dog a bath. She hates baths, so I had to pick her up and put her in the tub. Once in, she sat still and let me wash her. She was very patient and still in the tub. Once finished, she jumped out and shook her wet fur everywhere!

Daycare
Little Susie was scared to go to daycare. Her mother told her it would be fun. Little Susie cried when her mom left her. Little Susie soon made friends. Little Susie loves going to daycare now.

Trampoline
The Johnson boys had asked their parents for a trampoline. For Christmas, they got one and quickly set it up. The trampoline was so much fun. The boys were worn out from jumping on it all day. They thought it was the best gift they had ever gotten.

New bat
Tim got a bat for his birthday. It was very heavy. He was mad that he couldn't lift it. He worked out everyday for a month. After that he could lift it easily.

Class Party
Hallie is having a class party at school. She wanted to get the whole class something. Hallie and her mom went to the store. They got got a bunch of candy. Hallie is so happy she is taking all that candy to her classmates.

Sledding
Eddie and Emma went to the park to go sledding. They had walked almost a mile and were eager to race down the hill. But when they arrived, the hill was green and grassy! They despaired, but then Eddie had an idea of where they could sled. They walked all the way home and sledded on the hill in his yard!

A light is on
Paul woke up and got ready to go to work. He rushed out the door and got into his car. He noticed that he left a light on in the kitchen. Paul got out of the car and went back inside. He turned the light off and went on his way.

My boyfriend dumped me. I was very upset. I decided to take a drive. The music on the radio made me feel better. Music is good.

Joe was walking to school. But he saw a lost cat. He decided to take it to school and tied it up to a pole. But after school, the cat was gone. He saw someone carrying the cat.

Vehicle
John wanted to take a road trip. He did not want to put the miles on his car. He thought his car might break down on the trip. He decided to rent a car. John had a wonderful trip and was happy with his decision.

Joey was in a rush to leave the house for work. He rushed down the steps, and fell to the bottom. Joey's leg was broken in three places. He needed to call an ambulance. Joey is going to miss plenty of work while in the hospital.

Cindy was shopping at IKEA. She saw a cute pillow that she liked. The pillow didn't go with her current room decor. So, she decided to buy a bunch of new decor. She set it all up as soon as she got home.

Anna

Forty Keys
Dan kept 40 keys on his key ring because he thought it was cool. He tried to get into his house but couldn't find the right key. He was tired of waiting so he just swung his key ring at the window. The glass smashed and he was able to break into his own house. Dan decided to reduce his keys on his ring to only 10.

Whit wanted to go to the dance. She didn't have a date. She told her friends who she wanted to go with. They told him. He asked her to the dance.

Trip to the pet store
Kelly needed to go to the pet store for her dog. She searched every aisle for pet items. She found some nice toys for the dog. There she also got to groom her dog. When it was done, she went back the next day.

Ron and Kate were playing outside. But it was a burning hot day. They decided to go back inside. But then they heard an ice cream truck. They enjoyed eating ice cream outside together.

Sandy was hiccuping non stop. We took her to the doctor and they couldn't help. We flipped her and made her hold her breath and that didn't help. Finally we decided to smack her on the tummy gently. She stopped hiccupping.

Seaver is nervous on the job for his first shift. His boss asks him to get something done for him. Seaver completes the task ahead of schedule. Seaver is praised for his work. Seaver is very happy to have completed the task.

Secretly, Harry's girlfriend knew about this and bought him tickets. Harry was so surprised and grateful and attended the concert with her.

Jim needed to get his girl a gift for Valentine's Day. He was really bad at buying gifts. She liked baseball, so he got her a mit. He nervously gave it to her. His girl loved it and gave him a kiss!

Too Bored
Lucy sat on the pews in the church. She was nodding trying to stay awake. Lucy tried to fight the sleep but was failing. The sound of her own snoring woke her up. She sunk down in the pew trying to hide from the stares.

Anthony went to a girl's house. But his mother thought he ran away. Anthony was supposed to travel to Mexico the following day. Therefore Anthony's mom reported him missing. Anthony's friend picked him up and took him home.

Tess was feeling quite glum this week. On Saturday, she decided to go to the mall. At the mall, she spotted a nice ring that she could not afford. Tess stole the ring and put it in her purse. Tess walked out of the mall, feeling a bit less glum.

Alex wanted to run for class president, but Henry was running too. Henry was extremely popular and had a better chance of winning. Despite this, Alex decided to run. Alex campaigned very hard and made a lot of posters. To his surprise, Alex won and became class president.

Rodney thought it was going to snow today. He wore a scarf and a hat. He even put out gloves. It didn't end up snowing at all! He was very sad.

Tito had the flu. His mom put him to bed right away. She nursed him for a whole week. Gradually Tito began to feel better. After eight days, he was back to his old self!

I walked out of my workplace one day. I got into my car and began to drive away. While on the road, I noticed my gas was low. I quickly looked for a gas station to refuel. I saw one,  and pumped gas into my car.

There was this rest American bar and grill near my work. They used to have the best burgers! My coworkers and I would go almost every week after work. They went out of business last year though. I guess we'll have to find a new place to go.

The school group planned a trip for an overnight on a battleship. We arrived in the afternoon and took a tour of the ship. The ship was huge and we were free to explore the whole thing. After exploring we were shown to our sleeping quarters. We slept all night and in the morning we left the ship.

The Loud Drunk
Every night at the bar, Roy would get wildly drunk. It was like the volume was turned up on him 10 notches. He was so loud that no one could hear the music or the TV. The bartenders did not mind him, however. Roy knew how to tip very generously.

Rotten Oranges
I was on vacation in Florida. I decided to go to an orange farm. The farmer there gave me a nice tour. At the end of the tour he gave me an orange. I ate it but realized afterwards that it was moldy so I fell sick.

Business
Tim decided to get his own business. He was selling shoes. No one came to buy any. He decided to put an advertisement on a billboard. The billboard ended up getting him many customers.

snoring
Betty's husband snores at night so much that she can't sleep. Betty tried everything to get him to stop. Nothing she did seemed to help with the noise. Betty moved out into the living room on the couch at night. Betty now sleeps soundly at night and gets a good sleep.

Lyle had a plan to get the most Easter eggs. The other kids started to grab the first eggs they saw. Lyle ran to the back of the lawn where no one had gotten to. He loaded up on the eggs there. He won the grand prize, a huge chocolate rabbit!

Amy wanted a new doll for Christmas. She showed her mother a picture of the doll she wanted. He mother told her if she was good Santa would bring her the doll. Amy was on her best behavior waiting for Christmas. Amy was so happy when she opened the gift containing the doll!

Rosie was at the grocery store. She was checking out but there was a hold up. A young mom was struggling to pay for all of her food. Rosie felt bad and decided to pay. The girl thanked her dozens of times and then hurried away.

Laundry
Greg was at home from college and had lots of laundry to do. He started his laundry and he put his clothes in the dryer. After 30 minutes, he checked his laundry which was still wet. The dryer was broken, so he had to hang his clothes outside to dry. Luckily, it was a hot day and his clothes dried in no time.

Mary and her family were flying home from vacation in a small plane. It was dark out when the plane flew directly into thunder and wind. The passengers had to hold on tight through the rough movements. Mary thought for sure that the plane was going to crash. When the plane landed safely everyone clapped and cheered happily.

Ethel was terrified of growing old alone. She kept a tight leash on her husband. Ethel couldn't allow him to go more than an hour without calling. Or texting, as he was doing when he missed the curve and crashed. Ethel lives alone, with nobody to blame for it but herself.

Corey had to make 50 copies of a flyer for his band. He put the original down and set up the copier. He accidently hit an extra zero on the copier. Now he had to wait for all 500 copies to come out. The extra cost of the copies depressed Corey.

Neil was backpacking through Scandinavia. He had visited Sweden and Denmark. He wondered where to go next. He unfolded his map and found his next stop. His next destination was Finland!

Ice Cream Truck
Every summer evening around 7:00 the ice cream truck would come by. Billy and his sister Sam waited eagerly for it to arrive on Tuesday. Their mother had given them each a dollar to buy a treat. At 7:15 the truck still wasn't there! Finally it arrived so Billy and Sam could get their frozen treat.

Toy train
Johnny wanted a toy train for Christmas. He wrote a letter to Santa Claus and put it in the mailbox. Every day, he waited for a reply. Finally Christmas came, and Johnny rushed to look under the tree. Under the tree was a new train with a bow around it.

Preslie made the best Memphis BBQ around. Eventually, the health inspector realized Preslie wasn't using pork. Preslie would go down to the local horse stables. He would steal a horse. And then kill the horse to make his special BBQ.

Final Stroke
Dan and Stan were playing mini-golf against each other. Dan took the lead at first but Stan closed the gap. At the last hole they were tied. Dan got his ball in only two strokes. Stan concentrated on his final stroke and got a hole in one.

Katy hated her little brother. She always thought her parents liked him more. She decided to run away one day. Her parents found her crying a block away. They took her home and she never ran away again.

My aunt gave me a small gift box. As excited as I was, I opened the box slowly. A set of shavers, body wash and conditioner was inside. I told her if the present was meant for me to clean myself more. She didn't deny that idea and told me that I really needed it.

Karen went to the plant nursery to get some stuff to make a garden. She bought some vegetables and flower starters. She drove home and went to work planting these things. Once everything was planted, she watered her plants. She then went inside and cleaned herself up.

model

No stealing.
Demi was at the store. She saw some makeup that she wanted but she couldn't afford it. She put it in her cart anyways and considered stealing it. As she walked around, she wrestled with her decision. Finally, she decided not to steal and put the makeup back.

Delivery Dog
Fred is a delivery truck driver for Fedex. He always left the truck door open as he ran to deliver packages. One day, he returned to find a huge black dog sitting in the truck. He tried and tried to entice the dog out of the truck, but it stayed. Hours later, the owners came home and the dog came out.

New glasses
Elsa needed new glasses. Her eyes were getting bad. She drove to the store to get new glasses. When she got them her eyes improved. Elsa was glad to have glasses.

In 2005 I took my first roller coaster ride in thirty years. I am afraid of heights. My kids encouraged me to go. I rode the Yankee Cannonball at Canobie Lake in NH. It was a great ride and I am no longer afraid of roller coasters.

Clean hands
Tom wanted to fix his car. But he did not want to get his hands dirty. He did not know what to do. He decided to buy some gloves. Then he fixed his car without getting dirty hands.

Miles feels restless after working all day. He decides to go to the park and walk by the flowers. When he sees a couple there it reminds him of how lonely he is. After seeing the couple Miles decides to go back home. He decides not to go walking by the flowers again.

Snake
Lon was running on a nature trail. As he turned a corner he saw a big snake on the path. He didn't think he could get around it. He really didn't like snakes at all. He turned around to go home!

First World Banquet
Jean put a pot pie in the microwave and set it to cook. She drooled as she anticipated the delicious meal. She took it out of the oven delicately as steam rose from it. When she cut into it, maggots wiggled out. She threw it in the trash, and had cereal instead.

Mold
Cal was about to make himself a sandwich to take for lunch. When he picked up a tomato he saw it covered in white mold. Cal threw the nasty mold covered tomato into the trash. He pondered what to make himself instead. Cal settled on packing a peanut butter and jelly sandwich for lunch.

Christmas Tree

Tom was on vacation in Mexico. He drove there to visit some family. On the way back he had to cross the border. Even though there was no problem he still felt nervous. This made the guards pay extra attention to him.

Rachel had to go to the dentist today. She hates going to the dentist! She got her teeth cleaned and had no cavities! It turned out it wasn't as bad as she expected! Before she knew it was time to go home!

Mikayla wanted to learn to ride a bike. Her parents bought her one with training wheels. They soon removed the training wheels. Mikayla practiced daily without the extra wheels. Before she knew it she could ride down the street with no help.

Nevin was fed up with his couch. He went to the store to get a new one. The salesman was very nice to him. Nevin got a great deal. Nevin is very happy with his new couch.

The Masterpiece
Erin spent her afternoon drawing in chalk on the sidewalk. When she finished, Erin marveled at her work. The sky began to get dark and ominous. Erin ran to the shed to get a large tarp to cover her work. Her masterpiece remained intact for three weeks after that.

Anthony got asked to leave his house. His mother was tired of his laziness. He decided to get his life together. Anthony found a steady job. Eventually he was able to afford his own place to live.

Cheerleader
Beth always wanted to be a cheerleader. When her high school had tryouts she decided to give it a shot. She didn't have much rhythm but she tried her best. A week later the results of the tryouts were posted. Beth was overjoyed when she found out she made the squad.

Kevin and Erika saw a cute kitten near their home this week. It was scared of them and they could not catch it. The next night they saw the kitten while driving in their car. Kevin got out and walked toward the cat to try and catch it. He ran back to the car fast when he realized it was really a skunk.

Larry Leg Locks.
Larry was the best wrestler on the team. He had the meanest leg lock. Every person he ever put in it had lost the match. Larry's last fight was for the championship. Within seconds the challenger beat Larry with a leg lock.

Juan Becomes a Cobbler
Juan always wanted a trade that allowed him to work with his hands. His family encouraged him to get an office job, but he refused. He met a cobbler in town who agreed to take him in as an apprentice. Juan gradually improved until he was an expert cobbler. Now he is very happy he didn't listen to his family's advice.

The Fish Story
A fisherman was standing in the river up to his waist. He saw a school of fish come at him from upstream. The fisherman cast his line to get their attention. A fish grabbed the line and yanked it hard. This caused the fisherman to fall over in the river with a splash.

Digital Watch
I had an important meeting in the morning yesterday. I made sure to set an early alarm on my watch. I wasn't able to wake up in time to make it. It seems that I set it for PM instead of AM. Now I'm being reprimanded at work.

Florist
Em liked to pick flowers and arrange them nicely. It was a hobby, but she never thought it could be a career. Then one day a friend suggested she work as a florist. Em did her research and decided to give it a try. To her joy, she became the most popular florist in town!

Morning Walk
Cindy was stressed out recently. So she decided to go for a walk. She ended up walking much longer than she planned. And she felt a lot better. She ended up walking more frequently.

Catching a Fly
I was trying to eat lunch at home yesterday when a fly flew in. It kept bugging me as I ate. It refused to go back out the window. I had to chase it around. Eventually I killed it with a newspaper.

Play
After a long day my father used to go the bar. One time he had me after school and took me with him. I played games in the corner while he talked with his buddies. We were both very happy. My mother yelled at both of us afterwards.

The Town Pool
Matthew was bored one summer day. So his mom told him to go to the town pool. Matthew went over by himself. He made lots of friends there. Matthew was not bored for the rest of the summer.

Lighthouse
Ray and Charles went to the beach. In the beach, they had a lighthouse. They decided to pay the money to go on top. Their legs hurt from all the walking. WHen they saw the top, they realized it was worth it.

Dead Body
In Anatomy class I have to work on a dead body. It was hard to go into the room. It stunk so bad. There were 5 dead bodies out. I had to leave because I nearly got sick.

Cooking the Basics
My instructor told me to wash my hands before going to the kitchen. I put on my apron and gloves for safety. He showed gave me some raw macaroni to boil. I placed it in the pot and added it with salt and pepper. 20 minutes later, I took out the pasta and it came out cooked.

Custom sneakers
Lulu loved sneakers. She wanted to get some custom designed. When Lulu went to get some, she loved them. However when she got them, they didn't fit. Lulu was frustrated.

Bacon
Jim loved bacon. He cooked it everyday. He even put it on his birthday cake. One day he got a tummy ache from the grease. So he decided to quit eating his favorite food.

Harry Potter
Ida loved Harry Potter, so one weekend she invited her friends over. She set up a Harry Potter movie marathon. Over the weekends, they watched all eight of the Harry Potter movies. In between, they snacked on Harry Potter-themed snacks. Ida was so happy with her Harry Potter-themed weekend!

Richard's Loss
Richard spent every day with his dog Spot. They loved to go on long walks together. Richard notices that Spot is getting older, but he tries to ignore it. One day Spot gets sick and dies. Richard has lost not only his best friend, but his only friend.

Movies
My daughter cannot make up her mind. She changes movies every thirty seconds. It feels like we go through 80 movies a day. Because of this, I put her movies in a place she cannot reach. Now she has to ask to get her movies.

No More Burgers
Mark used to go to the same burger joint in college. He loved those burgers so much and the prices were decent. Last week he went to his old college to see some friends. He wanted to go to that burger place but he was told they were closed. They went out of business and that made Mark sad.

Dog Walking
I needed to take my dog for a walk. I wanted to finish watching my movie first. By the time the movie was over, it had started pouring. Even though it was raining, I still had to take my dog for a walk. I regretted not pausing the movie and taking the dog earlier.

Pizza Slices
My friends and I ordered a pizza. There were nine slices and four of us. I figured out how to pick who should get the extra slice. I made everyone close their eyes and guess a number. Then I ate it.

Train ride
Sue was on the train waiting for her stop. She got really bored. She tried to fall asleep, but she couldn't. She then counted all of the passengers. Counting turned out to be very fun and exciting.

New Pair of Shoes
Kalsi could not wait to get a brand new pair of shoes today. Her mother took her to DSW so she could try on some shoes. The store was filled with hundreds of shoes to Kalsi's delight. She grabbed the nearest pair she could find and they fit. Kalsi was elated and purchased them.

A Magical Ride
Chad sat down in the car. Joe, Mike and Larry joined him. Mike put on his seat belt. Chad hit a telephone pole. Chad, Joe, and Larry left the car quickly.

Cat Flavored Butter
Lilly sent a lovely table for her dinner party. She stepped away to get some silverware. When she came back, the cat was on the table licking the butter. It was the last stick of butter that Lilly had left. She didn't tell anyone the cat had been licking it.

holiday lunch
We have a holiday lunch at work every year. They set up a bunch of tables and have a nice spread. We talk about some of our accomplishments. We also focus on our plans for the future. It is a wonderful time and everyone enjoys it.

Horse
Bay had a wild horse named Apple. He was determined to climb Apple. He climbed up on her back and they set off at a trot. But soon Apple bucked and Bay was thrown to the ground! Bay climbed to his feet, thankful he had not been injured.

Heads or Tails
Ally's was playing heads or tails with her brother. He told her if it landed on tails he would give her 10 cents. If it landed on heads, she would have to give him 10 cents. He flipped the coin 15 times and it was heads every time. Ally looked at the coin, only to find it had heads on both sides.

Dan Gets the Last Laugh
When Dan takes a job at UPS all his friends go off to college. They all laugh at him for staying at a dead end job. But Dan is more ambitious than they realize Twenty years later Dan is a member of senior management at UPS. He is making at least 4 times as much as all his high school friends.

Engagement
Yesterday my boyfriend proposed. It was the cutest thing. He put the ring in a fortune cookie. When I opened it was was elated. It was a great movement.

Bad Breath
Heather has a job at a local beauty salon. Today, she has a long list of appointments set up. The first person she welcomed was an nice looking young man. Unfortunately, he had the worst bad breath she had ever smelled. Because of his bad breath, she refused to cut his hair.

Amy and the Apple Orchard
Amy wanted to go pick apples. She asked her sister Lucy to pick apples with her. They drove at a nearby apple orchard. The girls picked so many apples from the trees. Amy and Lucy returned home with a whole bushel of apples.

Alexa's Day at the Beach
Five year old Alexa liked nothing better than a day at the beach. On Sundays Alexa's parents would pack a picnic and go to the beach. Alexa would spend hours playing in the water. One day she was frightened by a waterspout on the beach. Now Alexa is scared of the beach and rainy days.

The Dog and the Cat
A family adopted a dog. When they brought him home, he tried to attack their cat! The family started training him to get along with the cat. They worked with him for three months. One night they found the dog and cat sitting together, finally happy!

The Bull
Tom was a bull rider by trade. He would wake up early every morning wanting to ride. He would try to get on a bull as soon as he could. He would ride until the sun went down. Every night he couldn't wait for the next day to ride once again.

Every year my sister and I put up the Christmas tree. We lug it up from the basement and put it together. We hang about a hundred pretty ornaments on it. When that is done we put lights on it. When the tree is complete it looks beautiful.

Last year Bob was an inch too short to get on the big coaster. This year when he walked up to the measuring stick he was tall enough. He proudly got into the front car with his dad. He couldn't believe how much fun it was! He rode it four times that day.

Baby
Nancy had a baby boy. The baby boy was very fussy. She tried to give him a pacifier. He spit it out and cried more. Nancy gave him a bottle and he happily ate.

Kelly was a toddler. She was trying to get a video to play. In the process, she managed to pull all of the tape out of the video. Her mom found it all on the floor. She tried to put it back together, but it was useless.

Maggie decided to go out for a run. She loved running in the woods. She found it relaxing. To her dismay there was a bear. Maggie jumped and ran.

Joe and Sally had tough jobs. One day, their boss went out of town. Joe and Sally decided to take it easy and not work very hard. Their boss returned the next day and saw that no work had been done. Joe and Sally were both scolded.

Small Fish
Adam was excited to set up an aquarium. He enjoyed choosing fish to fill the new tank. Adam chose many fish, including one that was large and showy. He dumped the fish in the tank and watched them swim around. Soon, the small fish covered the large one and began biting it.

Hans made his burgers on the grill one afternoon. His wife and son set the table and pulled out the condiments. Hans then discovered that he forgot to get buns. Hans' son suggested that they use bread slices instead. Hans congratulated his son on a great idea.

Arnold wanted everything in his house to be the color green. He bought green dye to put in his water so he could drink green water. The first time he took a shower he came out dyed completely green. He liked the look and decided to go with it. Now his quest for a total green life was complete.

Benjamin have the ball in his hands with 4 seconds left. He tried to run to the post. Since everyone was blocking the area, he shot a three. The ball bounced off of the net but it went back in. The judges announced the winners, which were us.

Patty did not speak English. She needed to learn for her job. Patty signed up to take a class. The class was very helpful. Patty can have a conversation in English now.

Ken loves the outdoors and wanted to go hiking. Ken put on his boots and drove to a state park. Ken parked his car and walked up to the top of the mountain. He took off his backpack and drank water at the peak. Ken was happy he made it to the top and then went home.

Abby was nervous to get her science test back. She was afraid the grade was going to be terrible. Even though she studied, she still felt nervous. Luckily when she got it back she got a B grade. She sighed in relief.

I was cooking chicken on the stove. I forgot to turn the gas off. It ignited and set my house on fire. I had to quickly evacuate. My dog died in the fire.

The week after she completed training, her mailman collapsed outside. Her CPR skills actually kept him alive until the ambulance arrived.

Bill took the cake to his father, and his father ate a slice. Immediately the father began to feel better, and Bill was thrilled.

Joanie was playing outside in her backyard. She found a tired bumblebee on the ground. Joanie put some drops of sugar water next to the bee. The bee drank the water until it was all gone. After a few minutes, the bee felt better and flew away!

She miscalculated the fire's pace and got caught in the flames. Jenny's synthetic leggings burned into her skin. She screamed every time the EMTs cut another piece away.

Driving through the snow
I had to drive through a blizzard. It was terrifying. My car was sliding all over the road. I finally was able to get where I was going. I felt extremely relieved.

Store Trip
Amy woke her friends Lynn, and Kim up at 12:30 PM. They needed to walk to the store. The girls were hesitant to wake up. Amy threw the curtains open, and flooded the room with light. The groggy girls got up, and dressed for a walk to the store.

Surfing
Mindy tried surfing one day It took her several tries to stay on. Mindy eventually got the hang of it. She met several friends when she went surfing. Mindy was glad she tried something different.

The Car Thief
Lauren didn't have her own car. Heather let her drive her car whenever she needed to. One day, Lauren drove Heather's car but didn't want to give it back. Heather asked Lauren repeatedly to return the car, but Lauren refused. Lauren was arrested for stealing Heather's car.

Walk in the woods
I took my daughter for a walk in the woods. We headed for the stream out back. She was hoping to find a frog or a turtle. She ended up stepping on a small snake instead. Our walk ended before we even got close to the stream.

Harry and the train station
Harry was taking a train in New York city. He was trying to get back home but was really tired from working. Harry fell asleep during the train ride. When Harry woke up, he was at the wrong station. Harry doubled the amount of time it took him to get home.

Ice Cream
Marge was walking around downtown. It was super hot outside. She was looking for a place to cool off. A local store was offering a free ice cream cone! She gladly went in and bought a drink to go with her ice cream.

Slipped down the canyon
I was on a hike with my friend one day in a forest. We noticed a large canyon and wanted to get a better look. When we got closer to the canyon's edge, the dirt collapsed under us. We slipped and fell very far down into the canyon. Luckily, when we stopped falling, we were not hurt at all.

The train was late to its next station. The conductor needed to make the train go faster. He began to shovel in coal into the furnace. The coal made a lot of heat. The train began to pick up speed.

Matt loves tacos. He eats at Mexican restaurants all the time. He wanted genuine tacos so he decided to go to Mexico. He found the best tacos in all of Mexico. The drug cartel killed him for no reason.

A Quick Ride
My friend needed a ride to the airport. Her flight left on Tuesday. She didn't ask me until an hour before her flight left. I agreed to take her. She missed the flight and owes me gas money now.

Finals
John was very afraid for his biology final. He needed to get an A to pass the class. John decided to study every day for two hours. He was very confident when he took his final. John got an A on his final.

Randy always thought it was funny pranking strangers. Until the day he put salt in the pepper shaker. He never took into consideration anyone getting hurt. That afternoon the cops came to Randy's door to tell him bad news. His mom had passed away, she died from an allergic reaction to salt.

The family then went to an Italian restaurant for dinner. The family had a great time and took hundreds of pictures.

Harry had just moved into a new apartment. He had just set up his bed. He noticed that he didn't have any pillows. Harry slept awkwardly on his neck that night. In the morning, his neck felt extremely sore.

Steve was a practical joker. He thought it would be funny to put a fish down his wife's blouse. He got the biggest, slimiest fish he could find. He snuck behind her and dropped the fish down her blouse. She screamed and hit him with her purse.

Alice and John were set to be engaged. She knew she would receive a ring one day. John had been sneaking around. He asked her to meet him for dinner. He pulled out a box and brought out the ring.

Tammy was excited that her family was moving to a new home. It had been a long time coming, and they needed a new house. They traveled very far, about 1000 miles to get to their new place. It was very exciting for tammy, but she was also nervous. When they arrived at their new place Tammy loved it and wasn't scared.

Megan
Lisa is a nurse with a 4 month old baby girl. Her daughter's name is Megan. Lisa does not want to put Megan in daycare. Lisa asks her friends and family if they can babysit while she works. Lisa's mother says she is willing to watch Megan for her.

Ice
My front walkway froze overnight. It was icy and I slipped a little. I decided to drive to the store and buy salt. I salted the walkway. It's now safer to walk since the salt melted the ice.

Today I took my toy boat out on the lake. I attached fishing line and a hood to see if I could get a fish. A fish started to bite at my line. I pulled in my boat and was surprised to see what was attached. It was the biggest fish I have ever caught.

Chuck was hiking the Appalachian Trail. He was in a hurry to get to the next shelter before dark. He was halfway there when he entered a field of wild blueberries. He picked and ate blueberries until well into the afternoon. Though he didn't make his goal, he was content to sleep in his tent.

Roach hate
Mindy was scared of roaches. She thought they would one day take over the world. One day she got out of bed for a glass of water. She saw a roach on the floor. Mindy nearly fainted.

Jellyfish
My son and I had gone out to walk the beach early in the morning. There wasn't anyone else on the beach as we walked along. We could see where the waves had washed jellyfish up on the shore. There were jellyfish everywhere for a long way down the beach. We made our way home without stepping on any jellyfish.

Time Goes
Shiko was a young boy. He wanted more than anything to grow up. He waited impatiently year after year to get older and older. Eventually, Shiko was on his deathbed. He realized that he wasted his time wanting to grow up.

Slow Library Day
It was a slow day at the library. A librarian tried to pass the time by reading. She started to read a page when she heard a noise. It was a person banging on the front door. The person shouted that the door was locked and he wanted to come in.

Ruined Book
Pete checked a book out from the library. He brought it home and began to read. While reading he got up to get a drink and snack. When he came back, he accidentally spilled his drink on the book. Pete ruined the book and had to pay the library for it.

Missing Friends
Gina was at her grandma's in Illinois. She wanted to go home really badly. She missed talking to her friends. She even missed going to school. Her and her friends may have fought a lot, but they were like family.

George is preparing for a big cross country train ride back home. He dreads the idea of going home to California to see his parents. Finally the big day arrives and George begins to board the train. However, he realizes he left his wallet at home. After missing the train to get his wallet, George feels quite happy.

Kelly was on a flight to California. She sat in coach as always. She put in her headphones to relax. Yet to her dismay, a baby started screaming. Unfortunately the baby cried the rest of the flight.

Prank Pain
I put some thumbtacks outside my buddy's door in the dorm. I knocked on the door. He swung the door open, stepping right on the thumbtacks. He screamed in pain. I realized at that point this prank was just going too far.

The Broken Bus
John hates driving. He decided to travel this summer by bus. The only available time to travel was 3am. In the middle of the trip the bus broke. He regretted not using his car to travel.
