Charlie was underemployed. Charlie felt that he needed to get a new and better job. He sent many resumes to prospective employers. Charlie scheduled several interviews. Charlie was given the option of choosing a job from several offers.

Michael went on a trip to New York. He wanted to go to the casino there. He saw a whole bunch of lights. Michael had a blast. He ended up wasting all his money at the casino.

But when her son was born, Sally had him sleep in a bassinet instead. The crib could have waited, because she wanted him as close as possible

Tracy usually runs on the treadmill. One morning she decided to go outside for her workout. As she was running down the street, she started to fall. The road was covered in ice! Tracy decided it was best to stick to the treadmill from now on.

Bob dreamed about growing up and being a writer. Every day, he wrote short stories to practice. Deciding to take a bigger project, he started to write a novel. Finishing his novel, he submitted it to a publisher. His book was quickly published, selling millions of copies.

Ophelia attends a Thanksgiving party thrown by her friends. She has been very busy with work and couldn't bring a dish with her. After the party, she notices that there are many dirty dishes. Ophelia decides to scrub the dishes herself to help the host. She feels better after helping out with the dishes.

It was near Christmas and Kelly didn't have her tree yet. Finally Kelly got her tree. She put it together. When she decorated however, she got her balance lost. She fell off the ladder.

As he yanked on the line, he realized she had a monster fish. The fish snapped her line and Erika never forgave her husband.

Tina was running in the park one day. Across her path, she saw a fat red slug! She paused in her run to approach the slug. Picking it up gently, she set it on a tree branch. Then Tina returned to her run, happy to have saved the slug.

Tom worked an office job. The company decided to run a special promotion. The promotion was to give one thousand dollars away. The winner was determined by who worked the most overtime. Tom worked twelve hours per day and won the contest.

My sister and I used to walk to the corner store once a week. We would talk and laugh on our way to buy candy. It was something we both enjoyed and looked forward to. On a recent visit back home, I discovered the store had burned down. I lost a little bit of my childhood in that ash.

Video games
David asked Edmund if he would play videogames with him. Edmund accepted the offer. David had to wait a few minutes while the game updated. David's game updated. David was furious when Edmund started without him.

Visiting the Doctor
Ted was nervous to visit the doctor. He was worried he may need a shot. The doctor came in and gave him an exam. At the end, he told Ted he wouldn't need a shot. Ted left feeling relieved and happy!

The Rose
Stuart brought a rose to school to give to his crush, Elizabeth. They greeted each other in the hallway at school. Another boy appeared from behind Elizabeth. Elizabeth hugged the boy and introduced him as her boyfriend, Steve. Stuart greeted Steve and decided not to give Elizabeth the rose.

The Concert
Kelly's favorite band was coming to town. She bought tickets for the concert on Friday night. She went to the mall Friday morning to get a dress for the show. Kelly found the perfect blue dress and black shoes. She danced all night long in her new outfit.

Apple Farm
Jerry wanted to start an apple orchard. He decided to sell his belongings and move to Washington. He bought a piece of land. He began planting seeds. After a few years, the land turned into a prosperous apple orchard.

Overslept Again
Eric Set up three alarm clocks so he would get up for work. While Eric was trying to sleep his neighbor was throwing a party. The music from next door kept Eric awake for hours. When 6:00 am came all the alarms started going off. But Eric was too tired from the noise and he slept through them all.

The Book
I went to the library to find a book to read. The library was very crowded at the time. Since I hate crowds I wanted to get out as soon as I could. I pick a random book off the shelf to check out. The librarian told me I made the right choice.

France
I wanted to visit France. Specifically, I was interested in getting authentic French food. I took a trip to Paris. I found the food was not to my liking. I actually preferred the Americanized French food back home.

Cora
Cora went on a hunting trip with her father. But they couldn't catch anything! Soon they decided to give up and go swimming instead. Cora and her dad hiked from the woods down to the beach. There, they had a great time swimming together!

Dedication
Freddy was saving up to get a new car. He told his parents he wanted to earn it on his own. He shoveled snow, cleaned cars, did anything to make money. His parents loved his dedication and helped him out in the end. Freddy bought an Acura RSX for his first car.

No Patience
Tina borrowed my mom's car. She was on the way to her boyfriend's house. However, my mom needed to go somewhere and tried to call Tina. Tina didn't pick up. My mom decided to drive my car to go to Tina.

When Carlos saw Lisa, he thought she looked like Sade, the singer. Lisa quickly fell in love with Carlos. He convinced her to take some sexy pictures. Carlos sold the pictures to a man's magazine. Lisa got rich and famous and broke up with Carlos, he was so hurt.

Falling in the Handstand
I tried to learn how to hold a handstand. But, I kept falling. Then, my coach told me to do the handstand against the wall. She told me I had to learn how to hold the position before balancing. The wall worked great and taught me the technique I needed to master!

Hot Hike
My friend visited from Germany. It was extremely hot outside, but we decided to take a hike. The hike was only about 1 mile long, but it took forever. We almost didn't reach the top but pushed through. The view at the top was fantastic and was worth the trip.

Becky went out for a walk on the Fox River Trail. She saw many people and animals. One little squirrel ran across the trail. Right behind the squirrel was a fox! Much to the dismay of the fox, the squirrel ran up a tree and was safe

Truck Driving
Marco likes to drive trucks. He got a job being a truck driver. He drives all over the United States hauling cement. He became very good at this and started his own business. Marco is now the boss and has a successful truck driving business.

As Stacey was sick in bed she contemplated what to do. She found some movie marathons on tv and decided to give it a watch. She put on the channel and heated some popcorn. As she relaxed in bed, the hours flew by. At the end of the day Stacey watched six hours worth.

Alexis was an only child. One day, her mother had to go to the hospital. Alexis was a little afraid. Her mother was gone for a whole day. When she came home, she brought a brand new baby!

The eggs
Bob had chickens at his farm. Everyday he would get the eggs. He would wash them with cold water. Next he would dry them. Bob took eggs to the market every Saturday.

Phil was hired by Pat to install drapes in his house. The drapes that Phil brought were too long. Pat said that the drapes will not do and to take them back. Phil cut the drapes with a pair of scissors to fix them. Pat looked them over again and said they were now fine.

The cat
Andy always fed his cat human food. His friends would tell him this was bad for the cat. Andy refused to listen to his friends until his cat go sick. He worried for his cat and was foolish for doing it. Now Andy only feeds his cat high quality cat food.

Raul was in charge of burying all the landmines near the base. He drew a map so he could remember where he put them. Carl asked Raul for the map because he wanted to go for a walk. Raul hated Carl so he gave him a false map. No one at base trusted Raul with the landmines after that.

John is a die-hard Yankees fan. He even refuses to visit Boston because he hates the Red Sox so much. Last week, he had to go for a business trip. When he came back, he admitted that it was a beautiful city. He still hates the Red Sox, though.

Whitney was bored. She decided to get in her car and drive. She filled up the tank and headed south. She ended up in Florida. She had decided to go on more road trips.

I was eating out with my family. They decided to take a picture to mark the occasion. I hate pictures. I decided to opt out. My family shouted at me and forced me to take the picture.

Lexi was feeling tired and sluggish lately. And she struggled to stay awake in class. So she decided to eat a spinach salad every day. After a week, Lexi felt happier and more energetic. And she never got tired of eating spinach.

John bought a turkey fryer for Thanksgiving dinner. He set it up on his deck and started cooking. Unfortunately, the oil overflowed and spilled onto the burner. The oil caught fire and soon the deck was burning too. Both the dinner and the deck were ruined that Thanksgiving.

Jane worried that her son would catch cold playing outside. She bought him a puffy snowsuit to keep out the cold. She sent her son out to play, feeling like a good mom. When he came back inside, the zipper on the snowsuit was stuck. By the time he got the suit off, Jane's son was burning with fever.

In the morning, I drive down the same highway. On the side of the highway is a seedy motel. One morning, I saw the ultimate walk of shame. The woman was clutching a motel bed sheet around her naked body. She walked straight across the highway, barefoot, to the bus stop.

Jan tried to keep her hoarding a secret. When a co-worker provided a ride home, Jan didn't invite her in. One day, the co-worker came to Jan's door with a cake. She suggested they go inside and each have a bite. Jan grabbed the cake and quickly shut the door on her co-worker.

Child's play
Richard's son was performing in a talent show one night. Richard was late leaving work and needed to travel to the play. Richard became stuck in traffic with only a few minutes to spare. He pulled over into a parking lot and ran to his son's play. Luckily, he made it just in time and saw his kid's entire play.

Cold Coffee
It was a hot day. But Gina wanted to drink coffee. She decided to put water and ground coffee in a bottle. And she put it in the refrigerator. Several hours later, she had cold coffee to drink.

Dee
Dee wanted a dress so badly that she begged her mom to buy it. Her mom told her that she couldn't afford to buy the dress for her. Dee decided to get a job. As it turned out, she was hired where the dress she wanted was. She earned the money and bought it on a discount.

Title Search
We sold our condo in 2013. The closing was set for April 21, 2013. A few days before the closing the bank said the title was unclear. We were frantic, but our lawyer found a way to clear the title. We were very relieved.

Deb's school
Deb attended a school where there was a terrible shooting. She and the other students were still afraid to attend school. Their parents discussed how to make the school safer. They met with the school principal and outlined their safety ideas. Deb felt better knowing that the adults were trying to make them safe.

Severe Reaction
I decided to treat my brother to some food by a local seafood place. When the waiter gave us a table to sit on, we made our orders. My brother enjoyed the food until he started to get nauseous. His face started to swell and he had trouble breathing. I immediately took him to the hospital.

Walking a friend home.
Henry had a friend over. She was ready to go home. It was dark so he walked her home. They had to go down three streets. Then, he said goodbye to her at her door.

eggs
Ben bought a dozen eggs fresh from the market. Then he put them in his incubator. He turned them every so often. Soon they began to hatch! Ben's dozen eggs turned into a dozen chicks!

Trip to the opera
Kelly was about to go to her first opera. She was excited to finally attend one. She got dressed up in her best gown and went out. The show was wonderful. Kelly had a great time.

Basketball
Mark loves to play sports. He is very athletic. Mark decided to enter a basketball tournament. Mark was the best in the tournament. Now Mark has lots of trophies at home!

Girls
A boy grew up with all girls. He had a mother and 3 sisters. He did not get along with his sisters. One day he fell off his bike and broke his arm. His sisters brought him to the hospital and he liked them from then on

Missionary
Ryan wanted to go on a church trip to Asia. His mother said they couldn't afford the tickets, though. So Ryan fundraiser and sold candy bars. In two months he had warned enough for his trip! He and his church went to Asia and had a wonderful time.

Staying
Gina had an hour to work in the library at school. And now it was time to return to her classroom. Gina stopped packing and thought about her options. She was hesitant to return to the tension of her classroom. Gina decided she would simply stay where she was.

Drawing
Cayla loves to draw. But she wanted to get better at drawing. So she began taking lessons on how to draw. She finished the drawing course in 6 weeks. Cayla loves to draw even more now that's trained to do so.

Hair Dye
I decided to bleach my hair so I could fit in. I did it myself to save money though. After applying the bleach I needed to wait 45 minutes before rinsing. I fell asleep in the chair for 3 hours. I woke up in a panic to find myself bald with chemical burns.

Grandmother's Soup
When I was young, my grandmother would take me to German restaurant. At the restaurant, they served a special soup. My grandmother tried for years to get their recipe. Finally, her friend shared the restaurant's secret soup recipe. I now have the recipe and make the soup for special occasions.

Lemonade Stand
Louis decided to make a lemonade stand. He set up a table and made a sign. He mixed fresh lemonade to sell. Unfortunately, it started to rain and he had to stop. He learned to check the weather before planning something outdoors.

New Trunks
Paul put a lot of time into surfing, doing it most every morning. He wore out swim trunks on a weekly basis, always needing new ones. He bought a cheap pair, wanting to just surf as soon as possible. His first wave went by great, until he came out of the water. Paul was red with embarrassment, his trunks had fallen off!

Charging Cords
John always carried lots of electronics with him when he traveled. He just checked into his hotel room when he noticed something missing. He had forgotten to bring some charging cords for his electronics. John called the concierge and had them buy some charging cords. John was able to receive the cords that evening.

College acceptance
Kelly was nervous to get her college letter back. She was afraid she would not get in. She immediately ran to the mailbox when it came. She opened it up. Thankfully she was accepted.

Horatio Tries to Write
Horatio had always wanted to try writing a novel. He traveled the world for one year to gain inspiration. Over that year he had many romantic encounters. When he got home he sat down to write his novel. However, the stories were too personal for him to share.

Emmanuel's Bad Hair Day
This morning, Emmanuel couldn't get his hair to look good. He tried to comb it several different ways. Emmanuel didn't think that anything looked good. He decided that he was going to use hair gel. Emmanuel likes his new hairstyle even more than his usual one.

A laser tag match.
Riley was playing laser tag with his friends. He was hiding behind a wall. His plan was to surprise his friend and get some points. Suddenly, his friend came up behind him and shot him. His friend laughed and ran away.

Bad Tattoos.
Shay was getting a new tattoo. She wanted to get a rose on her neck. It didn't feel like the shape of a rose being tattooed. When she was finished she looked in the mirror. And there was a tattoo across her neck that said Bros.

umbrella
It started to rainy on Ann's walk home from school. She dug into her backpack hoping to find a newspaper. But then she found something better. Her mom had slipped an umbrella into her pack that morning. Ann was so happy and grateful!

Johnny and the Bike
Johnny was learning how to ride his bike. He out on his helmet, and his pads. He fell down the first time. The second time he fell into a bush. The third time he drove all around the driveway with no problem.

Shawn had just moved into a new apartment. He was really enjoying the place for awhile. Soon, though, he started seeing patches of mold everywhere. He did his best to maintain things but the mold was unstoppable. Soon, he realized that this was a deep-rooted problem.

Nathan wanted desperately to fall in love with a woman. He searched long and hard to meet the right person. He decided to try a dating site. He met a woman on there called Clarise. Nathan and Clarice dated for years and Nathan fell in love with her.

Jeff loved to ride his unicycle. His twin daughters thought it was so funny. One summer he taught them to ride. It took lots of practice! They got really good, just like their dad.

Jansen wanted a new pair of shoes. He asked his mom if he could get them. Hi mom told him he would need to keep his room clean for a week. Jansen didn't keep his room clean and his mom didn't buy the shoes. Jansen learned a lesson about keeping a promise.

The Martin family went to get their Christmas tree. The tree lot had just put out fresh trees. They picked one out and brought it home. They decorated the tree together. While decorating they sang the carol O Christmas Tree.

A walk around the block.
Chrisana and her niece went for a walk around the block. They stopped at a park. At the park, they rode the swings. Then, they kept walking. Eventually, they made it back home.

Bad trade
Kelli bought some stock options of Apple as a gamble. She thought the price would go up so she bought calls. However to her dismay the price as falling. Kelli was upset she was losing money. She knew better next time not to gamble.

Starter
Dick had tried to get a fire started all afternoon. His attempts at rubbing twigs together failed, but he had no lighter. Suddenly, Dick remembered that his dad packed several matches. He looked through the backpack and found all, but one soaked. He lit it and had a blaze in no time.

Excuses
Gina called her boyfriend. She told him to get dressed for the party. He ended up arriving 2-3 hours late. He said that there was traffic on the road. Since he lives one street away from the place, she knew he's lying.

Bark Bark
One afternoon I was sitting in my chair writing stories. I was struggling because writer's block had set in. I scratched my head in frustration, trying to think! All of a sudden I heard my dogs barking outside. That's how my dogs cured my writer's block.

Dan went to get caught up on the forum. Today there was a lot of spam from the woman in New England. She didn't seem to get no one wanted to know about her personal life. Dan looked at the forum settings and found what he was looking for. He was able to put the shrewish woman on permanent ignore.

Loudoun decided it was time to purchase a new microphone. He wanted to take his recording to the next level. Primarily interested in singing, he knew he needed something dynamic. He found a Shure58 microphone on a Black Friday sale and purchased it. Loudoun felt great joy as he listened to himself through his new mic.

Doing the Exact Opposite
My mom tried to tell Anthony to throw away his food. Since Anthony was hungry, he decided to eat the food. The next day, Anthony had a large stomach ache. He also threw up several times. I had to take him to the hospital since he felt sick.

Telling The Chamber of Commerce
Charles was Eddy's tenant. He rented a room from Eddy in Eddy's house. But Eddie would leave his Pit Bull in the house and fuss for rent. Charles wrote a complaint and sent it to the Chamber of Commerce. They told Eddy he wasn't a reputable home appraiser or landlord.

The Park
The family lives down the road from a park. The kids ask Becky to take them there. Becky takes the kids to park to play. They all have a fun time. They can't wait to go again.

Distraction
Mom and Debbie took a walk in the dark around their camp site. Debbie was very scared and afraid they were lost. Mom needed to distract Debbie. She told Debbie a story about a princess who lived in a castle. Before she knew it, Debbie was back at the campsite.

Sally
Sally was a good girl with a cat. Sally's cat was fat and lazy. Sally tried to walk her cat. Her cat would not comply. Now Sally's cat is obese.

Driving after my stroke
I suffered a stroke in October of 2011. I could not walk for five weeks. I had to learn how to drive again. I took special courses from a driving school, and took a road test. I was very proud to pass my road test and get my license.

Baby Toy
Bill's sister recently gave birth, and he wanted to give a new toy. Bill decided to check his local toy store. Upon arrival, he found the perfect teddy bear for the baby. Bill purchased the bear, and got some flowers for his sister. Bill's sister was pleased with the gift for the baby and herself.

Forgetful
Danielle was a very hard worker. She had a full-time job and went to school. This week she had to stay late at work a few days. She ended up forgetting to study for an important test. Danielle failed her test and was very sad.

lunch break
It was a lovely spring day. Ben decided to leave his office on his lunch break. He took a walk outside. He felt great soaking up the sunlight. He never wanted to go back to the office!

Tiff wanted a turtle for her birthday. She thought it would be easy to take care of. But she when got one, her time seemed to vanish. It needed a very specific diet and environment to live in. Tiff hated her turtle.

Kyle and Sebastian loved professional wrestling. Every Wednesday they sat in front of the TV and watched intently. Sebastian saw a move that looked cool and wanted to try it. Sebastian pushed Kyle through their mother's coffee table. Sebastian was grounded for two weeks.

Gina had broken her windshield wiper blade. But she still needed to drive to buy new ones. When she turned them on the rubber began to separate from the plastic. She watched as the rubber wagged about. She decided to use the wipers sparingly until she replaced them.

Anne was born and raised in California. She spent the majority of her life there and needed a change. Anne decided to move to Florida and make a life there. She got a job and a boyfriend and liked her new apartment. Anne missed California but was feeling like Florida was now home!

Harold's neighbor asked him to watch her cat while she was gone. He went over to her house one day and looked for the cat. The cat came running to Harold as he went to the kitchen to get food. When he went to the kitchen, he saw cat food everywhere. He called his neighbor and told her about the cat's mess.

Gas Price Fall
Amy was driving out of town for a summer holiday. The gas was $2 higher than it was before the summer began. It was the end of the summer and she could wait no longer for her trip. The week after her trip gas prices fell by $2. Amy was annoyed she overpaid for her gas.

The brents were excited to go camping this year. They were all packed and ready to go so they started driving. An hour into their journey they noticed a large group of bears. One bear attempted to charge at their car. They decided to go home instead, and they'd try again next year.

Johnny wanted to get a Facebook like his friends. He created a profile online. He added his profile picture and edited his profile. He added everybody he knew from school. Before he knew it he had over 100 friends!

Going to the convenience store.
I wanted a soda fountain drink. I went outside to walk to the store. After thirty minutes of walking, I saw the convenience store. I went inside and got the soda. I paid for it and enjoyed it.

Tomorrow Never Dies
Bob asked Jane for some money. Jane said that she'd give it to him tomorrow. The next day Bob asked her for the money. She said that tomorrow is always a day away. And Bob punched her in the face.

The Dog
Pete's dog ran away. He looked for him all over town. He put up flyers in all the stores. Pete's dog never came home. Pete was very sad.

Gina's parents weren't ready to leave Illinois and go home. She thought they would leave when her father came to retrieve them. But he had been back in town 3 full days and they were still here. Gina was starting to panic. She was not excited about the thought of in living in Illinois again.

Gina rarely saw anyone go into the house next door. Now there was a middle aged man coming and going. She assumed it was the son of the elderly lady who lived there. One day she saw her mother speaking with the man. She found out his mother was too sick to live alone any longer.

I've always been a girly girl. As a child, I used to want long hair so bad. So, I put a blanket on my head and ran around. I felt like a glamorous woman. I've worn long hair ever since then.

Samantha loved to go bowling. She went to the bowling alley by herself on Friday. She scored a perfect game! She was awarded a free t-shirt. She got a sponsorship to become a professional bowler the next day.

Deep Cut
A man was angry at the local government about his tax rate. He took a pick ax to the road to get revenge. The road was soon covered in potholes. A car tried to drive through and flattened all four tires. The man laughed and told the motorist to bill the town.

Kazu had a boring lecture and kept sleeping in class. He failed his test because he was sleeping and missing the notes. Kazu was depressed because he could not stay awake in class. Kazu decided to videotape the lectures with his phone camera. Now, he could review the notes at home and pass the next test.

Tom was always good with his hands. He could build almost anything. He decided to get into construction work. Now he helps create things and gets paid for it. He is happy and content.

We arrived to northern Nevada in early May to visit a friend. The weather was crisp and the sky was covered in grey clouds. I commented about how much it felt like snow weather. Despite everyone disagreeing with me it did snow that night. I enjoyed making a tiny snowman.

As soon as Tina turned 21 she wanted to attend a wine tasting. She went with her best friends and they were excited. The girls tried about ten different wines. In the end they loved the merlot. The event was a success.

It was a scorching hot summer day. Ben's mother set up the slip and slide in the yard. All the kids came over to play. They spent hours outside playing. Before they knew it, it was time for dinner.

Abby was having trouble with her laptop and it was annoying her. She tried everything she could to get it to work. Finally she decided to restart it one last time. To her surprised, restarting it again actually worked. Abby was happy and relieved she got it working again.

The way Gina had taken to the store was jammed with traffic. On her way there she decided to go a different way home. Now it was time to decide if she would or not. As she left the traffic on her first route seemed better. Gina decided she would take the same route back home.

Sam went to the storage closet at work to get some supplies. The closet was locked so he took out his keys. Sam went through 25 of his 50 keys before he found the right one. Sam put a strip of tape to mark the key to the storage closet. Now Sam never had to waste time trying to find the key again.

Not twenty minutes ago he came over and knocked on my door. I answered the door and he told me he was going to get the gas. Frank just got back and my truck has a full gas tank.

BloodSport
Jim was a hunter, but didn't always eat his kill. He sometimes hunted just for sport. One day, he attempted to get his largest kill, a moose. He missed his shot and the moose attacked him brutally. He ran away scared and decided to only hunt for food after that.

Piano jitters
Tim had his first piano recital today. He was incredibly scared to go on stage. Tim was terrified he would mess up. Thankfully though, Tim didn't miss a beat. He ended up doing great.

Paper
Sam was an office worker. Sam would occasionally work from home. Sam would hold sensitive work documents at home. Sam thought he should buy a paper shredder to be safe. Sam used the shredder on every document and felt smart to do that.

Step in the Wrong Area
A group of flies were chasing Dan to the shoreline. He accidentally tripped on a rock and fell into the shore. Several insects managed to get inside of his pants. They were biting my legs to a large extent. Ultimately, I had to run out of the water

Kayak race.
Yesterday I went to the state park to go kayaking. My friends and I decided to participate in a race. We raced as fast as we could around the rock. Finally I ended up winning. I was thrilled.

Going Home
Roger lives in Texas but is from New York. He has not been back home to visit for over seven Years. Roger drives the hundreds of miles to return home. He visits with friends and family that he hasn't see in Years. After staying for almost three weeks, Roger heads back to Texas.

Halloween
It was almost Halloween and they didn't know what they'd be. They went to the store to look at costumes. They looked online to get ideas for couples. They eventually decided on something they thought would work. They decided they would be Mary Poppins and Bert.

Awake
Lucy's grandpa was napping on the couch. She needed a ride to a friends house. It had been an hour and he was still asleep. Lucy knew she would be in trouble if she woke him up. She decided it would be better to wait than get in trouble.

The Johnsons always enjoyed their trips to the beach. Sandy Johnson loved to walk on the beach with her husband. The children built many sandcastles and one year a contest was held. Many castles were built by many children, but the Johnsons won. A photo of the castle of taken and printed in a famous magazine.

Lost
Ben was on a hike one day. Suddenly, he realized he was lost! He tried to stay calm and remember what to do. He stayed put so rescuers could find him. Thankfully, Ben's friends found him very soon.

Getting a portrait done
My family wanted to get a portrait done. At first I was hesitant but agreed. The artist sat us down to paint. When she painted it felt like hours. Finally when she was done we could relax.

Vickie's camera was dirty. She put some cleaning fluid on it. Then, she used a cloth to wipe it. There were a few spots left. After finishing the last spots, the camera was clean.

It was a beautiful fall day and the Smiths went apple picking. They traveled to their favorite orchard. It took about an hour to get there but it was worth it. As soon as they got there they started picking. But the time they were done they picked 100 apples.

Ike often liked to take walks alone. During one walk, he heard a cry come from the inside of an alley. Ike went to investigate and saw a small cat. He gave it some dried fish and pet it as it purred. Now, sometimes on his walks, the cat follows Ike around.

Love
I decided to go to the store. I hopped in the car and went to my local grocer. As I shopped for items, I noticed my ex-boyfriend looking around. I ducked and dashed around the store until he was out of sight. Eventually, I lost him and quickly drove home.

Oliver prepares to leave the house when he realizes he lost his keys. He checks all of his pockets but his keys aren't there. Finally he sees his keys on the coffee table. Oliver remembers putting them there after checking the mail. Now he is ready to leave the house.

Dan was having a bad day. He decided to go to the bar to feel better. At the bar, he met a girl who he was attracted to. They talked for an hour and had a lot in common. Dan asked her on a date and afterwards they started dating.

Charlie went into the woods to find some insects. He brought his net to catch them with. After an hour he still hadn't found any interesting bugs. Then he found a praying mantis up in a tree! Charlie decided to leave the mantis in the wild.

Molly is going to the amusement park today! She is nervous because she has never been on a rollercoaster. Johnny tells Molly to ride the one that goes upside down first. On the rollercoaster, Molly is so scared that she gets sick. Molly puked all over Johnny!

The captain of the new steamship wanted to  test it out. He commanded the engine crew to go full steam. The ship sailed across the sea faster than anyone ever went. The captain then commanded a hard turning maneuver. The boat tilted hard but performed admirably throughout.

Joe was walking down the street and saw a homeless man. The homeless man begged him for money. Joe didn't give him money but felt bad he didn't help him. The next day Joe bought a ham and brought it to the homeless man. Joe no longer felt bad about the homeless man.

Luanne was going to meet the girls for brunch today. She was excited to finally get to seem them after about a year. The girls met at their favorite spot around the corner. The all ordered a large feast and loved it. The girls were so happy to see each other again.

Alice loved to drive her car through a certain tunnel in the road. She went out of her way to drive through it on her current trip. She drove very slow through it to make it last. When she got out she felt sad that it was over. Alice thought about the next time she could drive through.

Jim was sledding with his friend Anthony. Anthony dared him to go down the big hill. Jim took up the dare and as he was going he fell out of the sled. Jim rolled a few times as the unmanned sled flew into the river. Jim was ok, and the two of them went home for the day.

Sue was depressed because she was about to get evicted. She was unemployed and had to come up with a few hundred dollars. She asked her family and friends with no avail. Finally Sue had enough and decided to buy a lottery ticket. She won $500 which helped her from not getting evicted.

So my childhood was an endless game of catch followed by hand washing. I don't think there is anything better than clean hands after a catch.

Taylor was walking around the neighborhood. A large bulldog was resting near his dog house. Taylor was scared to walk past it. Therefore, he walked slowly around it. It woke up for an instant but went back to sleep afterwards.

As an adult, Irene remembered the pinecone and went to dig it up. But there, in front of her old home, was a ten-foot-tall pine tree!

My kitchen was filling up with trash. I picked up a bag to carry it to my trash can. I began to walk down my driveway with the bag. Suddenly, the bag ripped and trash fell everywhere. I cleaned up the spilled trash and put it in the trash can.

Today was Mary's sister's birthday. Mary had only realized this thanks to Facebook. Mary quickly set out to buy a card at the store. But they were out of birthday cards! Mary gave her a thank you card instead.

Harry wanted a suit. He had never bought a suit before. Harry decided to go shopping. He bought a slim-fitting charcoal suit. Finally, Harry had a suit!

Heather had been invited on a date. They had agreed to go to a movie. But she and her date had a hard time agreeing on a movie. Then they decided to flip a coin. They ended up seeing an action movie, and loving it!

Ken sighed and kicked his desk in frustration. He needed to get the special district transparency notice posted. He could feel the deadline tomorrow breathing down his neck. He asked his ISP if he could use the service he was paying for. He got the notice posted just in the nick of time.

Fred felt a sigh of relief and felt so much better after that. When Fred left the doctors, he went to town to get ice cream.

Brad loved to collect all kinds of balls. He had thousands of all sorts of balls imaginable. He was short on cash and decided to open a store. A week later, Brad's Balls was born! Brad has been selling his balls successfully for months now!

Unfortunately, the 4-wheeler ran out of gas half way home. Tom and Mary had to carry the tree all the way back.

Joey was about to leave the house. He realized that he did not have his phone. He looked under the couch, bed, and in the bathroom. The phone was not in any of those places! He found the phone in his jacket pocket!

3 point stance
We used to play football all the time. My friend Chris would always rush the quarterback. He would get into the three point stance. But as soon as he'd rush, I'd run the other way. It was one of my favorite parts of football.

My family woke up early to go to my grandma's house. We were going to her house to celebrate christmas. When we arrived, we had breakfast and talked. Afterwards, my siblings and I opened presents. We all got great gifts and it was an awesome day.

Matt wanted to go back in time. He went to the library to look up books about time travel. He read all the books he could find. Then he decided to create his own time machine. He never succeeded because time travel is probably impossible.

Tina wanted a raise. She decided it would be easier to commit return fraud at her work. She acquired the help of a co worker. They got away with this for some time. Eventually the two were caught and fired.

It was a hot day. So Kim put a frozen water bottle in her backpack. Later in the day, she felt a damp spot on the back pack. In class, she noticed that all of her papers became wet. Kim got in trouble because her homework was wet.

Ken needed to do many chores. He tried to do several at the same time to get done faster. He wound up messing some up and having to redo them. It actually took longer. Ken decided to concentrate on each individually instead.

Gina was in Illinois with her family. She decided she should visit her dad's mom. She had been dreading the visit for a week. She wasn't excited since she knew it would be boring. She decided to go because she knew it was the right thing to do.

Ryan told his parents he had packed enough clothes for the entire trip. Turns out there was a pool at their hotel but he didn't have trunks. Ryan regretted missing out on swimming for the vacation.

Frank is working on an ad blocking extension for Chrome. Development has been pretty tough lately. He had to work for days to get around tricks used by advertisers. Frank's extension is coming along nicely, though. It's the best ad blocker I've ever used.

Chuck was known as the family bum. Portia thought Chuck wouldn't see her graduation or give her a gift. But, on graduation day, Chuck drove to Portia's ceremony. He gave Portia an envelope with three hundred dollars in it. Next, Chuck reminded Portia the he graduated college too.

Bill broke his phone. He didn't have money to get it fixed. He put flyers in all the mailboxes on his street. He would mow any size lawn for $25. He made enough to get his phone fixed in just one weekend.

A snowflake drifted from the sky to the ground. Carl saw this happen from a window while inside. He went outside to collect it. That flake was nowhere to be found. Carl waited for the next flake to arrive.

Ted took his wife for a romantic horse ride on the beach. The two walked their horses for a while and then stopped to talk. They set their horses up to a tree and sat down. As soon as they walked away, the horses got away and ran far. Ted looked at their restraints and saw that they were loose.

Deep-fried
Stacy was excited to be going to the state fair. She planned her day to take in every attraction. Then, Stacy smelled the aroma of deep-fried goodies. She stopped at each vendor to sample the wares. Two hours later, Stacy was back at the car with a belly ache.

52 Pick Up
Gina was always trying to get her big brother to play with her. One day he was shuffling some cards. He asked her if she wanted to play 52 pick up. She didn't know what it was but it sounded fun. Until the cards were all over the floor for her to pick up!

Birthday Party
Melanie was turning 16. Her family decided to throw her a sweet sixteen party. They kept the entire party a surprise. They invited all of her friends and got her a bunch of gifts. Melanie was shocked and super happy when she found out.

Dogs
Billy got a new dog for his birthday. The dog was big and gray. Billy would take the dog to the park everyday. Billy wouldn't use a leash. Billy lost the dog in two weeks.

Kelly's bad horse
Kelly had been racing horses for Years now. She was a pro at it. Every year she would go to the hamptons and race. Last weekend was the competition and her horse started stalling. Kelly ended up losing and was disappointed.

Sick Kid
Alex vomited on the couch. Alex felt weak and couldn't walk. Dad picked him up and put him in the bath. Dad tucked Alex in and gave him Pepto Bismol. Alex apologized for a making such a big mess.

Cade Runs Away
Cade was very mad at his mother. He decided it was best to run away. He gathered up some toys and headed for the door. His mother called from the kitchen and said she had cookies. So Cade decided he would run away tomorrow.

Jordan was on a hike with her family. She had gained a huge lead before them. By the end of the hike, they were way behind her. She had to sit and wait for them, which was boring. Luckily, they showed up not too long later.

Frank's birthday was coming up. He wanted to throw a party. He was afraid no one would show up. He nervously passed out invites. Many people came and they had fun!

Sledding
My mom used to go sledding by her parent's cottage. They would bring the sled up these giant sand dunes that were frozen. They would slide down them, but one time they had the unexpected. They went too fast and went all the way down to the water. The lake wasn't completely frozen so they got soaking wet.

Fake
Brad found a gold ring on the ground. He took it to a pawn shop. He was so eager to get money for it! But the shop owner frowned and said the ring wasn't real gold. Brad was so disappointed!

Joan's son ran in the house saying a squirrel had bitten him. Worried, Joan called the doctor. The doctor said she should catch the squirrel, which could be rabid. Joan chased the squirrel around the yard and up a tree. When she fell, she ended up at the doctor without the squirrel.

Gina hated being crammed in a room with 2 other girls. She was always looking for some place she could be alone. In the summer she could sit in the garage. She would leave the door open and let the natural light stream in. It was her very own private oasis.

Jim wanted to go on a trivia game show to win money. He studied from the encyclopedia for weeks. Jim went to an audition to take a test. He got every question but one correct. The producer told him he was going to be on the show.

Marc owns a crossfit gym. His gym helps him hold himself accountable. He loves helping people meet their fitness goals. He works very hard. Marc loves being a crossfit gym owner.

Billy and mandy decided to go to the woods. It was exactly midnight and they were scared. They heard a sound coming from a bush. They shined their flashlight at the bush. They sighed in relief as it was just a bunny passing through the bush.

letters

After a snowstorm, Jim had to shovel his walkway. Jim forgot to put on his glasses so he couldn't see well. Soon after Jim started shoveling, he stepped on a brand and slipped. Jim fell backwards and broke his back. Now Jim has to recover and is out of work for 6 months.

walk
Meg wanted to go for a walk. She asked her boyfriend to come with her. He agreed and they set off. Holding hands, they walked their neighborhood together. They walked for over an hour!

The long drive
Morgan obtained a lease one day. He only had a limited amount of miles. His parents told him not to drive too far. Morgan drove very far every day. He had to pay a lot of money for every miles to his dealer in the end.

No Water
Jim and Bob went hiking. Jim expected Bob to bring water bottles. But Bob forget them. When they decided to take a break, they realized they had no water. Jim and Bob were forced to turn around after hours of hiking.

Lita's To-do List
Lita was mad that her husband stayed up late playing games. She started yelling at him for things that didn't get done. Her husband told her he didn't realize there was stuff to be done. Lita sat down to make a To-do list for him. She pointed at the list any time he was planning to stay up late.

Makeshift
When Stan got to work he realized that he forgot to wear a belt. His pants were noticeably lower than they should be. Stan went to the supply closet and got a roll of twine. He tied the twine around his waist to act like a belt. Stan felt low class but he was glad that his pants were up.

An accident
John is an avid snowboarder. During a run down a mountain, he hit some rough snow and tumbled. Because of the fall, John broke his arm in three places! It took a long while for John to heal, but he was optimistic. Now fully healed, John is still doing what he loves.

I collect old press photos. These were taken by newspaper photographers. They were reproduced for newspapers. I collect mostly photos of Chinatowns. Friends tell me this is an interesting hobby.

Tina was hungry and driving home from work. She passed by a strip mall with a few restaurants. She only wanted to go the sushi restaurant. But she knew it was expensive. She decided to eat there but felt guilty.

Kelly and her friends decided to go to the candy store. The candy store was brand new. The girls got there early to get some good deals. They filled their buckets with everything. When they left they were happy.

Milly's class was visiting a real working farm. They had been promised a tractor ride while they were there. They were all very excited about it. Milly was in the first group to ride on the tractor. It was much louder and bouncier than she expected.

Breaking Dishes
I noticed my kitchen was getting dirty. I decided to clean it and put on gloves. I turned on the sink water and began to scrub the dishes. While putting dishes in the dishwasher, I dropped a plate. The plate broke into little pieces, and then I cleaned the mess.

Candy Bag
As a kid we didn't go trick or treating. We would visit my grandma and she would load us up with candy. There would be so much candy that I could never eat all of it. Now that I am an adult she no longer passes out candy bags. Every year I go out and buy a bunch of candy for myself.

Lisa's middle school class offered a home ec class. Students would learn to sew and cook in it. For the first time ever a boy signed up to take the class. All the girls thought he would do terrible. However, he was the best baker out of all of them.

Kara was grilling several chicken breasts. She left the grill to put on sunscreen. When she returned, the chicken was burned. It ended up turning into hard pieces. She immediately took it out of the grill, but threw it away.

Sam heard a rustling sound in the cupboard. She assumed the mouse had returned. She set out a trap with a dab of peanut butter and waited. Sam heard a loud snap. She tossed the dead mouse into the trash.

Rufus had always had trouble meeting new people. His sister recommended he take an archery class to meet people. At the archery class, Rufus met two new friends. They all went to get a beer after the class. From that day forward, Rufus never had trouble meeting new friends.

Rick was picking on a classmate during school. He did it all the time. But the person he was picking on didn't want to take it anymore. So he turned around and slapped Rick right in the face. Rick had never been assaulted by a woman before!

Tyler wanted to go to space. He applied for a job at NASA. During his training, he got very bad motion sickness. Tyler realized his dreams would never be realized. Luckily he was able to keep a good job with NASA anyway.

Mommy put the baby in the high chair. She gave the baby a banana. The baby mashed up the banana. The baby put the mashed banana in her mouth. Mommy wiped the baby's mouth.

Kelly was decorating her Christmas tree. She was trying to put up lights but a lot of them burnt out. She had to detangle some old strings. Then, she checked which ones even worked anymore. Luckily, she managed to find enough to light her tree well.

Jon loved to spend every summer at the beach with his grandparents. This summer was special in that he was able to take surfing lessons. On his first trip out on the water, his instructor spotted a shark. Quickly, they ran out of the water, but not before the shark attacked. It took a bite out of the surfboard, but noone was hurt.

Josh broke up with Hayley years ago. He wonders if it's a mistake. He tries to call her and get back with her. All he gets is the dial tone. He figures she's happy with someone else.

An American man went on a family vacation in Mexico. It was his first time to leave the country. He was enamored by the vibrant and unique cultures. He deeply appreciated the unique ways of life and value systems. He decided to travel the world shortly after this experience.

Trish climbed the flimsy pull-down attic stairs. Laughing in relief, she closed the attic window and secured the chain.

Janet always wanted to go on a cruise. She wanted to see icebergs and play on a big boat. She saved up all her money and finally went alone. The boat had a hull malfunction and sank. She survived but is now afraid of water.

Getting a license
Teddy just turned 16 and was excited. Turning 16 meant that Teddy could take his driving test. he could hardly believe and took the test on the day of his birthday. He passed on the very first try! He was overjoyed and got his license.

Eva had always had curly hair, and she hated it. She had always put so much effort into straightening it. Then one night she just didn't have the energy to battle her curls. In the morning, she feared her classmates would mock her wild hair. But to her surprise, she received dozens of envious compliments!

The stage was set and the lights were lowered. A single spotlight shone on the wooden dance floor. The dancers emerged out onto the floor looking beautiful. The music began, it was a tango. They moved with such grace, they were sure to win the competition.

Yolanda really wanted a new logic puzzle. Thankfully she got a whole set for her birthday. When she opened them up she started right away. She ended up beating them within a week. Yolanda was then off to get more.

Ann's Snowman
Ann loved to build snowmen. She went outside in the snow. Than she began to roll it in balls. Soon she had a big Snowman. Ann had the coolest snowman on the block.

Ryan and the Cat
Ryan loved to play with cats. His favorite cat to play with was named Bonkers. Bonkers was trying to get away from Ryan because he was tired. Ryan wouldn't leave Bonkers alone so Bonkers attacked Ryan. Ryan learned not to annoy cats anymore.

Beach Wedding
We decided to get married on the beach. Our family and friends met us there. It was a perfectly sunny summer day. Best of all, no one had to wear shoes! We ended our day with a dip in the cool ocean.

Andrea and Kylie were in class. Andrea was attempting to pass a note to Kylie. Suddenly, their teacher spotted them. She made Andrea read the note in front of everyone. Andrea was mortified.

The minister yelled at the driver to be more careful. The driver didn't see him and thought god was yelling at him.

Jon got a job. He had to drive a delivery van. One day, he had to drive it for five hours. He got very tired and crashed the car. He was fired for incompetence.

Dave wanted to spend some time with some family He decided it would be a good idea to get tickets to a hockey game He got 4 tickets to see the phantoms play and invited some family His nephew, his brother, his niece, and his sister all came along They watched the home team sadly lose, but had a great time

Annie realized one day that her house was in disarray. She could barely see her own floor under all the junk she kept around. Deciding to take action, Annie posted flyers for a yard sale. That day, the entire neighborhood showed up and bought everything. Annie ended up with a clean house and made her rent that day.

Ian was taking a walk in the park last Thursday. He saw two squirrels chasing each other. For some reason, he decided to scare them away. He had no idea what happened afterwards. But for some strange reason, he felt guilty about it.

Tom had pain in his eye. He called the eye doctor. He set up an appointment. He saw the eye doctor. He felt better after seeing the eye doctor.

Tina envied her friends who had shelves full of trophies. She asked her mom to enter her in a pageant. Tina's mom told her not to get her hopes up. They found a secondhand pageant dress and went to the event. The steep entrance fee ensured every girl got a trophy, even Tina.

The Bluff
A man walked down the street and stopped to take out his phone. Suddenly a robber appeared and demanded the phone. The man asked the robber what would happened if he didn't comply. Without saying anything, the robber brandished a gun. The man thought he was bluffing so he ran away.

Coffee
On a golf trip we stopped to get a morning coffee. My brother told me to get a cream and sugar. It was so delicious, I was amazed. But then I realized it was because there was so much cream and sugar. It was so good, but I'm not sure I'll get it again.

Wanda and her husband were big fans of the local teams. When her husband retired, they were able to go to every game. Then Wanda's husband became disabled. Wanda couldn't navigate his wheelchair on the bleachers. Then the town put a ramp in and gave them season tickets.

Rita had to travel to NYC. She ran to get her flight. Unfortunately she missed her flight. Rita was mad. She had to get another flight.

I took the dog for a walk to the lake. She was easily distracted by everything we walked past. By the time we got to the lake, she was worn out. I was a bit worn out as well. I ended up having to call my husband to pick us up and take us home.

Theodore had been thinking about using his froggy potty for while now. He slowly sat down on it. Should he wait to see what happened? He got up to look. He peed in the potty for the first time!

Oliver had just brought a pumpkin. He was trying to carry it to his car. Suddenly, his hands slipped. The pumpkin fell and was smashed open. Oliver had to go back inside to buy a new pumpkin.

Lazy Cat
Sam wanted to get his cat in better shape. He changed its diet. He also wanted it to work out more. Sam tried several different techniques but the cat wouldn't do it. Eventually Sam gave up and stuck to just the diet.

Tara Gets Sunburned
It was an extremely hot day outside. Tara was on a run in the park. The sun scorched her entire body as she ran. She had forgotten to put on sunscreen. Tara had really bad sunburns by the end of her run.

Rainy days
Richard had a dream. His dream was to go to Japan. He also wanted to experience a rainy day in Japan. He eventually saved up so much money so he could go. Unfortunately in the end, it never rained.

A day at the beach
The Jones family went to the beach. They put up their tent shelter because the sun was hot. The wind started to blow. The wind picked up their tent shelter and blew it down the beach. The tent legs were broken and the Jones had no more shade.

Burned cookies
I decided to make cookies and found a recipe. I prepared the ingredients in the kitchen. I put the cookie dough on a sheet in the oven. After a while, I noticed an odd smell. I ran to the kitchen to see that my cookies had burned.

Photo finish
John needed a new camera. He was unsure which camera would be right for him. He was about to go the local photography store for advice. He noticed that someone left a used camera near the dumpster. It worked perfectly and John felt incredibly happy.

Grandma is Sick
When grandma comes to visit everyone is excited. But excitement turns to concern when she arrives. She is having a hard time remembering simple things. She reveals that she has been diagnosed with early onset alzheimer's. The family convinces her to sell her home and live with them.

New Halloween costume
Lily wanted a new Halloween costume. She didn't want to get one at the store. Therefore she decided to make one herself. She got everything together. She ended up making a rabbit costume.

Sleep
Three year old Laura didn't want to go to bed. She asked her mother to read a bedtime story. This always helps her to fall asleep. Laura fell asleep before her mother got to finish the story. Laura slept all night.

Jason's Goes Fishing
Jason's family went fishing for the afternoon. They didn't get a bite for several hours. Finally, Jason got a large fish on his line. After a long battle, Jason pulled the fish into the boat! Jason's family enjoyed eating his catch!

Broken leg
Last week I fell down the stairs. I ended up breaking my leg. I was rushed to the hospital to get checked. They gave me crutches. It will be awhile before I get better.

The Fire
I made a fire outside last night. It started off big and bright as I put in more wood. Soon I began to run out of wood. The fire was not as hot as it used to be. Without any wood the fire died down to nothing.

That's Life
He really hated his job. He knew he could just walk right out and never return. He could deal with the consequences. He pushed the crazy idea out of his mind. He sighed and continued with his work.

Phones
Karen loved to talk on the phone. Her kids were really annoyed by it. They decided to hide her phone. She was so angry. Karen grounded her kids.

Jack and Maureen have been dating for a few Year's. Jack has said that he feels too young to get married. However, Jack's mother pressures him to marry Maureen. Finally he buys a ring and asks for her hand in marriage. Jack feels nervous to be getting married.

Sue wanted a new phone. She did not have enough money. She decided to take on an extra job. She finally saved up enough. Sue was able to upgrade her phone.

Stephen had to get dinner started for the family. He asked the family what they wanted but nobody agreed on anything. He tried to make suggestions, but everyone just argued. So he packed everyone in the car and went to a buffet. Everyone was happy with this since they could choose what they want.

Kimmi was fifteen and needed a bra. She was embarrassed, but she pulled her mom aside one night. She asked her mom to take her bra shopping. Kimmi's mom took her to a lingerie store. There, Kimmi selected a few pretty bra and panty sets.

Married
Kate's mom and her boyfriend go on a trip to Hawaii. Once there, Kate's mom calls her. She informs Kate that she and her boyfriend are getting married. Kate is not convinced this is a good idea. A few Years later, her mom divorces him.

Candy
I have been eating candy ever since my last pay check. Every time I get paid I buy four candy bars. My teeth started to hurt. I went to the dentist. The dentist told me to quit eating candy and to brush more often.

Barry was preparing to take the SAT's. Barry studied very hard for the test, and felt he would do well. The day of the test, Barry choked! Barry could not seem to remember most of what he studied. Barry knew he did not do well, and he was not proud of himself.

Kris wanted to be a good husband. He noticed a grocery list on the counter and decided to go shopping. He got everything on the list and proudly returned. Once back he noticed they had a lot of that stuff already. He finally noticed the list was for last week.

Alaina was trying to take a photo while she jumped. She tried several times but none were coming out. They just kept coming out blurry. Finally, she got an idea. She recorded a video of her jumping and then made a screenshot.

Jill threw her Frisbee towards Grant. He didn't catch it and the Frisbee went downhill. It ended up landing in the forest. They decided to go search for it. Since it ended up lost, they gave up after a few minutes.

Sam was tired from work. His friends invited him to go out. He wanted to have fun. Instead he turned down the offer. He figured it would be fun to watch tv and fall asleep.

Harry didn't want to go to class because an oral report was due. In the classroom, the teacher called Harry to give his report. Harry stood at the podium and mumbled the words on his notes. His classmates started to snicker. Harry crumpled his paper and ran out the door of the class.

Phil's family wanted to take a trip to the beach. Phil was not a big fan of the beach. In order to make his family happy, he agreed to the trip. The beach had soft sand and it was a lovely day. Phil grudgingly admitted that he had a very nice day.

Tia was staying late at work. It took her a long time to get caught up on her work. By the time she left, the parking lot was empty. It was scary and poorly lit. Tia had to ask the security guard to walk her to her car.

I put the bucket in my car and drive it to a nearby pond. When the eggs hatch the tadpoles will be in their new pond home.

Rita and Katie heard a noise coming from an abandoned house. They approached the house to find the source of the noise. Only Rita was brave enough to go inside of the house. After a minute, she ran outside of the house quickly. It was a skunk making the noise!

Jenny pushed the stroller up the stairs while watching the apes. The stroller hit a bump in the stairs. The baby in the stroller proceeded to fall out of the bottom. The baby was passed seamlessly between 3 people. The baby settled in Chad's lap at the bottom of the stairs.

Bobby loved going to the zoo. He was able to go this last Saturday. There he saw all his favorite animals. The monkeys were his absolute favorite. He spent the most time looking at them.

His cornfields had all lain fallow for over half a decade. But the rest had made them fertile, and that year his corn grew tall!

Kim's boyfriend was in the navy. He was out once and never returned. Kim tried to get information on what happened. Nobody ever found out. She eventually moved on.

Aquarium
Mark was 8 and really wanted a pet. He begged his mom for a dog but she agreed to get him a fish. Mark washed out a bowl and got a book on fish care at the library. Unfortunately the pet store was all out of fish! Mark's mother got him a hamster instead and he was just as happy!

The Coat
The coat was old and smelly but he loved it. He could wash it more often but it would get smelly again. He worked at a smelly place so he couldn't help it. In fact, he sort of liked the smell. The smell was like memories to him.

Glasses
Nic's classmates teased him about his thick glasses. Nic hated the mocking. He decided to go to the eye doctor and get contacts. He wore them to school, and everyone gaped. Now that his thick glasses were gone, no one picked on Nic!

One Hour
John asked his kids to give him one hour. Just one hour is all John needed to finish his football game. The kids were impatient to go to the zoo. After the game, John drove his kids to the zoo. The kids thought the zoo was not so great at the end of the day.

Fancy Dinner
Bert saved up to have a fancy dinner with his partner. It took Bert almost a month, due to his meager earnings. Bert and his partner decided to go to a nice steakhouse. It was alright, but Bert felt that it was overpriced. Bert resolved to get better value for money in the future.

The Big Snake
One summer, I decided to take my children swimming in the creek. We loaded up the car and headed for the water. While they were swimming, the boys saw a big snake in the water. I tried to scare it away by throwing a rock, but it didn't work. We left the creek because we were afraid.

Poker Chips
Kim's mother bought her a poker set for Christmas. But she didn't really know how to play. The instructions didn't make much sense. So they made up their own rules for the game. They played with the set for hours.

Meetups
A man was working long hours in his job. He desired more social interaction outside of work. He went out of his way to put himself out there and meet new people. He attended local in person meetups for his hobbies. He met many like minded people and made new friends.

The sleepover
Madelynn wanted to go to her friends house for a sleepover. Her mother said she could go and be with her friends. She went to her friends house and they were glad she was there. All of the girls put on makeup and played dress up all day and night. Madelynn had a lot of fun and wanted to go back again.

Playing the Drums
Andrew has always wanted to learn how to play the drums. He bought a set today to motivate him to learn how to play. He struggled at first and decided to sign up for lessons. He took lessons for a year and practiced in his spare time. A year later he is now a great drummer in a band.

Summer Camp
Matt loved summer camp. He went every single year and had a great time. Eventually he got too old to go to summer camp. He was sad because he would miss it. He was able to become a camp counselor and continue going forever.

The Gummy Worms
One saturday, John was playing outside when his dad pulled up. John was excited to see his dad. He was even more excited when he saw him hold up a bag of gummy worms. John sat down on the porch to eat his gummy worms. He even shared a few with his dad!

Ride Along
My kids like to ride on trains. We went to San Francisco to ride a few. We visited many famous places by train. We tried to ride every single route. In three days, we accomplished our goal.

Learning to Ride
Marnie decided to help her young son Frank learn to ride a bike. She bought him a bike with training wheels. After a few days of riding, Marnie kept raising the wheels a little. Frank didn't realize the wheels kept getting higher. Frank was riding without training wheels altogether in only 8 days.

I was getting out of shape. I went to see a doctor. The doctor told me to go for a jog more often. Every day, I jogged as long as I could. After a few weeks, I started to feel much better.

The first car.
Casey was about to turn sixteen. He was pretty sure that his parents were giving him a car. He was expecting them to give him the old family car. On his birthday, he saw that it was a brand new, nice car. He was so surprised and excited.

It was late at night and Jim was getting tired. He had a long and frustrating day at work. He had to work tomorrow but did not want to go to bed. He wanted to some enjoyment today, even if only for a little while. So, he sat down on the couch and picked up his favorite book.

Puppy Dog
Some dog kept me awake till I could not take it anymore. Fed up, I finally got up and looked outside for it. The dog turned out to be a scruffy, skinny, little pup. I went into the kitchen and got the pup some food. I gave the puppy the food and I went back to bed, both of us happy.

Ted was walking on an icy sidewalk. He was wearing the wrong kind of shoes. He would slip and try to catch himself on the ice. It took him 50 minutes to walk 50 feet. Ted never leaves home without his snow boots now.

Mistake
My friend reminded me about the assignment that's due tomorrow. I didn't do any homework today and decided to get some rest. On the next day, I started the assignment. When I finished, I tried to turn it in online. The notice says that the submission deadline was yesterday, not today.

I bought a backup drive for my wife's iPhone, using Amazon. We did not like it and returned it via a UPS call tag. We were told the package was considered missing. I complained to Amazon, which promptly refunded me. I thanked Amazon for their great customer service.

Late
Gina had been late getting to the principal's office. In return he had kept her waiting for 30 minutes. She apologized for her selfishness. But it didn't matter. Gina was given 4 days of lunch detention for her actions.

One night, Bob went out on a drive in the country to think about life. Suddenly, he saw three bright lights fly through the sky. He was not sure what the lights were, and drove home quickly. As he got home and turned on the TV, the news was on. The reporter said a meteor shower had occurred, so he was let down.

Kira has to go to the laundromat with her dad to do laundry. She brings along her favorite stuffed animal to play with. She helps her dad load the washing machine. Her stuffed animal goes missing! Kira cries when they can't find her stuffed animal!

Sue decided she needed to get in shape before the summer. She began running every morning. She also began eating better. Sue started seeing a difference. She was ready to sport her bikini body.

Amy and Beth were ready to start the 7th grade. They were over the summer and ready for school to start. They decided since they were adults to get their ears pierced. Amy's mother forbade it. Amy was so upset she didn't speak to her mom for a week.

Eva poured herself a bowl of cereal. She went to get milk. They were out of regular milk! Only soy milk was left. Eva tried it and liked it.

Kay wanted to hold a lemonade sale. She made a stand, but she wasn't sure how to make lemonade. She squeezed lemons and stirred in sugar. Then, hopefully, she opened the stand for business. Within one hour she had sold every drop of her tasty lemonade!

Trashy Tale
Dan set his trash on the curb to be picked up. The wind blew his can into the middle of the street. A pregnant woman with a child in the back seat swerved to miss it. She crashed into an electric pole and died. Dan was charged with involuntary manslaughter for his negligence.

Natasha wanted become a news anchor. She would study the local news and practice daily. Natasha went to college to pursue her dreams. When she graduated she applied for a job at her hometown news station. Natasha was thrilled when she landed her dream job.

Ann was ecstatic to find she won special concert tickets. She learned she was going to go backstage after. She was so excited since it was her favorite singer. Ann finally got to meet the singer and he was very rude. Ann was disappointed since she would never think he was like that.

I was doing a long run yesterday with my iPhone. As I was running my phone slipped out of my pocket. As it slipped it fell straight to the ground. I was shocked when I looked at the cracks. I sighed relief when I realized it can be fixed.

A year later Ally got a job offer from where her boyfriend lived. She broke the news to him that she was going to be moving.

Kim was afraid of swimming. She couldn't go underwater without holding her nose. Kim decided to take swimming lessons to conquer her fear. It took several weeks, but she finally grew confident. Kim loved conquering her fear.

Bike Lesson
Mikayla did not know how to ride a bike. Her dad took her to the park to teach her. She put on her helmet and pedaled while her Dad held onto the back. He let go when she got comfortable. She pedaled around the track by herself.

Learning Spanish
I signed up for freshman Spanish. I found it very difficult to learn the different nouns. I had trouble learning how to put together sentences. I studied as hard as I possibly could. I ended up passing freshman Spanish.

Dan Rides a Motorcycle
Dan had always wanted to ride a motorcycle. However, he had never taken lessons. One year on a trip to Vietnam, he rented a motorcycle. Riding the motorcycle was one of the most fun things he had ever done. When he got home, And decided to take motorcycle lessons.

Fast Food
Darrel was waiting in the drive through for half an hour. He had about lost his patience. When he finally got to the window he was about to scream at them. They immediately apologized before he could. They had an accident and offered free food to make it up to him.

Hide and Seek
Eli and Baylee decided to play hide and seek one night. Baylee thought it would be funny to hide in the washer. Eli searched everywhere but couldn't find her. Baylee had fallen asleep and didn't hear Eli calling. Eli woke his parents, who eventually found Baylee in the washer.

Snow day
Katie was playing outside one day. She saw a snowflake fall from the sky. Soon there were lots of snowflake all around her. Katie caught some snowflakes on her tongue. She played in the falling snow until dinnertime.

Ernie's Lesson
Ernie's mother always told him never to run with scissors. He ignored her advice and did it anyway. He fell on the scissors. He cut his arm badly. Ernie will never run with scissors again.

A Short Road Trip
My best friend, Sam, and I decided to take a drive to Gatlinburg. We were both excited as the we began the trip. But, after only two miles, we heard a loud pop from the engine. We were forced to stop the car and had to call for a wrecker. It was the shortest road trip we ever took.

Companion Physical
Mom invited Dad to drive her to the doctor. Dad turned and left without responding. Mom invited her best friend to travel with her. They had drinks, enjoying the evening. The doctor appointment was missed.

Fighting
Me and Marcy do not agree on anything. So Marcy storms out of the house to go to her friends. I stay at the house and have friends over. Marcy calls me crying to say she is sorry. But i have moved on and am now in a relationship with someone else.

Stripper
Paulette took a semester off college. She laid in front of the tv all day watching MTV. Her mother told her to not be lazy and get a job. Paulette got a job being a stripper. Her mother cried regretting she told her to get a job.

The Long Hug
Tom was set to go away for the first time in his life. He had packed his suitcase to go study abroad in London. Tom's parent were in tears as they hugged Tom. Tom stood there, also teary eyed, hugging his parents. Finally, Tom left to go catch a flight at the airport.

Pink Car
Sarah got a car for her birthday. But she was upset that it wasn't pink. So she decided to get it painted hot pink. Her car gave her lots of attention. So she was happy about her decision.

Food in teeth.
Pam was with her friends at lunch. They were all chatting and having fun. Some of the group left to get snacks. Then, Pam's friend let her know she had food in her teeth. Pam was so embarrassed and she went to clean her teeth.

Winning Touchdown
Devin was a star quarterback in high-school. At the big game he was set to stand out. He played great the whole night. He even ran for the game winning touchdown after a fumble. He still remembers those days fondly.

Repair
Beth was sad that Jake didn't agree to go to a dance with her. Later that day Jake approached her and apologized. He hadn't meant to laugh at her. He agreed to go to the dance with her. Beth excitedly called her friend Amy to tell her the good news.

Prison
Jon had an argument with his dad. In a state of rage, he murdered his dad. He tried to run away but the police caught him. He pleaded guilty. He was sentenced to prison for life.

Surprise!
Kate wanted to throw her mom a surprise party. Planning was going well. But then Kate invited her little brother. He told her mom about the party! Kate was so angry, she wanted to smack him.

Mary had to go to the hospital during the first day of her internship. She was introduced to some of the hospital staff and places. When she went on the 4th floor she saw her new office. It included a computer and several tools. Her instructor gave her an assignment to complete.

Lost Girl
Becca loved to go to the mall with her mom. At the store she would often get distracted by the things they passed. As they walked, Becca saw a pretty necklace and stopped to look at it. When she looked up, her mom was gone! Luckily, a nice woman found her crying and helped her find her mom.

The Wedding
The day of Fiona's wedding had finally come. She could not contain her excitement. All her bridesmaids helped her into her dress. She was ready to walk down the aisle! Everyone in the church were stunned by her beauty.

Please Mom
Amy wanted her mom to take her to the big mall. Her mother hated going to the mall because it was far away. She finally convinced her mother to take her. Amy had to shop quickly since her mom was irritated. She found an outfit she liked, but had no time to look for shoes.

Glasses
Connie started to get headaches in school. Her mom was very worried. She took Connie to the doctor. The doctor reassured them that Connie just needed glasses. Connie was glad that nothing was seriously wrong.

The Career Chance
New people moved into the house across the street from Charles. He never would have guessed it would lead to a new career. One day Charles took pictures from the house across the street. The owner came outside and gave Charles a manual for shooting video. Charles read it and the homeowner gave Charles a job on a film crew.

It was no secret that the managers at Jim's company favored golfers. Golfers were often invited to play on the weekend with the managers. These individuals seemed to get all the perks and promotions. Jim decided to take lessons at the country club. Within a year, he was golfing with his boss and up for a promotion.

Weight Loss Success
Tim decided that he needed to lose weight. He figured the best way was to eat healthy and get exercise. Instead of driving his car to work, he walked. Instead of eating high calorie snacks, he ate fruit. By the end of the month, Tim had lost five pounds.

Caroline
Andy was dating Caroline and things were going well. One day Andy asked her to go the fair with him. Caroline agreed and they had a great time at the fair. Caroline noticed she was falling in love with Andy and so was he/ They married after a month.

Fred decided to take his date to ping pong. He thought Rita would like it. It turns out she did. The two raced off. Fred ended up winning.

Sam had been watching his teammates play from the sidelines. It had been like this all game season. His coach finally decided to put Sam in the game one night. Sam was so excited that he ran past the other team with the ball. He ended up scoring a touchdown!

Don decided to take an afternoon nap. He didn't set an alarm. By the time he woke up it was already night. He decided to stay in bed. And just slept all the way until the next morning

Airplane Ride
Lilly went on her first airplane ride today. She got to see the cockpit. The pilots said hello to her. Lilly looked out the windows at the land below. She smiled and laughed in excitement at how high they were.
