Kelly really wanted to be editor in chief of her paper. She tried really hard to get that position. She spent countless nights at the paper perfecting everything. Finally she ended up getting the position. Kelly couldn't be more happier.

Trip to Walmart
Rosie needed groceries one day. She decided to take a trip to Walmart. Rosie stocked up on all of the essentials. She even was able to get a few extras. Rosie had a successful trip to Walmart.

Catch Me if You Can
There once was a fast little rat inside of a house. The rat annoyed the family, as it chewed up wires in the home. The family soon decided to get a large cat. The cat soon found the rat hiding in his spot. Now, the rat who was once fast, is no longer allowed to roam.

Spanish Mountain Adventure
Last weekend I visited Asturias in Northern Spain. I wanted to go see this old village up in the mountains. There is no road to the village so I had to hike there. It was a long, difficult climb to the top. Although it was hard, it was a beautiful trip.

Instant Cape
Sam was pretending to be a superhero in his house. He put a bag on his head and pretended it was a mask. He looked around for a suitable cape. He reached into a laundry hamper for a towel. He tied it around his neck and it was a cape.

The Right Fit
Jack and Sue rode from Texas to Florida with six children. They arrived at the hotel. The noise of the car ride motivated them to hire a nanny for 2 hours. The nanny took the children to the soda shop. The children each consumed a lemonade, glad to be out of the car.

Susie didn't need to hold her mother's hand in the store anymore. Carefully, she eased her small hand out of her mother's grip. She smiled to herself sure that her mom would see how grown up she is. But she didn't see her mom and was getting very scared. Before she could cry her mom picked her up and told her don't let go.

Late to the Party
Elena decided to visit her aunt's house before going to the party. She eventually arrived there around the night time. When she came into the house, she noticed that everyone was leaving. Drew carried the cake to his car so she didn't get a peace. The birthday girl looked at her with a frown before she left.

Chuck E Cheese
Simon remembered having fun at Chuck E Cheese's we he was younger. He asked his parents to take him there. One Saturday, his parents decided to take him as a special treat. It wasn't as impressive as he had remembered. Now Simon asks to be taken to Dave and Busters instead.

First one to Lose
My first cross-country run took place today. After the flag was waved, everyone started to run. There were fast runners however, I managed to take the lead. We were on our 4th lap and was heading to the finish line. However, I caught a cramp and ended up in 2nd place.

Barking Dog
I took my dog for a walk in the woods. At the creek, he began to bark at a figure in the distance. Upon inspection, I realized it was a dead body. I called the police. They awarded my dog with a medal of gratitude!

The Smiths got a new juicer. They excitedly unboxed it and set it up in their kitchen. The Smiths put in all sorts of fresh fruit. They giggled as it swirled and blended together. Together, the family enjoyed their freshly juiced beverages.

My friends found out about an end of the year party at the beach. We decided to call a taxi to take us there. However, we didn't come across anyone when we arrived. I asked Dan if he's positive that this is the right place. He eventually realized that we moved towards the opposite direction.

Tim's class was supposed to sell candy for a fundraiser. Tim's stomach grumbled when the teacher handed out the candy. On the bus ride home, Tim ate most of the candy intended for sale. When the money was due, Tim was frantic. He told the teacher his candy money was robbed.

Aya was studying Japanese. She excelled in her class. But she thought the best way to learn more was to visit Japan. She signed up to be an exchange student in Tokyo. There, Aya learned lots and lots more Japanese!

Fishing
Bob likes to go fishing for catfish on the lake banks. One night after a storm, he went fishing alone. A huge fish got on the line! Bob fought with it for over an hour. That fish was the biggest fish he ever caught!

Dana's art teacher asked the class to draw their families. Dana drew her mom with ugly hair and made her dad an ogre. The teacher collected the drawings and put them on the walls. When Dana's parents came to open house, they looked for her drawing. Dana pointed to a drawing made by another student.

Sinbad made pasta for dinner. He wanted to make garlic bread to go with it. He was out of garlic. He drove to the store to get some. Sinbad came back home and made garlic bread.

One day, my family's dog ran away. We were all so sad that we would never see our dog again. We put up flyers to try and find her. Later in the week, we received a phone call that someone found her! Thankfully, our dog was safely returned home.

Jan checked into a hotel after a long business workshop. She was impressed by the room's decor and amenities. Jan set the coffee machine to make a pot in the morning. She woke to the tantalizing smell of coffee. Then Jan saw the pot empty by the maker and coffee pooling around it.

Joe was almost at the top of the rock face when a storm came in. Forced to stay below the summit he braced himself in his tent. Just when he was about to get blown off, a rope fell down. A fellow climber offered him help to climb up. He made it the rest of the way as his tent fell all the way down.

Michael wanted to get into a good college. He studied hard and participated in lots of school activities. He applied to the college he wanted to attend, and he was accepted. Michael was so excited! He was very proud of his accomplishment.

The Smith family likes going on adventures. They decided to go for a hike. They picked out the perfect trail. They didn't realize how long the trail was. By the time they got back to their vehicle they was so tired.

Samantha had a new gym teacher today. Her gym teacher was sick today and had to stay at home. She was replaced by a substitute teacher. The substitute teacher made Samantha run laps in the gym. Samantha was furious and complained to her gym teacher the next day.

Options
Gina's car wouldn't go up an icy hill. And now cars behind her stopped her from backing up. She quickly weighed her options. It seemed she would have to get out and ask the cars to back up. Either that or put kitty litter under her tires and pray for traction.

He Was a She
As I walked down the sidewalk I noticed a nice dog sitting there. As I walked on past him, he followed me with his eyes. I couldn't help but stop, then walk back to him. He looked at me with soulful, pleading eyes. So I took him home as my new friend, only to find it he was a she.

Deliberate
The man was sitting on the plane. The kid in back of him kept kicking his seat. He tried to get the kid to stop. The kid kept deliberately doing it. The man reported the kid to the flight attendants.

Alabama
My grandparents lived in Alabama. We used to travel there every summer. We would eat from their garden, and use plants for medicine. I learned a lot about the country from being there. I miss traveling there, and miss my grands.

Bobby had always been a big eater, and decided to enter a contest. The challenge was to eat as many pies as possible in 10 minutes. Bobby scarfed the pies as quickly as possible, and finished 12. He was awarded first prize, and received a large and shiny medal. But he didn't get to enjoy it long - he threw up almost immediately.

cigarettes

keys

She found a stroller online that could hold up to four little ones. She purchased the stroller and is able to go on walks.

The Land's family planned a trip to Disney. The Land's rented a tour bus for the trip. The five hour long drive was exciting on the way to Florida. Once arriving the whole family was entertained sufficiently. There was something for everybody to do at Disney.

Poker
Dan's friend introduced Dan to poker. Dan realized he was very good at playing poker. Dan decided to go to Las Vegas to test his skill. Dan won millions of dollars at Las Vegas. Eventually, Dan became the best poker player in the United States.

Laundry
I put laundry away. There were three loads piled up waiting to be folded. I folded it all, then stacked it in piles. I put everyone's clothes away in their dressers. By the time I was done, I was ready for a nap.

Financial Aid
I got accepted to college, but could not afford it. Luckily, I was able to fill out a financial aid form. I put all my information in, and then waited. Eventually, I got word that I had received aid. It made it so I could go to college.

Spotted Puppy
Patty begged her parents for a speckled pup for her birthday. Her parents went to get a dog from the shelter as a surprise. When Patty saw the all-white puppy, she was disappointed. The next day, Patty looked happy again. Her parents saw she had drawn spots on the puppy.

Online Training
Amy was starting a work at home job. She was to attend training via an online conference. Amy followed along afraid she was misunderstanding. Finally she decided to ask a question to make sure she understood. It turned out she was understanding and was worried for nothing.

The Visit
My friend Beth came to town for a visit. She stayed with her family. I went to her family's house to visit her. Her sister sat with us and talked all night. I felt like I had made a new friend.

Date Night Solution
Jesus has a picnic planned for today. However as he picked up his girlfriend it began to rain nonstop. With his plans ruined, he no longer knew where to take her. However he quickly thought of having a picnic indoors. The indoor picnic turned out to become the best idea he ever had.

Motion Sick at the Museum
In sixth grade we went to the science museum for a field trip. Part of the trip was a film presentation in the omni-theater. We had been warned that some people get motion sick at this film. Nearly everybody scoffed. The boy two seats down from me vomited on the girl in front of him.

Brick Alley
My friend's band hosted an open mic night last week. Billy and I decided to go and support them. The bar was a really small place. We ended up having an amazing time listening to all the bands! The next day at work was awful because we stayed up way too late.

School Winter
A man's brother had to drive his brother to school. So he got up and went to his car. There was way too much traffic that day. So he was late for class and the brother missed a test. This is why he failed the class.

Put Your Toys Away
Ed had a bad habit of leaving his toys laying around. His parents were always telling him to put them away. One day his dad was walking down the hall. He stepped on Ed's favorite action toy, breaking it. Ed did a better job of putting his toys away after that.

The Ball
Tim was playing with his ball in the house. His mom came over and told him to stop. Once she went away, Tim continued to throw the ball in the air. Suddenly, he missed his catch and the ball hit a lamp, which broke. Tim got in trouble for not listening.

Internet Friends
When my husband and I moved to Florida last year, we knew noone. After being here a year, I began to feel lonely for friends. I put an ad on craigslist, describing the things that I like to do. I had several people answer the ad, all strange birds in my opinion. There was one lady who told me that she goes dumpster diving for fun!

Waterproof Phone
Zach heard about a new waterproof phone. So he went to the store to get the new phone for $200. At home, Zach decided to spill water on it on purpose. The phone didn't break, it really was waterproof! Zach called his friends with a wet phone to tell them the news.

Surprise Party
I decided to throw my Mom a surprise birthday party. She once told me she haven't had a party since her 10th birthday. I secretly invited all her close family, friends and colleagues. The look on her face was priceless when she seen everyone. I was so glad the party turned out to be a night to remember!

New Haircut
Janet went to get her hair cut. A new hairdresser attended her. When she was done, Janet looked in the mirror. The haircut was awful! Janet had to wear a hat for a long time.

The Ride
Sally's two dogs love to ride in in her car. Since she had errands to run today, she took them along. The weather was very nice so Sally opened the windows for them. Both of the dogs put their heads out of the window to feel the air. Once the errands were done, the dogs were not happy to go back home.

A New Toy
Jon was at the airport. He had two hours before his flight back home. He decided to go shopping. He bought his son a toy from the airport mall. His son loved the toy!

Horseback Riding Accident
Jane loved to go horseback riding. One day, she was riding her horse on the trail. Suddenly, the horse bucked, causing Jane to fall. Jane injured her back and her leg. After she recovered, Jane got right back to riding.

The Sailing Trip
The boat was moored at the dock. It was all loaded up and ready to set sail. The students boarded the boat ready to take off. The instructor took the boat out into the open ocean. The students had a great time learning how to sail that day.

Visit to the Farm
Our family decided to visit the farm on Saturday. We packed a picnic lunch and drove out to the country to the farm. We visited all of the farm animals and their babies. I liked the baby lambs best of all! We ate our lunch by the pond and then went home again.

Linens
Hannibal was in the market for a new set of sheets. He wanted something tough and undecorated. Hannibal settled on some off-white flannel sheets. Hannibal found them a bit stiff at first, but very durable. Overall, Hannibal was pleased with his choice.

The Storm
Rob and Mary go camping. After a long day hiking they go to sleep. Mary is frightened by sound of booming thunder. She and Rob leave the campground in a hurry. They spend the night safely in a motel.

Making a blanket.
Judy's grandma was teaching her how to make a blanket. Judy was cutting and tying tassels along the blankets edge. She started to get bored and wandered off to play with toys. Her grandma was annoyed, and yelled a her. Judy quickly returned and finished the blanket.

The Long Nap
Larry was tired from work. He decided to take a short nap. When he woke up there was still light on. Larry checked the time and it was actually the morning. He had slept throughout the afternoon and night.

Quad Cane
I had a stroke in 2011, and could not walk for 8 weeks. I walked out of rehab with a hemi walker. It looked like a step stool. After home rehab, I was able to switch to a quad cane. I felt very happy.

Horses
My Daddy and I used to ride horses together on Saturdays, his day off. He taught me how to saddle a horse, and climb on the left side always. One day, my horse decided to roll on the ground with me riding her! I couldn't get my feet out of the stirrups quick enough to jump off. Daddy jumped off his horse, ran over to mine, then pulled her up.

Emily wanted to go to college and study music. She worked hard to prepare an audition piece to sing. At her audition, she sang for the professors and took a music test. The professors were impressed by her audition. The offered her a music scholarship to the college.

Long Shot
One team was up by a lot of points in a bowling match. The began to take really cocky rolls to show off. The team captain took his turn without looking at the pins. His ball managed to take out 6 pins. He picked up the spare and the team was still quite ahead.

Downtown
There are a lot of bars downtown. My friends and I decided to go to a few last weekend. We started out at one and drank too much. We tried to make it to the second one but it was too late. Instead we got a cab and went home.

Trip to the Beach
Kelly was excited to go to the beach with her family. Her family had not been to the beach in a very long time. When Kelly arrived at the beach, she was shocked at how nice it was. Immediately Kelly and her family ran into the water. The water felt amazing and Kelly knew she made the right choice.

Football Saturday
The young couple had a weekend free of obligations. They decided to go to the local college's afternoon football game. They arrived at the stadium and scalped tickets from a stranger. They bought snacks and found their seats. Their team won the game after an exciting finish!

Tina wanted to go swimming. It was snowing outside. She started pouting. Her friend suggested they go to an indoor pool. Tina perked up and spent the day happily swimming.

Staying late
Two janitors were anxious to leave the school and go home. There was still one job to do but it only required one janitor. The two janitors flipped a coin to see who would stay. One janitor flipped the coin and it hit the ground. The coin eventually settled on tails.

Know When to Fold
Alan thought he would make a good poker player. He had seen it on tv, and it looked easy. He decided to enter a poker tournament. Alan lost in the first round. He now realized that he may need a lot of practice to be good at it.

I went to a political rally a couple weeks ago. I waited in line for 45 minutes just to get in. The place was hot and crowded. The speech was like a broken record. I didn't hear anything new or exciting at the rally.

Dogs
Lori is very lonely. She lives alone. One day she decides to get a dog. The dog is very friendly. Lori is not lonely anymore.

Sad puppy
Sady got a puppy for Christmas. She stayed with it all during Christmas break. Sady then had to go back to work. The puppy then cried every day. The pup is a sad puppy.

Jack bought a large bookshelf from the furniture store. He used a large cart to move the bookshelf to his van. He discovered that the bookshelf was too big to fit inside the van. Jack called his friend for help. Jack's friend arrived in his large pick-up truck to help Jack.

Banana
Three days ago I brought a banana to school for lunch. I forgot the banana in my locker. Today I went to get the banana and it had turned black. I threw the banana away. I decided not to leave food in my locker ever again.

Danny entered his film into a contest. He had to wait weeks to hear the results. Finally, the winner was announced. Danny won second place. He claimed his prize later.

Joe like to go to the zoo. It was his favorite thing to do. One year he went and ran to the elephant area. It was his favorite animal there. The elephant exhibit was closed that day and ruined Joe's time there.

Brian always wanted drive a big rig. He went to school to get his license. He got his license at the school. He drives big rigs for a living now. He couldn't be happier.

Goldie was a model known for her temperamental nature. Her violent behavior was affecting her ability to get jobs. She finally scored a shoot at an asylum. She thought she'd done very well. The staff agreed and forcefully invited her to stay with them.

Noisy Cat
James couldn't get any sleep. His cat kept jumping into his bed. He tried putting his car outside his room. His cat would claw and meow at the door. James was able to get the cat to be quiet by feeding her catnip.

Dinner
Our son celebrated his 27th birthday today. We took him out to a local Italian restaurant. We asked his aunt to go as well. Traffic was bad and we were delayed. We had a very good dinner.

Heather's mother asked her to go grocery shopping for her. Her mother gave her a shopping the list. Heather misplaced the list. At the store, she tried hard to remember all the items on the list. She made it home and disappointed her mother by forgetting things.

Bill started saving for his first car when he was 12. He worked every odd job he could for four years. He couldn't wait to be able to drive. On his 16th birthday he bought a new car. Ten years later he still has it and it's his pride and joy.

Jill had gotten a sled for Christmas. It was early March but still not snow. She was afraid she wouldn't get to try her new sled. She woke up one Tuesday morning to the news that school was cancelled. There was six inches of snow outside, perfect for sledding!

Greg always wanted his own dog. One day he decided to go to the pet store to get a dog. Greg picked out a beagle. At first the beagle was shy and nervous. Eventually Greg and his dog became very close.

I started a comedic barber shop quartet at college. We put on shows in the music department. We also incorporated a lot of improv comedy in out act. People really responded well to our music. Our harmonies weren't perfect, but our jokes were.

I had an important job interview. I stayed up all night preparing for possible questions. By the next morning, I could barely stay awake. I dressed and drove to the interview in a blur. When there, I realized I was wearing two different shoes!

Martin is going to the bar with his friends tonight. They get a table at the bar. They spend the whole night drinking. They flirt with girls until it is time to go home. Martin and his friends had a lot of fun at the bar.

I was taking a walk through my neighborhood. I came upon three vehicles parked in the road. Two men were forcing a third man into the back seat of one vehicle. I saw that they had "SHERIFF" printed on their jackets. The third man was being arrested for drunken driving.

Lucy was excited for dinner. Her grandmother let her choose hamburgers and french fries. Grandma wouldn't let Lucy put the pan into the oven. When the food finished Lucy took the tray out without asking. Grandma was angry, but also impressed Lucy wanted to learn to cook.

Hallie hit her head hard on the floor. It caused her to pass out. It scared her mom so bad she called 911. The 911 dispatcher sent the paramedics. Hallie was awake by the time the paramedics arrived.

water

Charles went to visit his relatives in Greensboro Kansas. When he arrived, the news reported a tornado coming. The tornado was one of the harshest in the town's history. Schools, homes and hospitals were wiped out. Charles' relatives were homeless.

Chad went to get the wheel alignment measured on his car. The mechanic drove the car around the block to check. As he turned, he hit another driver. Chad took a look at the new damage on the car. The mechanic provided a working alignment with new body work.

Mike always fancied himself a good basketball player. He was the most talented player on his team, but never practiced. Furthermore, he rarely put in effort unless the team was winning. His teammates got tired of his attitude and kicked him off the team. It was only then that Mike realized he had been a bad teammate.

Mary always wanted to travel after she finished her studies. When she graduated from university she searched for a job in England. Mary was able to find a job working for a Youth Hostel. She moved to the UK shortly afterward and began her job. Mary loved working in England and happily stayed for six months.

People bought the foam without the intent to use it for shipping. Everyone set up their own pads and jumped off their house on to it.

Billy noticed that he had a fever and tried to stay in bed. His mom came to him and placed her hand on his head. She immediately took me to the emergency room. The hospital staff forced me to stay over night. I had to call off from work since I'll be in the hospital.

Tommy's dad owned his own company. His dad died of a heart attack. Tommy didn't know much about the company, but wouldn't give up. Tommy kept practicing and kept getting better. Tommy made the big sale and saved the company.

Fred has always been scared of the cemetery. His friends tease him for this irrational fear. One day Fred decides to face his fear and visit the cemetery. Instead of being scared, Fred finds the cemetery beautiful. He is very proud of himself for facing his fear.

Matt was playing catch with Bob. Matt shot the ball too high. It went to the neighbor's yard. The neighbors yard was very scary. They never went to get the ball back.

Mary wanted to take her children to the Aquarium during spring break. When they got there the line to get in was very long. Mary didn't want to wait and hour or more. She took her kids and walked over to the nearly empty Field Museum. They spent a fun afternoon looking at dinosaurs fossils.

Eliot never knew what to get his mother for her birthday. No matter how much money he spent, she always seemed dissatisfied. Even expensive jewelry failed to make much of an impression. At a loss, Eliot penned a heartfelt letter expressing his feelings. His mother was overjoyed and hugged him delightedly.

I got in my car and began to drive home. My mind wandered to thoughts of sending a text message. I reached for my phone and could not find it. I felt around the car for where the phone was. I could not locate it in my car.

Leroy is impatient.
Leroy and his friends wanted to have some drinks. They go to the bar but have to wait in line outside. After 10 minutes Leroy got a bit too impatient. He runs through the door yelling his own name aloud. The bouncers stop him and tell him that was a bad move.

Sent Away
My niece's boyfriend got out on parole. He went to live with her. She told him he could not get drunk. He got drunk and she called the police. He was sent away for violating parole.

Hoarding

Joe was in his house. He wanted to go play. However it began to rain hard. He was sad. He got happy when he decided to watch tv instead.

Karma
The police officer stopped me in the middle of the highway. He told me to take out my driver's license. I was terrified since I left my wallet at home. When he found out, he arrested me and took me to jail. My friend took my wallet to the facility in order to release me.

The Stranger
The stranger started to approach Jane. He was following her as she started to walk faster. Just then, Jane turned around and abruptly stopped. The stranger also stopped and held out something in his hand. Jane's dropped wallet was not offered back to her.

Burrito Supreme
Tom loved burritos. He went to Taco Bell to get some food. He ordered and then drove to the window to pick it up. He held out his hand to grab the bag but the food fell to the ground. Three burrito supremes were lost that day.

Lyle's new suit
Lyle has a job interview next week. He's heading to Men's Wearhouse to get a new suit. He gets a gorgeous suit. He gets a great deal. Lyle is confident going into his interview.

The dog
Tom decided that he wanted to get a dog. He went to his local animal shelter. Walking in he saw a shy scared dog in a corner. He told the worker that was the one he wanted. With a wagging tail the dog smothered him in kisses as a thank you.

DOn't Eat Before Carnival Rides
A carnival was coming to town. Dalton loved to ride the ferris wheel. Dalton's mother warned him not to eat before getting on the ride. Dalton ate lots of carnival food that night. Dalton got sick on the ride.

A Fun Trip
Emma visited an amusement park. She got to go on many rides. Her favorite was the train ride. The conductor let her blow the train whistle. Emma can not wait to go back to the amusement park.

Hiking Pictures
Steph and her friends were hiking. And they decided to take a group picture at the top of a mountain. They posted the picture on Facebook. And it made others jealous. Steph and her friends were glad and posted more pictures.

Jake and Politics
Jake was very unhappy about the way his political party was ran. He decided to do something about his disdain. Jake started a campaign to run for a senate office. He worked very hard to convince people he was a good candidate. Jake won the election to become a leader in his political party.

The Not-So-Secret Stain
Pete tried to be careful with the glass of grape juice. He wasn't supposed to bring beverages into the TV room. He thought he would get away with it -- until he spilled the drink! He cleaned the rug as best he could, but his mom noticed the stain. Pete lost his allowance and TV privileges as punishment.

Work Break at the Nut Factory
Rhonda worked at a nut roasting factory. One day the production line came to a sudden halt. The roasting oven had run out of fuel. It took two hours to get new fuel supplies. Rhonda enjoyed an unscheduled break from work.

Vince liked to play pool. He would go to the bars and Hustle up some money. No one ever expected him to be so good. Vince did this as often as he could. He donated all his winnings to the homeless.

Hannah was making a cake for her mom's birthday. She accidently put baking powder instead of flour. The cake overflowed in the oven and made a mess. Hannah didn't know what to do, so she decided to make cookies instead. Hannah's loved the cookies.

Jake was excited for the upcoming wrestling match. He set up his big screen tv in the backyard. Jake invited all of his friends over. His friends brought food and drinks. They spent the rest of the night watching wrestling!

We wanted to go to a concert on Tuesday. We searched the papers for a band we liked that was playing. After decided, we left the house. It didn't take long to arrive. Before we knew it, we were listening to great music!

Carrie went with her friends to a rock concert. The girls waited in line for four hours just to get inside. Finally they got inside and had fun. However there was a lot of pushing and shoving. When it was over they had fun.

Bob and the family were excited and ready for their trip to Disney. Bob's parents wanted to join them but the car was too small. They searched everywhere for a car that could hold them all. A few weeks later they decided the best option was a minivan. When the day came the van carried them happily to their destination!

Last night I decided to watch Scream Queens on Fox. It was a hyped up show and I thought I would give it a try. As the show started, I liked it. However towards the end of the episode I was scared out of my seat. I wasn't sure I could watch it anymore but I stuck through it.

Neve started working as a children's librarian. She loved her job, until she was told she had to drive the bookmobile. Neve had her license, but she hated to drive. She reluctantly got into the bookmobile and started the engine. Driving the bookmobile turned out to be lots of fun!

laptop
We knew we needed to get a new laptop. The current one would no longer hold a charge. So we went to the local store to check them out. They had all different models with different functions. But we decided on a Mac because we thought it was best.

Jon really wanted to have a pet lion. He heard that in Dubai many rich families owned exotic cats. He decided to go live in Dubai so he could have a pet lion. He moved to Dubai and bought a pet lion. Alas, like many other people he was killed by the pet lion.

Reminder
Gina's brother was yelling loudly at her. He wanted her to leave his room. She stood her ground and relayed her message. Suddenly he pushed her really hard. Gina stumbled backwards, and hit a dresser.

Rick was very adventurous. So on his birthday, he wanted to go skydiving. He saved up lots of money for it. But his parents told him it was too dangerous. So instead, Rick spent his money on a sports car.

Todd had too much stuff in his house. He planned to have a garage sale. He put out all the items he didn't need outside. He created a listing for his garage sale on craigslist. At the end of the day he made $500 in sales.

Jim desperately wanted to learn the piano. He practiced 2 hours a day in an attempt to get better. Jim couldn't play difficult pieces as his hands were just too small. Jim's teacher asked him if he'd like to give the violin a try. Jim agreed and immediately took to the instrument.

Amber was really hungry. She called her husband. He said he would get food. He stopped at Wendy's. Amber was mad because she hates their food.

Jade got a new bike for her birthday. Jade practiced with her dad until she was able to ride it alone. Jade decided that she would ride to her friend's house. Jade got scared when a car got close to her and she hit a tree. Jade broke her arm in two places but recovered in 6 months.

Karen was about to give a speech in class. She was extremely nervous. She got up and started speaking. Her nerves caused her to forget her speech. Luckily, she was able to improvise very well.

The other day I wore my boots without socks. This small mistake led to an ingrown toenail. I stupidly tried to remove it myself. It got infected and I was in a lot of pain. Thankfully, the doctor was able to remove it.

Bat
We had a lot of mice in our office building. The exterminators put out sticky traps. One day we caught a bat in the trap. We think it came in through an air vent. The bat was dead and we disposed of it.

Come meal time, the host family agreed that the food was delicious. The host family happily decided that Thanksgiving was a wonderful day.

A man was locked out of his apartment when he left his keys inside. He went to the landlord's office but no one was there. The man decided to break down his own door to get inside. The flimly door flew right off the hinges and he got inside. The man just remembered that he left the back door open.

I went to the sandwich shop. I ordered a cheddar cheese sandwich. The shop had run out of cheddar. I decided to order a swiss cheese sandwich instead. I regretted my decision.

catcher
Ed was playing baseball. He was the pitcher. He began to throw badly, so his coach moved him. At first Ed was afraid he was being cut from the team. Then he discovered he was being made a catcher!

I went to a gas station to get some gas for my car. Inside, there were machines for coffee. I had to choose between iced and hot coffee. I then decided to get cold coffee. Finally, I sipped my coffee on the drive home.

Sam and Alison had just finished a doctor's appointment. They were supposed to wait for the bus home. It was taking a very long time. Finally, the couple decided to walk instead. They left the office and walked home.

Sam was bored one day. He decided to drive around. He had no real place to go. Eventually he realized he was wandering alone. Sam turned around and went home.

John had to move from his old apartment to a new one across the city. He had a lot of stuff to move so he called his friends for help. John's friends went to his old apartment. John's friends put all his stuff in their cars. They moved everything across town in one trip.

I walked towards the other side of the building. As soon as I put my foot on the road, a tree fell on the ground. Several cars were damaged in the accident. Eventually, several ambulance vehicles came. The medics took those that were injured to the hospital.

Kerry had rats in her house. She decided to catch them and release them outdoors. She set traps all over for them before bed. In the morning, she collected the traps and took them outdoors. She dumped the rats out of the traps and over the fence in the yard.

hosts

Dave
Dave and his wife are quite old. They've recently found religion and seem rejoiced. They attend church and join the choir. While singing, Dave feels very happy. Dave and his wife are rejuvenated by religion.

Biscuits.
Lucy was making the biscuits for dinner by herself. She placed the biscuits in the buttery pan. Her grandma helped her place the pan in the oven. When done Lucy put on oven gloves so she could take them out. Lucy moved slowly, but she burned her arm on the oven door.

The Sisters
Beth wanted to go to her friend May's house. Her mother stopped her and made her take her little sister. Beth told her sister Ali to behave while at May's house. Beth was talking to may when Ali started fighting with May's sister. Beth and May broke the girls up before anyone was hurt.

Slippery Roads
It was a cold and brisk morning. Mike rushed to get to work on time. The roads were slippery as he was driving. He lost control of his car near an intersection. Luckily, his car was able to come to a slow stop safety.

A Pony Ride
Bonnie begged her parents to get her a pony. Unfortunately, ponies are very expensive. Her parents could not buy her one, but they did plan a surprise. On her birthday they took her to a farm where a pony was saddled up. She had a big smile on her face as she got onto the pony to ride it.

Branch Merging
At work my branch combined with another branch. I have now been put in charge of twice of many people. I was a little overwhelmed at first so I hired an assistant. He was able to help me out with a lot of the workload. I love having an assistant.

Travel Failure
I needed to go to Europe for business. It now takes a lot of paperwork to travel. I submitted all my forms. They didn't reach the authorities in time. I couldn't complete my trip.

The Old Barn
My friends and I used to play in an old barn by our town. My friends and I would hide in the loft and play in the hay. The farmer who owned the barn decided to tear it down. My friends and I watched as the barn was destroyed. We felt sad that one of our favorite places to play was gone.

A bee near the bus.
Lily was just finishing at the doctor's office. She was sitting at the bus stop waiting to go home. Suddenly a bee began hovering around her. She freaked out and got up to move away from it. Luckily, the bus arrived soon and she was able to flee from the bee.

Louvre
Kate was an aspiring artist. She took a trip to Paris to see museums and get art ideas. Her first stop was the Louvre. There, she admired the paintings, like the Mona Lisa. Kate got so much inspiration from the Louvre.

Dinner Party
Milly cooked a big dinner. Her guests began to arrive one by bone. One guest had not by the appointed start of dinner. Milly waited fifteen minutes and finally the guest showed up. The dinner party began and all had a good time.

The Cookie Decision
As a kid I once entered the kitchen while my mom was making cookies. I was intoxicated by the smell of the baking cookies. My mom told me she had to leave but I better not eat the cookies. I lost all will power, eating the cookies in a huff. I got grounded for a week for indulging in that pleasure.

Cannon ball
Bob was swimming in his local pool. He loved to go there to cool down. He was doing laps when he was splashed with a large wave. His daughter did a cannonball into the pool! Bob retaliated by splashing water back at her.

Van Backs Up
Gina needed to back up to gain speed on an icy hill. And cars behind her made that impossible. She was going to get out to ask them to back up for her. She unbuckled her seat belt, and was about to open her door. Just then the van began backing up clearing the way for her to do so.

Like the Rest
I put my pants on one leg at a time. Then I put my shirt on two arms at a time. It then occurred to me that these two things are not so different. I took my pants off and tried the two leg method. It was much faster and I decided to never go back to the old way.

Broken Sled
Abby wanted to go sledding. She walked to the park with the biggest hill. The hill was so fast Abby could not control the sled. She crashed into a tree. Poor Abby broke her sled.

Cam
Cam was packing his lunch for school. Then he realized that he had forgotten to shop! Hurriedly, he put a banana and a can of soup into his lunchbox. At school, he got a surprise for lunch. His class had a pizza party and he did not need his makeshift lunch!

stars
Tim was looking at the stars. He thought they were beautiful. His dad told him that people get paid to watch stars. Tim decided that he wanted that job. Tim studied hard and became an astronomer.

False Hope
Gina was stuck in traffic and hoping it would pick up. Just then the cars began to move and hope returned. Then she saw a bus moving on to the shoulder. traffic hadn't moved as much as she hoped. It had just moved enough to fill in the space of the bus.

Stain
Tia spilled coffee on her new skirt. She hurried to remove it and scrub the stain. She treated it with a strong stain remover. Then she washed it normally. Tia was relieved to see that the stain was gone!

Sue didn't know what to buy her husband for Christmas. She decided to try to get an idea of what he liked. She went through his things and found some golf clubs. This inspired Sue to purchase something golf related for her husband. She went online and immediately purchased new golf shoes in his size.

Mary didn't believe in ghosts. But when she bought her new house, strange things started happening. Chairs would move and the sounds of someone on the stairs scared her. Mary had a Medium investigate and had the home blessed by a priest. May's house is quiet now, but she's changed her opinion on ghosts.

Sal grew corn in his field. He took a few ears and buttered them. Then he put them in the microwave. The kernels began to explode. Sal had made his own popcorn!

Ashley was really hungry. She wanted to get up and get a snack. However, her roommate was using the kitchen. Ashley's stomach hurt from her hunger. She killed her roommate out of impatience.

Danny was driving in the heavy rain. A pedestrian was trying to walk across the road before anyone passed. Danny didn't look for a second and ended up hitting the person. The person got into a coma and was brought to the hospital. Danny stayed by his side for a few days.

Jackie was very excited for black friday. She was hoping to get a great deal on a new TV. When she arrived at the store it was more crowded than she expected. She worked her way to the TV section in hopes of finding a good deal. All of the TVs were sold out, she went home very sad.

The water was amazing and the girls had a blast swimming. Time flew by as the girls spent three hours in the water.

Sandra had to babysit her cousin. Her cousin was a chore to take care of. Sandra had to get her to sleep. Or she would lose her mind. Finally her cousin fell asleep.

James is a good teenager. He got mixed up with the wrong crowd. It didn't take long till James found himself in trouble. James told his friends that he could not hang around them anymore. James has been staying out of trouble since.

Mark around the laundromat and the owner greeted him with a hose. The dirt and mud washed away as Mark was hosed down.

Building the shed
My tools were becoming too abundant in my backyard. I needed a place to put them to keep them together. I decided to build a small shed. I went to a home improvement store and bought a shed kit. I returned home and set up the shed in my yard.

Car Loan
I wanted to buy a car. I was too poor. I decided to get a car loan. The bank offered me thirty thousand dollars. I could finally buy a car!

Hiding
Tim was playing hide and seek. He hid in the bushes. He saw his friend looking. Tim began to laugh. His friend immediately found him.

Becoming an Artist.
I have always been better than average at art, especially drawing. The last three years, I have dedicated some time to get great at it. I'm pretty good now, and I'm honestly being humble. Looking back, learning art concepts was ridiculously easy. I can't believe how long I took it took me to learn these concepts.

Grandma's Present
Grandma had always wanted to run a restaurant. She'd been saving up for decades. We surprised her on her 80th birthday with a big check. Grandma took it and what she'd already saved and bought a place. She ran it with love and grace until she died at a hundred and five.

Inside out
Fred was running late for school. He put on whatever shirt he could find. He went downstairs. Then he realized it was inside out. He had to change it.

Bad fit
I went to the store one day to buy clothes. I found a cool looking pair of pants and purchased them. I went home and put them on but they didn't fit. I took the pair back to the store and got a replacement. I went home and the jeans fit much better.

Taking the bus.
Sierra was late for work. Usually she walked, but she needed to take the bus. On the bus, she saw some weird people. One person began bugging her and ranting to her. She hurried off of the bus and promised not to ride again.

Lego blocks
Billy's son watched youtube videos all day. Billy wants his son to go outside more. He puts Lego blocks outside for his son to play with. His son is excited to play outside. His son plays outside the entire day.

Braces
Mary had braces put on when she started her junior year. A lot of people made fun of her during the school year. When her senior year came around, Mary still had her braces on. Mary finally graduated and she even had her braces removed. She went on to college with a smile and a lot of confidence.

Catch the mouse
Tim saw a mouse in his home. He tried to catch it. The mouse got away. Tim decided to get a cat. The cat got the mouse in five minutes.

Garden
June had decided to start a garden. She bought some helpful books to get her started. June decided to plant a variety of vegetables. With tender love and care, they began to grow. June took pride with every bite of a vegetable from her garden.

Broken Vase
Lily was playing with a ball in the house. She threw the ball up and failed to catch it. It bounced and knocked over her mom's vase, breaking it. Lily wrote her mom an apology note and tried to clean up the mess. When mom got home, she said it was ok since the vase was just junk.

Hot Pot
Last night I put of pot of water on the stove to boil. I had forgot about the pot for so long the water boiled off. I had to let the pot cool before I could touch the handle. The high heat of the stove ruined the finish of the pot. I tossed the ruined pot in the garbage.

No Grip
Gina couldn't open her frozen car door. She tried and tried, but couldn't get a grip on the door frame. She decided she would need something to pry it open. She tried to open her trunk to find something. The trunk was also frozen shut.

Jim goes to the Super Bowl
Jim wanted to go to the Super Bowl. He saved money for ten Year's. Jim bought tickets as soon as they went on sale. The weekend of the game Jim wore his team's colors. The Super Bowl was one of the best days of Jim's life.

Cat
My wife's cat is not very friendly. She does let my wife approach her. Last night my wife came up close to take a photo. The cat swiped at the camera with her paw. My wife was surprised.

Peacoat
My son came home to visit yesterday. He cooked dinner for us. He said he was going shopping for a peacoat as his was torn. I had an extra one and gave it to him. He was pleased to get a good coat.

Passing Notes.
Brett had a crush on a girl named Elsa. He decided to pass her a not that asked if she liked him too. He put a little yes or no box for her to check. He passed it to her and anxiously waited for it to return. Right before it reached him the teacher took it and threw it away.

Sylvia's Bad Day
Sylvia had a sub-par performance review at work. It put a damper on her morning. She spilled coffee on her white shirt. Her work computer crashed. Sylvia was ready for this day to be over.

Visiting Devin
My friend Devin invited me to his house. I decided I would go visit him. I packed my bags up. I drove for hundreds of miles to his house. I spent a week with him and had fun.

Violin
Veronica wanted to learn to play the violin. Veronica conducted research to find a qualified teacher. Once she found a teacher, she decided to visit the teacher's studio. After the visit, Veronica decided to sign up for the lessons. Veronica was excited to be learning to play the violin.

Sunday Snores
Makenzie and Annie had a sleepover on Saturday. The two of them sat up until 3 AM laughing and talking. On Sunday morning they had to get up early for church. It was really funny when they both started snoring in the service. Even the Pastor laughed at them!

Monkeys at the zoo
Harvey was very excited to go to the zoo to see the monkeys. Harvey searched the monkey house. The monkey house was being cleaned by a man with a hose. The monkeys were all outside playing. Harvey went outside and saw the monkeys playing in their exhibit.

Bad Actions
Henry was planning to go on vacation with Sarah. They went to a local car rental store. Henry saw a truck he wanted to use and requested a purchase. The representative researched information about his financial history. They said that he was not eligible to rent due to a low credit score.

Cookies
Jamie loves to bake cookies. She bakes cookies every week. One day, Jamie decided to take cookies to the homeless shelter. The people at the homeless shelter gratefully accepted the cookies. Jamie brought joy to the people at the homeless shelter.

Tablet
Mary wanted to get a new tablet for reading books. She purchased one at her local electronics store. When she got home she turned on her tablet. The screen was cracked right in the middle. She took it back to the store and was able to get a new one.

Rollercoaster
Jeff was always afraid of rollercoasters. His friends finally convinced him to go on one. He was really nervous. When he got on he threw up in the middle of the ride. He promised never to ride one again.

The Ice Pond
Jerry went walking on a snowy day. He saw that a small pond was covered in ice and walked to it. He became curious about whether he could walk on it or not. Jerry began to slowly walk on the surface, but fell into the water. Jerry climbed out onto the ice for his life and then got away.

Michael plays basketball.
Michael always liked watching people play basketball. He would  go to the park every afternoon after school. He always wondered how it would feel to shoot the basketball. One afternoon, his friend asked him to play. That was the very first time Michael got to play basketball.

Arranging the place cards.
Daniel was setting up for Thanksgiving dinner. She needed to arrange place cards for everyone. At first she put her brother and uncle near each other. Then, her sister warned her that the two had been fighting. She managed to change the arrangement right before they arrived.

The morning I went to get breakfast.
This morning I noticed I was a little hungry. After thinking about what to eat, I chose to go to the store. Once there, I picked out some breakfast items and headed out. The lady that checked me out was really nice! It was a very quick trip for some food!

Tim's New Pup
Tim bought a new puppy today. Unfortunately, he has no idea how to take care of a dog. So, he went and bought a litter box and tried to make his dog use it. He was not too happy when his puppy decided to go on the floor. Hopefully somebody tells Tim that's not how it's done.

Good year for bad Wine
A wine maker was having a bad year selling his wine. He decided to put a different label on it and raise his prices. Everyone thought that the wine was much better than his last vintage. He sold all the bottles by the end of the year. Once the last bottle sold he drank a glass to celebrate.

Needles
Henry's parents took him to the doctor office. He was scared since the office needed to run a few blood tests. When a needle was inserted into one of his veins, he began to cry. Afterwards, he stopped. The doctor gave him a lollipop.

Embarrassing Hair
Leo wore a toupee and was anxious about it. He decided to go out for a short walk. It was a very windy day, but he wasn't too concerned. Suddenly, a strong wind came through and took his toupee! His dog leaped and caught it, and he quickly ran home.

Janice at the Playground
Janice decides to bring her children to the playground one day. She lets them swing on the swings while she reads a magazine. However, one of her children falls off the swing. Janice rushes to make sure he is OK. She decides never to read while her children are playing again.

Rice Trick
Frank dropped his brand new phone in a puddle. It wouldn't turn on! His friend told him to put it a bowlful of raw rice overnight. He said it would absorb the water. When Frank checked the next day it worked just fine!

The Swimming Lesson
Mary was scared of swimming. Her mother enrolled her in a swimming class. The teacher asked Mary to put her head under the water. Mary was scared but complied because she trusted the teacher. Soon, Mary was swimming like a dolphin!

Mandy's Glasses
Mandy went to the eye doctor to get her eyes tested. The eye doctor said Mandy was short-sighted. He suggested that she should get glasses. Mandy picked her favorite glasses from the frames at the eye doctor's. Mandy was pleased with her new glasses.

Indonesia
Neil flew to Indonesia. He landed and hurried to get to his hotel. Then he checked in and took a bus to the shore. He was captivated by the gorgeous beaches. Indonesia truly was a paradise!

Family Ski Trip
One morning the Smith Family decided to take a ski trip. They packed all of their gear into their car and hit the road. Once at the resort, little Suzy Smith realized she forgot her skis! The family then waited in line for an hour to rent Suzy some skis. With Suzy's skis rented, the Smiths enjoyed skiing out on the slopes.

Pet
A girl wished for a silver necklace. Everyday she passed by the jewelry store and saw what she wanted. But she was too little to go inside. She asked her father to buy her the necklace for her. The next day, her father bought a cheap necklace made of string.

Dinner
Cassie was a vegetarian and had just been invited to a cookout. She feared her friends would mock her when they found out her secret . But she decided to go anyways and try to have fun. At meal time, Cassie got a big surprise. There was chicken, ribs - and tons of veggie burgers!

Late Patrol
Two police officers were on patrol for the evening. The younger of the duo fought the urge to fall asleep. In order to help him stay awake, his partner stopped to get fast food. They got some some much needed refreshments at the the drive thru. When they were done eating, they resumed their patrol.

braces
Mandy had braces for two Year's. After her braces came off her teeth looked wonderful. She remembers when the braces were first put on. She was depressed about it then. Now she can look back and be happy she had braces.

The Peacock
Waki decided to visit a national park. He found a peacock at the national park. Waki was scared of peacocks. He decided to kick the peacock away from him. Waki was arrested by the park ranger and sued by the state.

Burrito
Sara used to go to this Mexican place by her work. Her and her coworkers used to get burritos for lunch. The restaurant shut down today due to health risks. Sara is extremely upset because she loved that place. Now her and her coworkers will have to find someplace else for lunch.

Parking Lot Baby
Ashley was past her due date. She decided to go out of town with her husband. She began having contractions. They decided to go back home. Ashley had her baby in the backseat of the car.

Super Bowl .50 Cents To My Name.
I spent my life savings to go to the Super Bowl. I know it sounds crazy but I couldn't help it. My wife is mad, but she's lucky that I bought her a ticket too. I never felt more alive cheering for my team. It's just too bad I had to be a Panthers fan.

Cheat
Ryan cheated on his school essay. He plagiarized much of it. He thought he would get away with it. But somehow, his teacher discovered his crime! She gave Ryan an F on the paper.

Hector Had A Monkey
Hector had a pet monkey named Chimples. Chimples loved to throw things. One day, Hector signed up Chimples for his little league team. Chimples threw the ball faster than any human pitcher. Chimples even won them the big game on Sunday.

Benny
Benny was a taxi driver in a big city. He knew the whole city by heart. One day a man asked him to go to the hospital. Benny got the man there safe and sound. The man tipped Benny well for his prompt service.

Masked Ball
Jim went to a masked ball. He put on an anonymous mask. He saw a girl with an exceptionally nice body. He went up to her and asked her to dance. After the dance, she removed her mask and she was hideous.

Bear Scare
Wyman and his family were tent camping. They went fishing and caught three fish. They set the fish on a picnic table while they swam. When they came back the fish were gone. They saw bear prints around the picnic table.

The Squirrel
Rose's dog was acting very hyper. She decided to take him on a walk. On the walk Rose's dog saw a squirrel. He broke away from the leash and chased the squirrel down the street. Rose was relieved when he finally returned back a few minutes later.

Brett's first time snowboarding
Brett wanted to learn to snowboard like his friends. Brett set up an appointment with an instructor. On the day of the appointment, Brett was nervous. His instructor spent extra time teaching Brett to help him. Brett picked it up quickly and became a confident snowboarder.

Ravi gets married
Ravi wanted to get married but had never had a girlfriend. His parents wanted to set him up on a date. He was reluctant but he agreed. Ravi fell in love with the first girl his parents picked for him! Ravi married her and was happy he listened to his parents.

Walking through the forest
My girlfriend and walked to the forest. It was a beautiful fall day. All of the leaves were turning orange. The sun was shining through the trees. The forest was a beautiful sight.

Daniel Moves Out on His Own
Daniel has lived in his mother's basement for too long. All of his friends have moved into their own apartments. Daniel wants to have his own place soon. He borrows some money from his mother. Daniel finally gets his own apartment with that money.

The Sandwich
Angie was at a subway shop. She wanted to get a sandwich. When asked what she wanted on it she was too shy. She answered quietly and wrong. She ate the sandwich anyway but didn't like it much.

Smart Phone
I really wanted to get a new smartphone. Every one I liked was expensive. The others needed a long plan to sign up. Eventually I found one online. I bought it and it arrives next week.

Day Bed
Gina had a cool new day bed. She loved it so much she wanted to stay in it all day. Her sisters and brothers had new bunk beds. She complimented them on their beds. But she knew her's was the best.

Casino winning
Jack went to the casino with his friends last night. Normally when they go they just play the slots. Jack had never won anything. Him and his friends tried the slots again. To his delight, jack won ten thousand dollars.

Gang no more
Tim was in a ferocious gang. He was secretly ready to get out, but didn't know how to. One day, he decided to change his identity and move. He cut his hair, colored it, donned glasses and moved to Kansas. He needed a job, so he joined the military to go unnoticed.

Turn Back
Gina was stuck on the street in traffic. The heavy snow was causing traffic to move slowly. Gina hoped it would pick up. Soon she realized there was no hope of that. She decided she needed to turn around and go a different way home.

Money
Beth's student loans just kicked in last week. She doesn't have near enough money to start those payments. She decided to get a part time job in the evenings. Even though she is always tired now she does like the extra income. She now has enough to pay off her student loans.

No Ending
Jim already rushed out of the house since he was late for school. Unfortunately, he realized that he left his report at home. As soon as he was about to go home, it started to rain heavily. He decided to be safe and wait until the rain cleared. He ended up going to his class without the report.

Carlos Gets A Job
Carlos has been unemployed for several months. He has found it difficult to get a job. Finally Carlos interviews for a job at the local movie theater. He is hired for the movie theater job! Carlos feels very happy to finally be employed.

Rocky's Snake
Rocky had a pet snake and his name was Albert. Rocky loved to play with Albert everyday and hold him. Albert loved to explore and sometimes Rocky couldn't find him. One day Albert got away and Rocky looked everywhere for him. He finally found Albert under his bed curled up in a box asleep.

Tony's Tiger Encounter
Tony had been frightened of cats as a child. Despite this, he agreed to enter a tiger enclosure at the zoo. He got within a few feet of the large tiger! His heart was racing as he stretched out his hand towards it. Tony successfully stroked the tiger before screaming and running away.

Oodles of Poodles
The family dog had puppies! There were 7 new little poodles in the house. When a family friend came to visit he coined a new phrase. He said they had oodles of poodles. The family then told everyone they had oodles of poodles at home.

Melanie
Melanie did not get along with her boss at work. She decided it was best to find another job. Before she found another job, she was promoted above her old boss. Melanie made sure her boss knew how badly she was treated. Melanie made sure never to treat others as poorly as she was treated.

Winter Is Here
Amy moved from Florida to Illinois last month. She is getting her first taste of a harsh winter. She wasn't prepared for the cold and had to go buy clothes. She spent a lot of money on warm clothes yesterday. Today she's all bundled up and managing just fine.

found
Beth found a wallet on the ground. She decided to try to return it. She looked at the name and address on the license. Then she packaged the wallet and mailed it to its owner. The next week she received a thank-you note in the mail!

Together
Amy was going to a party. She was nervous so her friend Beth offered to go with. Amy walked to Beth's house slowly. She felt like she might chicken out and run home at any time. Beth cheered her up, and they walked to the party.

Lola drinks coffee.
Lola was very tired before work. She decided to get a Starbucks coffee. She drank the coffee in the car on her drive to work. She had much more energy after her coffee. Lola did not get tired throughout her shift at work.

The Centerpiece
Joan picked big shiny acorns and put them in a bowl. She set the bowl on the table for a centerpiece. Later, Joan had a dinner party. As she conversed with guests across the table, she spied something. The bowl of acorns was teeming with maggot-like worms.

Nap
Whit decided to take a nap. She wanted to nap for about an hour. Instead her nap turned into hour house. Whit was exhausted. Because she overslept, she was late for work.

Playing Golf
Garry wanted to play a game of golf. Gary decided he would go to the local golf club and play. After gathering his things, Garry arrived at the golf club. Garry rented a golf cart, and began to play a game. Garry felt very relaxed after playing a round of golf at the club.

Early Labor
Lisa was 9 months pregnant. She couldn't wait to have her baby. A week before her due date Lisa went walking. While she was walking she went into labor. Lisa had her baby a week early and was very happy.

Dog
Peter's dog was always excited to play with his bone. He would chase it around the house and gnaw on it. Sometimes Peter would hide the bone away. Then the dog would take its time hunting it down. But it always found the bone to play with.

Cornelia Buys a Bike
Cornelia has just started a job that is close to her apartment. She decides she wants to use a bike each day to get to work. She begins looking for high quality bikes that are not too expensive. Finally she finds one that she can afford. Now Cornelia loves riding her new bike to work.

Sam Feels Lazy
Sam was feeling lazy. He didn't want to get out of bed. He had been out partying the night before. He rested in his bed all day. He felt better the very next day.

lost key
Mia and Susan were going for a walk at the park. On their way back Mia noticed she had lost her keys. Susan helped Mia to find her keys. They found the keys on the bench they were sitting earlier. Mia was relieved that they found the keys and both walked home.

Pistachio Macaroons
Kim hadn't had a pistachio since she was a kid. At the bakery they had pistachio macaroons. Kim decided she would give pistachio another shot and bought one. To her delight the cookie was delicious. She decided pistachio wasn't so bad after all.

Roller Coaster
The Smith family decided to visit an amusement park for Spring Break. The son decides he wants to ride the biggest roller coaster. The family gets in line and waits two hours to get on. While the son and daughter love the ride, the parents become sick! After the ride, the kids beg Papa Smith and Mama Smith to go again.

Teller
A bank teller told me to rob the bank where she worked. I asked her why should I do that? She said to get a lot of money. So I robbed her bank. We split the money equally.

The Wrong Part
I sent my girlfriend to get a replacement part for my car. I gave her the model number and a description. She said she would come right back. Three hours later she finally returns. Somehow she still managed to get the wrong part.

The Amusement Park
The family took a vacation. Usually they go to their mountain home. This time they decided to go to an amusement park. They rode every ride. They all had a blast.

Tongs
Lucy dropped an earring in the toilet. She didn't want to put her hand in the water to retrieve it. She grabbed tongs from a drawer in the kitchen. She retrieved the earring from the toilet. She washed the earring, and the tongs and but the tongs back.

Copper Kettles
My mom had a large set of copper kettles when I was younger. A few years ago she tried to sell them in a garage sale. I took them because I liked them. After a few years I gave them away to a consignment shop. They would be worth money today and I regret giving them away.

Getting over it
I broke up with my boyfriend because he wanted to get married. I just wasn't happy with that lifestyle. He knew I didn't want to get married, but stayed with me anyways. Eventually I broke up with him because he wouldn't do it himself. I ended up looking like the bad guy.

Tom the Drunk
Tom loved to drunk alcohol. He also loved to drink and drive. Tom decided to get more careless one day. Tom drive straight into a tree. Now, drunk Tom is no longer alive.

Nail party
Josie was having a nail party with her friends at the salon. She was excited to finally get her nails done. Josie picked a pretty teal color to get. Her friends picked the same color. Her nails came out perfectly.

Shoot
Tom's dad asked him if he wanted to play a shooting game. Tom was very nervous when his dad said there were big guns used! But he wanted to appear brave, so he agreed to go and  play. When they arrived, Tom's dad handed him a loaded paintball gun. The males shot at each other and had a great, colorful time!

Chloe's Last Drink
Chloe was never a heavy drinker. She had a few too many at the bar one night. She decided to drive home. Chloe hit a parked car a few blocks from her house. She never drank again.

The Fall
It was a beautiful November day in Minnesota. Amy was at her mothers and decided to go for a walk. Her niece and nephew asked to go with. At an intersection her nephew almost ran in front of a car. Amy taught the kids how to look both ways before crossing the street.

Tripping
John would never tie his shoes. His mom warned him and said he would get hurt one day. John said he is too fast to trip on his laces. The very next day he was playing football with friends and tripped. He came home with bloody knees and his mom wasn't mad, she helped him.

Laptop
Rachel loved her laptop. One day the laptop stopped working. Rachel went to the store to get one like hers. She was unable to find the same laptop. Rachel purchased a different model.

Hide and Seek
A group of children were playing a game of hide and seek. The smallest boy was always found first. He decided that he would win at least one round. He found a basket of toys and hid at the bottom. He ended up winning because no one ever found him.

Glasses
Tina had recently gotten her eyes inspected at school. The doctor told her she had to get glasses. She went to the optometrist with her mom. She picked out a pair of pink glasses. She wore the glasses to next day to school.

Wet Cat
Laura finally set up her new fish tank. She watched the fish inside all day before going to bed. Later that night, Laura heard a loud crash. She jumped out of bed and ran into the living room. She turned the light on and saw that her cat had fell into the tank!

Chocolate
Kate had a fierce craving for chocolate. She searched the house for sweets. Every place she had stashed candy was empty. Kate went to the store and bought more chocolate. As she ate her treat she decided to hide the rest better next time.

In the Dark
One night Rex came home and noticed his porch light was out. Rex thought hard about how to fix the bulb in the dark. He went to his garage to get a flashlight, new bulb and ladder. After Rex changed the bulbs he dropped the old one by accident. Rex was annoyed by the mess but satisfied with his job well done.

Prioritize
Emily is looking for a job. She has to take personality tests for each job. She doesn't have enough time to take all of the tests for every job. Emily decides to pick the jobs she wants the most. Emily finished the tests for the jobs she wanted the most.

New kid at school
Ally was the new kid at her school. She was very nervous. She got up very early in the morning to get ready. She made sure she had the perfect outfit and everything. Ally finally went out the door.

Somber
Amy's team lost their first game. It was quiet on the bus ride home. Amy didn't care anyway. All she could think about was the fact she didn't get to play. She closed her eyes, and fell asleep.

Mason
Mason never found a decent job and was tired of being broke. He decided to take some classes at the local college. After a couple Years, he found a job with a computer company. He got a promotion after only being there a year. Mason was happy he decided to go to college.

Clowning Around
Maria decided to go on the fair on Saturday. However, she hates clowns. To Maria's dismay, there was a clown convention that day. By 4:00 PM, she could not take it anymore. Needless to say, Maria won't be going to that fair again.

Nanny
Gretchen was a nanny for two children. She knew she needed to get a job making more money. When she left, the children were very upset. Gretchen did not anticipate this. She decided to keep in touch with the children.

The Fill
Brian took a glass to the sink. He turned the sink on and watched it flow. He put the glass right under the water. The water filled the glass to the top. Brian removed the glass and turned off the sink.

Face Burn
The mailman delivered my set of new acne products. For the past week, I used it everyday. However, my face started to dry up and it formed rashes. Today, I had to wear a hat in school to protect my face. I had to squint my eyes to relieve the pain.

Shoes
Amy worked as a cashier at Marshall's. Her boss decided she should also handle the shoe department. When there were no customers she would set up shoe displays. Amy enjoyed the variety this added to her day. She thanked her boss for the opportunity to learn more.

The Race
Alex woke up the morning he was going to run a race. He chose not to have breakfast. Soon after, the race started. Alex felt faint and could not finish the race. He decided he would never skip breakfast before a race again.

Smith Christmas Photos
The Smiths were having holidays done of the children. The youngest Smith, Ty, was a shy one year old who cried a lot. They tried everything they could to get him to sit with his sisters. Just when they were giving up, the photographer pulled out an ottoman. Ty's face lit up as he ran to the new toy, happily posing for photos.

The bee sting.
Remi was on a walk with her dog. She was passing some flowers when she felt something sharp. She realized that a bee had stung her. She tried to remember how to get the stinger out. Luckily, she got it right out and she felt okay.

Bryan Plays Hockey
Bryan went to the ice rink with his friends. Bryan got out his hockey stick and put on his skates. Bryan played hockey on the rink with his friends. Bryan's team won 2-0. Bryan took off his gear and went home.

Snowed In
Delia woke up to get ready for school. She made herself breakfast. She turned on the news. Her school was closed due to 9 inches of snow fall. Delia went back to bed.

Cassie Gets Contacts
Cassie had worn glasses practically her entire life. She finally made the decision to get some contact lenses. The first time her eye doctor put them in she hated them. She was sure she would never get used to wearing them. Now, she barely remembers that she has them in sometimes.

Vacation
The Smiths go to Florida for vacation every year. This year, they want to try something different. So they ask friends, and take there advice to go to Hawaii. The Smiths are there for two weeks and love it! They will never go to Florida for vacation again, only Hawaii.

Trotting
Annie had been taking riding lessons for a few months. She was finally confident enough to trot without a lead line. Her instructor jogged along beside her to get her started. Then she unsnapped the line. Annie was trotting a horse all by herself!

Ruth Is Gone
Gina and her friends didn't invite Ruth to functions. They didn't want her to bring Jane with. Ruth realized they were snubbing her and stopped coming around. Gina could tell Ruth was mad with them. But she didn't want Ruth forcing Jane into their group anymore.

Arson
I was feeling extremely bored. I decided to play with some matches. I accidentally set my backyard on fire. The firefighters and police came. The police arrested me and charged me with arson.

First Car Accident
I had just gotten a new job as a swim coach the day before. On the second day of practice, I decided to take a new way to work. While stopping, I noticed a man behind me who was not stopping. The man ran into the back of my car like I wasn't even there. No one was hurt but my bank account.

Mall Shopping Blues
Calvin hated shopping with his girlfriend. She asked him to take her to the mall after work. Calvin reluctantly agreed. He had to wait 3 hours for her to finish shopping. Calvin hates the mall now even more than before.

New Haircut
Jane wanted a different look. She decided to get a new haircut. The stylist convinced her to try something crazy. She agreed. Afterward she immediately regretted her decision.

Drunk Driving
One day, Erin decided to have a drink. It was very late at night. Nobody could drive her home. She decided to drive home herself. She woke up crashed in her front yard.

New hat
It was snowing and Kelly needed a new hat. She went to the store to go find one. When Kelly found one, she loved it. She immediately picked it up and purchased it. Kelly was happy about it.

The Bus
As Cady was getting on the bus one morning, suddenly she couldn't move Cady pulled and pulled, but she couldn't budge. She screamed and screamed and tried to walk, but she couldn't. She looked behind her and realized her coat was stuck on the bus. She pulled her coat off and got on the bus.

Loose Change
Johnny grandpa always took his change out of his pockets at night. When Johnny visited, he would get to keep the change! Tonight when his grandpa took the money out there wasn't just change. There was a dollar bill as well. His grandpa let him keep it!

Not Starting
The boys started a campfire outside of the house. Stanley tried to walk to his cabin. However, a small spark of fire got caught on his jacket. Eventually, the rest of the jacket started to burn. He took it off before the flames got to his skin.

Jane really wanted her family to drink wheatgrass. She decided to hide it in other foods. She made a wheat free, sugar free chocolate cake. She hoped they would be enticed to eat the cake. No one finished the cake on their plate that evening.

Roger loved sports. He decided to go to a live event. There was a basketball game and a hockey game tonight. Roger like basketball but he loved hockey. He went to the hockey game only to find out the tickets were sold out.

Making an easter basket.
It was Easter. Ruby was putting a basket together for her son. She put some grass in it. Then, she put toys and candy inside. Finally, she wrapped it in plastic.

Zach was volunteering at a festival. He was given a QR code and asked to hand it out to the crowd. Whoever could get the most scans would win prize money. Zach worked hard all day to get as many scans as possible. He ended up winning and the money was his.

Lost on a walk.
Ben and Allie had just moved to a new city. They decided to go for a walk through the neighborhood. When they tried to get home, they realized they were lost. They spent two hours wandering through the city. Finally, they managed to find their way home.

Contacts
White wears contacts. As she was taking them out, she tore one. She had to throw it away. She called her doctor's office. They gave her a new pair.

Finley realized it was almost Christmas. He hadn't done any shopping at all. He made up a list of everyone he needed to get gifts for. Finley went to the very crowded mall. It took eight hours but he got everything he needed.

I went inside to get some coffee at a gas station. I left my keys in the ignition. After I paid for my coffee, I watched somebody drive off in my car! The police found it only a few blocks away. The thief completely totaled it!

night terror
Ben had horrible vivid nightmares. His doctor called them night terrors. She put Ben on medication to try to help him. Slowly it began working. Soon, Ben's night terrors were all but gone.

Linda was the lead singer in a band. She was extremely popular with the crowds. But her band-mates were jealous that she hogged the spotlight. They demanded a larger cut of the revenues. When she refused, they all walked out.

Maxine had always worried that caffeine would give her jitters. One day a coworker convinced her to try coffee. Maxine took one sip and found it delicious. From that day on Maxine drank coffee every day. She was happy that it did not give her jitters.

Bill put money into the stock market. He invested all of his money in Apple. Apple's stocks went up $300 in one day! Bill sold his stocks and made millions! Bill lived a life of luxury after that day.

Good Eye
A man was reluctant to go see the eye doctor for his bad eyes. His wife made him go when his driving almost caused an accident. The doctor told him he should have came a long time ago. The man hated his glasses until he found a frame he liked. Now he is an advocate for all his friends to get their eyes checked.

One Day Laurie decided to go to the library. She drove downtown in her new car. Laurie checked out some books. When she left she saw a big dent in her car door. Thank goodness there was a note from the person who hit her car.

Tom and Mary ended their relationship after several Year's. They were dividing the things they bought together. They both wanted the bed they bought and couldn't who should get it. They flipped a coin where heads would give it to Tom. It landed on tails so Mary got to keep it.

Jason regrets not earning a college degree. He decides to go back to school. Jason choses to go to a local community college. On the first day of class he is the oldest one there. Jason feels uncomfortable, but he will stay and do his best job.
